98 Beam::~Beam()
99 {
100  TRIGGER_EVENT(SE_GENERIC_DELETED_TRUCK, trucknum);
101 
102  // TODO: IMPROVE below: delete/destroy prop entities, etc
103 
104  this->disjoinInterTruckBeams();
105 
106  // hide everything, prevents deleting stuff while drawing
107  this->setBeamVisibility(false);
108  this->setMeshVisibility(false);
109 
110  // delete all classes we might have constructed
111  if (dash)
112  delete dash;
113  dash = 0;
114 
115  // stop all the Sounds
116 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
117  for (int i = SS_TRIG_NONE + 1; i < SS_MAX_TRIG; i++)
118  {
119  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigStop(this->trucknum, i);
120  }
121  StopAllSounds();
122 #endif // USE_OPENAL
123 
124  // destruct and remove every tiny bit of stuff we created :-|
125  if (engine)
126  delete engine;
127  engine = 0;
128  if (buoyance)
129  delete buoyance;
130  buoyance = 0;
131  if (autopilot)
132  delete autopilot;
133  autopilot = 0;
134  if (fuseAirfoil)
135  delete fuseAirfoil;
136  fuseAirfoil = 0;
137 
138  if (cabMesh != nullptr)
139  {
140  this->fadeMesh(cabNode, 1.f); // Reset transparency of "skeleton view"
141 
142  cabNode->detachAllObjects();
143  cabNode->getParentSceneNode()->removeAndDestroyChild(cabNode->getName());
144  cabNode = nullptr;
145 
146  cabEntity->_getManager()->destroyEntity(cabEntity);
147  cabEntity = nullptr;
148 
149  delete cabMesh; // Unloads the ManualMesh resource; do this last
150  cabMesh = nullptr;
151  }
152 
153  if (replay)
154  delete replay;
155  replay = 0;
156 
157  if (vehicle_ai)
158  delete vehicle_ai;
159  vehicle_ai = 0;
160 
161  // TODO: Make sure we catch everything here
162  // remove all scene nodes
163  if (deletion_sceneNodes.size() > 0)
164  {
165  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < deletion_sceneNodes.size(); i++)
166  {
167  if (!deletion_sceneNodes[i])
168  continue;
169  deletion_sceneNodes[i]->removeAndDestroyAllChildren();
170  gEnv->sceneManager->destroySceneNode(deletion_sceneNodes[i]);
171  }
172  deletion_sceneNodes.clear();
173  }
174  // remove all entities
175  if (deletion_Entities.size() > 0)
176  {
177  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < deletion_Entities.size(); i++)
178  {
179  if (!deletion_Entities[i])
180  continue;
181  deletion_Entities[i]->detachAllObjectsFromBone();
182  gEnv->sceneManager->destroyEntity(deletion_Entities[i]->getName());
183  }
184  deletion_Entities.clear();
185  }
186 
187  // delete wings
188  for (int i = 0; i < free_wing; i++)
189  {
190  // flexAirfoil, airfoil
191  if (wings[i].fa)
192  delete wings[i].fa;
193  if (wings[i].cnode)
194  {
195  wings[i].cnode->removeAndDestroyAllChildren();
196  gEnv->sceneManager->destroySceneNode(wings[i].cnode);
197  }
198  }
199 
200  // delete aeroengines
201  for (int i = 0; i < free_aeroengine; i++)
202  {
203  if (aeroengines[i])
204  delete aeroengines[i];
205  }
206 
207  // delete screwprops
208  for (int i = 0; i < free_screwprop; i++)
209  {
210  if (screwprops[i])
211  delete screwprops[i];
212  }
213 
214  // delete airbrakes
215  for (int i = 0; i < free_airbrake; i++)
216  {
217  if (airbrakes[i])
218  delete airbrakes[i];
219  }
220 
221  // delete flexbodies
222  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
223  {
224  if (flexbodies[i])
225  delete flexbodies[i];
226  }
227 
228  // delete meshwheels
229  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
230  {
231  if (vwheels[i].fm)
232  delete vwheels[i].fm;
233  if (vwheels[i].cnode)
234  {
235  vwheels[i].cnode->removeAndDestroyAllChildren();
236  gEnv->sceneManager->destroySceneNode(vwheels[i].cnode);
237  }
238  }
239 
240  // delete skidmarks
241  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; ++i)
242  {
243  delete skidtrails[i];
244  skidtrails[i] = nullptr;
245  }
246 
247  // delete props
248  for (int i = 0; i < free_prop; i++)
249  {
250  for (int k = 0; k < 4; ++k)
251  {
252  if (props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k])
253  {
254  Ogre::SceneNode* scene_node = props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k];
255  scene_node->removeAndDestroyAllChildren();
256  gEnv->sceneManager->destroySceneNode(scene_node);
257  }
258  if (props[i].beacon_light[k])
259  {
260  gEnv->sceneManager->destroyLight(props[i].beacon_light[k]);
261  }
262  }
263 
264  if (props[i].scene_node)
265  {
266  props[i].scene_node->removeAndDestroyAllChildren();
267  gEnv->sceneManager->destroySceneNode(props[i].scene_node);
268  }
269  if (props[i].wheel)
270  {
271  props[i].wheel->removeAndDestroyAllChildren();
272  gEnv->sceneManager->destroySceneNode(props[i].wheel);
273  }
274  if (props[i].mo)
275  {
276  delete props[i].mo;
277  }
278  if (props[i].wheelmo)
279  {
280  delete props[i].wheelmo;
281  }
282  }
283 
284  // delete flares
285  for (size_t i = 0; i < this->flares.size(); i++)
286  {
287  if (flares[i].snode)
288  {
289  flares[i].snode->removeAndDestroyAllChildren();
290  gEnv->sceneManager->destroySceneNode(flares[i].snode);
291  }
292  if (flares[i].bbs)
293  gEnv->sceneManager->destroyBillboardSet(flares[i].bbs);
294  if (flares[i].light)
295  gEnv->sceneManager->destroyLight(flares[i].light);
296  }
297  this->flares.clear();
298 
299  // delete exhausts
300  for (std::vector<exhaust_t>::iterator it = exhausts.begin(); it != exhausts.end(); it++)
301  {
302  if (it->smokeNode)
303  {
304  it->smokeNode->removeAndDestroyAllChildren();
305  gEnv->sceneManager->destroySceneNode(it->smokeNode);
306  }
307  if (it->smoker)
308  {
309  it->smoker->removeAllAffectors();
310  it->smoker->removeAllEmitters();
311  gEnv->sceneManager->destroyParticleSystem(it->smoker);
312  }
313  }
314 
315  // delete cparticles
316  for (int i = 0; i < free_cparticle; i++)
317  {
318  if (cparticles[i].snode)
319  {
320  cparticles[i].snode->removeAndDestroyAllChildren();
321  gEnv->sceneManager->destroySceneNode(cparticles[i].snode);
322  }
323  if (cparticles[i].psys)
324  {
325  cparticles[i].psys->removeAllAffectors();
326  cparticles[i].psys->removeAllEmitters();
327  gEnv->sceneManager->destroyParticleSystem(cparticles[i].psys);
328  }
329  }
330 
331  // delete beams
332  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
333  {
334  if (beams[i].mSceneNode)
335  {
336  beams[i].mSceneNode->removeAndDestroyAllChildren();
337  gEnv->sceneManager->destroySceneNode(beams[i].mSceneNode);
338  }
339  }
340 
341  // delete Rails
342  for (std::vector<RailGroup*>::iterator it = mRailGroups.begin(); it != mRailGroups.end(); it++)
343  {
344  // signal to the Rail that
345  (*it)->cleanUp();
346  delete (*it);
347  }
348 
349  if (netMT)
350  {
351  netMT->setVisible(false);
352  delete netMT;
353  netMT = 0;
354  }
355 
356  if (intraPointCD)
357  delete intraPointCD;
358  if (interPointCD)
359  delete interPointCD;
360 
361  if (cmdInertia)
362  delete cmdInertia;
363  if (hydroInertia)
364  delete hydroInertia;
365  if (rotaInertia)
366  delete rotaInertia;
367 
368  for (int i = 0; i < free_axle; ++i)
369  {
370  if (axles[i] != nullptr)
371  delete (axles[i]);
372  }
373 }
374 
375 // This method scales trucks. Stresses should *NOT* be scaled, they describe
376 // the material type and they do not depend on length or scale.
377 void Beam::scaleTruck(float value)
378 {
379  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_ScaleTruck);
380 
381  if (value < 0)
382  return;
383  currentScale *= value;
384  // scale beams
385  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
386  {
387  //beams[i].k *= value;
388  beams[i].d *= value;
389  beams[i].L *= value;
390  beams[i].refL *= value;
391  beams[i].Lhydro *= value;
392  beams[i].hydroRatio *= value;
393 
394  beams[i].diameter *= value;
395  }
396  // scale nodes
397  Vector3 refpos = nodes[0].AbsPosition;
398  Vector3 relpos = nodes[0].RelPosition;
399  for (int i = 1; i < free_node; i++)
400  {
401  nodes[i].initial_pos = refpos + (nodes[i].initial_pos - refpos) * value;
402  nodes[i].AbsPosition = refpos + (nodes[i].AbsPosition - refpos) * value;
403  nodes[i].RelPosition = relpos + (nodes[i].RelPosition - relpos) * value;
404  nodes[i].Velocity *= value;
405  nodes[i].Forces *= value;
406  nodes[i].mass *= value;
407  }
408  updateSlideNodePositions();
409 
410  // props and stuff
411  // TOFIX: care about prop positions as well!
412  for (int i = 0; i < free_prop; i++)
413  {
414  if (props[i].scene_node)
415  props[i].scene_node->scale(value, value, value);
416 
417  if (props[i].wheel)
418  props[i].wheel->scale(value, value, value);
419 
420  if (props[i].wheel)
421  props[i].wheelpos = relpos + (props[i].wheelpos - relpos) * value;
422 
423  if (props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0])
424  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->scale(value, value, value);
425 
426  if (props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[1])
427  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[1]->scale(value, value, value);
428 
429  if (props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[2])
430  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[2]->scale(value, value, value);
431 
432  if (props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[3])
433  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[3]->scale(value, value, value);
434  }
435  // tell the cabmesh that resizing is ok, and they dont need to break ;)
436  if (cabMesh)
437  cabMesh->ScaleFlexObj(value);
438  // update engine values
439  if (engine)
440  {
441  //engine->maxRPM *= value;
442  //engine->iddleRPM *= value;
443  //engine->engineTorque *= value;
444  //engine->stallRPM *= value;
445  //engine->brakingTorque *= value;
446  }
447  // todo: scale flexbody
448  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
449  {
450  flexbodies[i]->getSceneNode()->scale(value, value, value);
451  }
452  // todo: fix meshwheels
453  //for (int i=0;i<free_wheel;i++)
454  //{
455  //if (vwheels[i].cnode) vwheels[i].cnode->scale(value, value, value);
456  //if (vwheels[i].fm && vwheels[i].cnode) vwheels[i].cnode->scale(value, value, value);
457  //}
458  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_ScaleTruck);
459 }
460 
461 void Beam::initSimpleSkeleton()
462 {
463  simpleSkeletonManualObject = gEnv->sceneManager->createManualObject();
464 
465  simpleSkeletonManualObject->estimateIndexCount(free_beam * 2);
466  simpleSkeletonManualObject->setCastShadows(false);
467  simpleSkeletonManualObject->setDynamic(true);
468  simpleSkeletonManualObject->setRenderingDistance(300);
469  simpleSkeletonManualObject->begin("vehicle-skeletonview-material", RenderOperation::OT_LINE_LIST);
470  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
471  {
472  simpleSkeletonManualObject->position(beams[i].p1->AbsPosition);
473  simpleSkeletonManualObject->colour(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
474  simpleSkeletonManualObject->position(beams[i].p2->AbsPosition);
475  simpleSkeletonManualObject->colour(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
476  }
477  simpleSkeletonManualObject->end();
478  simpleSkeletonNode->attachObject(simpleSkeletonManualObject);
479  simpleSkeletonInitiated = true;
480 }
481 
482 void Beam::updateSimpleSkeleton()
483 {
484  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_UpdateSkeleton);
485 
486  ColourValue color;
487 
488  if (!simpleSkeletonInitiated)
489  initSimpleSkeleton();
490 
491  simpleSkeletonManualObject->beginUpdate(0);
492  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
493  {
494  float stress_ratio = beams[i].stress / beams[i].minmaxposnegstress;
495  float color_scale = std::abs(stress_ratio);
496  color_scale = std::min(color_scale, 1.0f);
497 
498  if (stress_ratio <= 0)
499  color = ColourValue(0.2f, 1.0f - color_scale, color_scale, 0.8f);
500  else
501  color = ColourValue(color_scale, 1.0f - color_scale, 0.2f, 0.8f);
502 
503  simpleSkeletonManualObject->position(beams[i].p1->AbsPosition);
504  simpleSkeletonManualObject->colour(color);
505 
506  // remove broken beams
507  if (beams[i].broken || beams[i].disabled)
508  simpleSkeletonManualObject->position(beams[i].p1->AbsPosition);
509  else
510  simpleSkeletonManualObject->position(beams[i].p2->AbsPosition);
511 
512  simpleSkeletonManualObject->colour(color);
513  }
514  simpleSkeletonManualObject->end();
515 
516  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_UpdateSkeleton);
517 }
518 
519 void Beam::moveOrigin(Vector3 offset)
520 {
521  origin += offset;
522  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
523  {
524  nodes[i].RelPosition -= offset;
525  }
526 }
527 
528 float Beam::getRotation()
529 {
530  Vector3 cur_dir = getDirection();
531 
532  return atan2(cur_dir.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_X), cur_dir.dotProduct(-Vector3::UNIT_Z));
533 }
534 
535 Vector3 Beam::getDirection()
536 {
537  Vector3 cur_dir = nodes[0].AbsPosition;
538  if (cameranodepos[0] != cameranodedir[0] && this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0]) && this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodedir[0]))
539  {
540  cur_dir = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition;
541  }
542  else if (free_node > 1)
543  {
544  float max_dist = 0.0f;
545  int furthest_node = 1;
546  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
547  {
548  float dist = nodes[i].RelPosition.squaredDistance(nodes[0].RelPosition);
549  if (dist > max_dist)
550  {
551  max_dist = dist;
552  furthest_node = i;
553  }
554  }
555  cur_dir = nodes[0].RelPosition - nodes[furthest_node].RelPosition;
556  }
557 
558  cur_dir.normalise();
559 
560  return cur_dir;
561 }
562 
563 Vector3 Beam::getPosition()
564 {
565  return position; //the position is already in absolute position
566 }
567 
568 void Beam::CreateSimpleSkeletonMaterial()
569 {
570  if (MaterialManager::getSingleton().resourceExists("vehicle-skeletonview-material"))
571  {
572  return;
573  }
574 
575  MaterialPtr mat = (MaterialPtr)(MaterialManager::getSingleton().create("vehicle-skeletonview-material", ResourceGroupManager::DEFAULT_RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME));
576 
577  mat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->createTextureUnitState();
578  mat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureFiltering(TFO_ANISOTROPIC);
579  mat->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureAnisotropy(3);
580  mat->setLightingEnabled(false);
581  mat->setReceiveShadows(false);
582 }
583 
584 void Beam::pushNetwork(char* data, int size)
585 {
586  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_pushNetwork);
587  if (!oob3)
588  return;
589 
590  // check if the size of the data matches to what we expected
591  if ((unsigned int)size == (netbuffersize + sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState)))
592  {
593  // we walk through the incoming data and separate it a bit
594  char* ptr = data;
595 
596  // put the RoRnet::TruckState in front, describes truck basics, engine state, flares, etc
597  memcpy((char*)oob3, ptr, sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState));
598  ptr += sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState);
599 
600  // then copy the node data
601  memcpy((char*)netb3, ptr, nodebuffersize);
602  ptr += nodebuffersize;
603 
604  // then take care of the wheel speeds
605  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
606  {
607  float wspeed = *(float*)(ptr);
608  wheels[i].rp3 = wspeed;
609 
610  ptr += sizeof(float);
611  }
612  }
613  else
614  {
615  // TODO: show the user the problem in the GUI
616  LOG("WRONG network size: we expected " + TOSTRING(netbuffersize+sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState)) + " but got " + TOSTRING(size) + " for vehicle " + String(truckname));
617  state = INVALID;
618  return;
619  }
620 
621  // and the buffer switching to have linear smoothing
622  RoRnet::TruckState* ot;
623  ot = oob1;
624  oob1 = oob2;
625  oob2 = oob3;
626  oob3 = ot;
627 
628  char* ft;
629  ft = netb1;
630  netb1 = netb2;
631  netb2 = netb3;
632  netb3 = ft;
633 
634  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
635  {
636  float rp;
637  rp = wheels[i].rp1;
638  wheels[i].rp1 = wheels[i].rp2;
639  wheels[i].rp2 = wheels[i].rp3;
640  wheels[i].rp3 = rp;
641  }
642  netcounter++;
643 
644  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_pushNetwork);
645 }
646 
647 void Beam::calcNetwork()
648 {
649  using namespace RoRnet;
650 
651  if (netcounter < 1)
652  return;
653 
654  if (netcounter == 1)
655  {
656  memcpy((char*)oob1, oob2, sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState));
657  }
658 
659  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_calcNetwork);
660 
661  // we must update Nodes positions from available network informations
662  int tnow = netTimer.getMilliseconds();
663  // adjust offset to match remote time
664  int rnow = tnow + net_toffset;
665  // if we receive older data from the future, we must correct the offset
666  if (oob1->time > rnow)
667  {
668  net_toffset = oob1->time - tnow;
669  rnow = tnow + net_toffset;
670  }
671  //if we receive last data from the past, we must correct the offset
672  if (oob2->time < rnow)
673  {
674  net_toffset = oob2->time - tnow;
675  rnow = tnow + net_toffset;
676  }
677  float tratio = (float)(rnow - oob1->time) / (float)(oob2->time - oob1->time);
678 
679  short* sp1 = (short*)(netb1 + sizeof(float) * 3);
680  short* sp2 = (short*)(netb2 + sizeof(float) * 3);
681  Vector3 p1ref = Vector3::ZERO;
682  Vector3 p2ref = Vector3::ZERO;
683  Vector3 apos = Vector3::ZERO;
684  Vector3 p1 = Vector3::ZERO;
685  Vector3 p2 = Vector3::ZERO;
686 
687  for (int i = 0; i < first_wheel_node; i++)
688  {
689  if (i == 0)
690  {
691  // first node is uncompressed
692  p1.x = ((float*)netb1)[0];
693  p1.y = ((float*)netb1)[1];
694  p1.z = ((float*)netb1)[2];
695  p1ref = p1;
696 
697  p2.x = ((float*)netb2)[0];
698  p2.y = ((float*)netb2)[1];
699  p2.z = ((float*)netb2)[2];
700  p2ref = p2;
701  }
702  else
703  {
704  // all other nodes are compressed:
705  // short int compared to previous node
706  p1.x = (float)(sp1[(i - 1) * 3 + 0]) / 300.0f;
707  p1.y = (float)(sp1[(i - 1) * 3 + 1]) / 300.0f;
708  p1.z = (float)(sp1[(i - 1) * 3 + 2]) / 300.0f;
709  p1 = p1 + p1ref;
710 
711  p2.x = (float)(sp2[(i - 1) * 3 + 0]) / 300.0f;
712  p2.y = (float)(sp2[(i - 1) * 3 + 1]) / 300.0f;
713  p2.z = (float)(sp2[(i - 1) * 3 + 2]) / 300.0f;
714  p2 = p2 + p2ref;
715  }
716 
717  // linear interpolation
718  nodes[i].AbsPosition = p1 + tratio * (p2 - p1);
719  nodes[i].RelPosition = nodes[i].AbsPosition - origin;
720 
721  apos += nodes[i].AbsPosition;
722  }
723  position = apos / first_wheel_node;
724 
725  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
726  {
727  float rp = wheels[i].rp1 + tratio * (wheels[i].rp2 - wheels[i].rp1);
728  //compute ideal positions
729  Vector3 axis = wheels[i].refnode1->RelPosition - wheels[i].refnode0->RelPosition;
730  axis.normalise();
731  Plane pplan = Plane(axis, wheels[i].refnode0->AbsPosition);
732  Vector3 ortho = -pplan.projectVector(wheels[i].near_attach->AbsPosition) - wheels[i].refnode0->AbsPosition;
733  Vector3 ray = ortho.crossProduct(axis);
734  ray.normalise();
735  ray *= wheels[i].radius;
736  float drp = Math::TWO_PI / (wheels[i].nbnodes / 2);
737  for (int j = 0; j < wheels[i].nbnodes / 2; j++)
738  {
739  Vector3 uray = Quaternion(Radian(rp - drp * j), axis) * ray;
740 
741  wheels[i].nodes[j * 2 + 0]->AbsPosition = wheels[i].refnode0->AbsPosition + uray;
742  wheels[i].nodes[j * 2 + 0]->RelPosition = wheels[i].nodes[j * 2]->AbsPosition - origin;
743 
744  wheels[i].nodes[j * 2 + 1]->AbsPosition = wheels[i].refnode1->AbsPosition + uray;
745  wheels[i].nodes[j * 2 + 1]->RelPosition = wheels[i].nodes[j * 2 + 1]->AbsPosition - origin;
746  }
747  }
748 
749  float engspeed = oob1->engine_speed + tratio * (oob2->engine_speed - oob1->engine_speed);
750  float engforce = oob1->engine_force + tratio * (oob2->engine_force - oob1->engine_force);
751  float engclutch = oob1->engine_clutch + tratio * (oob2->engine_clutch - oob1->engine_clutch);
752  float netwspeed = oob1->wheelspeed + tratio * (oob2->wheelspeed - oob1->wheelspeed);
753  float netbrake = oob1->brake + tratio * (oob2->brake - oob1->brake);
754 
755  hydrodirwheeldisplay = oob1->hydrodirstate;
756  WheelSpeed = netwspeed;
757 
758  int gear = oob1->engine_gear;
759  unsigned int flagmask = oob1->flagmask;
760 
761 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
762  if (engine)
763  {
764  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().modulate(trucknum, SS_MOD_ENGINE, engspeed);
765  }
766  if (free_aeroengine > 0)
767  {
768  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().modulate(trucknum, SS_MOD_AEROENGINE1, engspeed);
769  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().modulate(trucknum, SS_MOD_AEROENGINE2, engspeed);
770  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().modulate(trucknum, SS_MOD_AEROENGINE3, engspeed);
771  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().modulate(trucknum, SS_MOD_AEROENGINE4, engspeed);
772  }
773 #endif //OPENAL
774 
775  brake = netbrake;
776 
777  if (engine)
778  {
779  int automode = -1;
780  if ((flagmask & NETMASK_ENGINE_MODE_AUTOMATIC) != 0) { automode = App::SIM_GEARBOX_AUTO; }
781  else if ((flagmask & NETMASK_ENGINE_MODE_SEMIAUTO) != 0) { automode = App::SIM_GEARBOX_SEMI_AUTO; }
782  else if ((flagmask & NETMASK_ENGINE_MODE_MANUAL) != 0) { automode = App::SIM_GEARBOX_MANUAL; }
783  else if ((flagmask & NETMASK_ENGINE_MODE_MANUAL_STICK) != 0) { automode = App::SIM_GEARBOX_MANUAL_STICK; }
784  else
785  if ((flagmask & NETMASK_ENGINE_MODE_MANUAL_RANGES) != 0) { automode = App::SIM_GEARBOX_MANUAL_RANGES; }
786 
787  bool contact = ((flagmask & NETMASK_ENGINE_CONT) != 0);
788  bool running = ((flagmask & NETMASK_ENGINE_RUN) != 0);
789 
790  engine->netForceSettings(engspeed, engforce, engclutch, gear, running, contact, automode);
791  }
792 
793  // set particle cannon
794  if (((flagmask & NETMASK_PARTICLE) != 0) != cparticle_mode)
795  toggleCustomParticles();
796 
797  // set lights
798  if (((flagmask & NETMASK_LIGHTS) != 0) != lights)
799  lightsToggle();
800  if (((flagmask & NETMASK_BEACONS) != 0) != m_beacon_light_is_active)
801  beaconsToggle();
802 
803  antilockbrake = flagmask & NETMASK_ALB_ACTIVE;
804  tractioncontrol = flagmask & NETMASK_TC_ACTIVE;
805  parkingbrake = flagmask & NETMASK_PBRAKE;
806 
807  blinktype btype = BLINK_NONE;
808  if ((flagmask & NETMASK_BLINK_LEFT) != 0)
809  btype = BLINK_LEFT;
810  else if ((flagmask & NETMASK_BLINK_RIGHT) != 0)
811  btype = BLINK_RIGHT;
812  else if ((flagmask & NETMASK_BLINK_WARN) != 0)
813  btype = BLINK_WARN;
814  setBlinkType(btype);
815 
816  setCustomLightVisible(0, ((flagmask & NETMASK_CLIGHT1) > 0));
817  setCustomLightVisible(1, ((flagmask & NETMASK_CLIGHT2) > 0));
818  setCustomLightVisible(2, ((flagmask & NETMASK_CLIGHT3) > 0));
819  setCustomLightVisible(3, ((flagmask & NETMASK_CLIGHT4) > 0));
820 
821  netBrakeLight = ((flagmask & NETMASK_BRAKES) != 0);
822  netReverseLight = ((flagmask & NETMASK_REVERSE) != 0);
823 
824 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
825  if ((flagmask & NETMASK_HORN))
826  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigStart(trucknum, SS_TRIG_HORN);
827  else
828  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigStop(trucknum, SS_TRIG_HORN);
829 
830  if (netReverseLight)
831  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigStart(trucknum, SS_TRIG_REVERSE_GEAR);
832  else
833  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigStop(trucknum, SS_TRIG_REVERSE_GEAR);
834 #endif //OPENAL
835 
836  updateDashBoards(tratio);
837 
838  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_calcNetwork);
839 }
840 
841 bool Beam::addPressure(float v)
842 {
843  if (!free_pressure_beam)
844  return false;
845 
846  float newpressure = std::max(0.0f, std::min(refpressure + v, 100.0f));
847 
848  if (newpressure == refpressure)
849  return false;
850 
851  refpressure = newpressure;
852  for (int i = 0; i < free_pressure_beam; i++)
853  {
854  beams[pressure_beams[i]].k = 10000 + refpressure * 10000;
855  }
856  return true;
857 }
858 
859 float Beam::getPressure()
860 {
861  if (free_pressure_beam)
862  return refpressure;
863  return 0;
864 }
865 
866 void Beam::calc_masses2(Real total, bool reCalc)
867 {
868  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_calc_masses2);
869 
870  bool debugMass = App::GetDiagTruckMass();
871 
872  //reset
873  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
874  {
875  if (!nodes[i].iswheel)
876  {
877  if (!nodes[i].loadedMass)
878  {
879  nodes[i].mass = 0;
880  }
881  else if (!nodes[i].overrideMass)
882  {
883  nodes[i].mass = loadmass / (float)masscount;
884  }
885  }
886  }
887  //average linear density
888  Real len = 0.0f;
889  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
890  {
891  if (beams[i].type != BEAM_VIRTUAL)
892  {
893  Real half_newlen = beams[i].L / 2.0;
894  if (!(beams[i].p1->iswheel))
895  len += half_newlen;
896  if (!(beams[i].p2->iswheel))
897  len += half_newlen;
898  }
899  }
900 
901  if (!reCalc)
902  {
903  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
904  {
905  if (beams[i].type != BEAM_VIRTUAL)
906  {
907  Real half_mass = beams[i].L * total / len / 2.0f;
908  if (!(beams[i].p1->iswheel))
909  beams[i].p1->mass += half_mass;
910  if (!(beams[i].p2->iswheel))
911  beams[i].p2->mass += half_mass;
912  }
913  }
914  }
915  //fix rope masses
916  for (std::vector<rope_t>::iterator it = ropes.begin(); it != ropes.end(); it++)
917  {
918  it->beam->p2->mass = 100.0f;
919  }
920 
921  // Apply pre-defined cinecam node mass
922  for (int i = 0; i < this->freecinecamera; ++i)
923  {
924  // TODO: this expects all cinecams to be defined in root module (i.e. outside 'section/end_section')
925  nodes[cinecameranodepos[i]].mass = m_definition->root_module->cinecam[i].node_mass;
926  }
927 
928 
929  //hooks must be heavy
930  //for (std::vector<hook_t>::iterator it=hooks.begin(); it!=hooks.end(); it++)
931  // if (!it->hookNode->overrideMass)
932  // it->hookNode->mass = 500.0f;
933 
934  //update mass
935  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
936  {
937  //LOG("Nodemass "+TOSTRING(i)+"-"+TOSTRING(nodes[i].mass));
938  //for stability
939  if (!nodes[i].iswheel && nodes[i].mass < minimass)
940  {
941  if (debugMass)
942  LOG("Node " + TOSTRING(i) +" mass ("+TOSTRING(nodes[i].mass)+"kg) too light. Resetting to minimass ("+ TOSTRING(minimass) +"kg).");
943  nodes[i].mass = minimass;
944  }
945  }
946 
947  totalmass = 0;
948  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
949  {
950  if (debugMass)
951  {
952  String msg = "Node " + TOSTRING(i) + " : " + TOSTRING((int)nodes[i].mass) + " kg";
953  if (nodes[i].loadedMass)
954  {
955  if (nodes[i].overrideMass)
956  msg += " (overriden by node mass)";
957  else
958  msg += " (normal load node: " + TOSTRING(loadmass) + " kg / " + TOSTRING(masscount) + " nodes)";
959  }
960  LOG(msg);
961  }
962  totalmass += nodes[i].mass;
963  }
964  LOG("TOTAL VEHICLE MASS: " + TOSTRING((int)totalmass) +" kg");
965 
966  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_calc_masses2);
967 }
968 
969 // this recalculates the masses (useful when the gravity was changed...)
970 void Beam::recalc_masses()
971 {
972  this->calc_masses2(totalmass, true);
973 }
974 
975 float Beam::getTotalMass(bool withLocked)
976 {
977  if (!withLocked)
978  return totalmass; // already computed in calc_masses2
979 
980  float mass = totalmass;
981 
982  for (std::list<Beam*>::iterator it = linkedBeams.begin(); it != linkedBeams.end(); ++it)
983  {
984  mass += (*it)->totalmass;
985  }
986 
987  return mass;
988 }
989 
990 void Beam::determineLinkedBeams()
991 {
992  linkedBeams.clear();
993 
994  bool found = true;
995  std::map<Beam*, bool> lookup_table;
996  std::pair<std::map<Beam*, bool>::iterator, bool> ret;
997 
998  lookup_table.insert(std::pair<Beam*, bool>(this, false));
999 
1000  auto interTruckLinks = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->interTruckLinks;
1001 
1002  while (found)
1003  {
1004  found = false;
1005 
1006  for (std::map<Beam*, bool>::iterator it_beam = lookup_table.begin(); it_beam != lookup_table.end(); ++it_beam)
1007  {
1008  if (!it_beam->second)
1009  {
1010  auto truck = it_beam->first;
1011  for (auto it = interTruckLinks.begin(); it != interTruckLinks.end(); it++)
1012  {
1013  auto truck_pair = it->second;
1014  if (truck == truck_pair.first || truck == truck_pair.second)
1015  {
1016  auto other_truck = (truck != truck_pair.first) ? truck_pair.first : truck_pair.second;
1017  ret = lookup_table.insert(std::pair<Beam*, bool>(other_truck, false));
1018  if (ret.second)
1019  {
1020  linkedBeams.push_back(other_truck);
1021  found = true;
1022  }
1023  }
1024  }
1025  it_beam->second = true;
1026  }
1027  }
1028  }
1029 }
1030 
1031 int Beam::getWheelNodeCount()
1032 {
1033  return wheel_node_count;
1034 }
1035 
1036 void Beam::calcNodeConnectivityGraph()
1037 {
1038  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_calcNodeConnectivityGraph);
1039  int i;
1040 
1041  nodetonodeconnections.resize(free_node, std::vector<int>());
1042  nodebeamconnections.resize(free_node, std::vector<int>());
1043 
1044  for (i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
1045  {
1046  if (beams[i].p1 != NULL && beams[i].p2 != NULL && beams[i].p1->pos >= 0 && beams[i].p2->pos >= 0)
1047  {
1048  nodetonodeconnections[beams[i].p1->pos].push_back(beams[i].p2->pos);
1049  nodebeamconnections[beams[i].p1->pos].push_back(i);
1050  nodetonodeconnections[beams[i].p2->pos].push_back(beams[i].p1->pos);
1051  nodebeamconnections[beams[i].p2->pos].push_back(i);
1052  }
1053  }
1054  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_calcNodeConnectivityGraph);
1055 }
1056 
1057 Vector3 Beam::calculateCollisionOffset(Vector3 direction)
1058 {
1059  if (direction == Vector3::ZERO)
1060  return Vector3::ZERO;
1061 
1062  AxisAlignedBox bb = boundingBox;
1063  bb.merge(boundingBox.getMinimum() + direction);
1064  bb.merge(boundingBox.getMaximum() + direction);
1065 
1066  Real max_distance = direction.length();
1067  direction.normalise();
1068 
1069  Beam** trucks = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getTrucks();
1070  int trucksnum = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getTruckCount();
1071 
1072  if (intraPointCD)
1073  intraPointCD->update(this, true);
1074  if (interPointCD)
1075  interPointCD->update(this, trucks, trucksnum, true);
1076 
1077  // collision displacement
1078  Vector3 collision_offset = Vector3::ZERO;
1079 
1080  for (int t = 0; t < trucksnum; t++)
1081  {
1082  if (!trucks[t])
1083  continue;
1084  if (t == trucknum)
1085  continue;
1086  if (!bb.intersects(trucks[t]->boundingBox))
1087  continue;
1088 
1089  // Test own contacters against others cabs
1090  if (intraPointCD)
1091  {
1092  for (int i = 0; i < trucks[t]->free_collcab; i++)
1093  {
1094  if (collision_offset.length() >= max_distance)
1095  break;
1096  Vector3 offset = collision_offset;
1097  while (offset.length() < max_distance)
1098  {
1099  int tmpv = trucks[t]->collcabs[i] * 3;
1100  node_t* no = &trucks[t]->nodes[cabs[tmpv]];
1101  node_t* na = &trucks[t]->nodes[cabs[tmpv + 1]];
1102  node_t* nb = &trucks[t]->nodes[cabs[tmpv + 2]];
1103 
1104  intraPointCD->query(no->AbsPosition + offset,
1105  na->AbsPosition + offset,
1106  nb->AbsPosition + offset,
1107  collrange);
1108 
1109  if (intraPointCD->hit_count == 0)
1110  {
1111  collision_offset = offset;
1112  break;
1113  }
1114  offset += direction * 0.01f;
1115  }
1116  }
1117  }
1118 
1119  float proximity = 0.05f;
1120  proximity = std::max(proximity, boundingBox.getSize().length() / 50.0f);
1121  proximity = std::max(proximity, trucks[t]->boundingBox.getSize().length() / 50.0f);
1122 
1123  // Test proximity of own nodes against others nodes
1124  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1125  {
1126  if (nodes[i].contactless)
1127  continue;
1128  if (collision_offset.length() >= max_distance)
1129  break;
1130  Vector3 offset = collision_offset;
1131  while (offset.length() < max_distance)
1132  {
1133  Vector3 query_position = nodes[i].AbsPosition + offset;
1134 
1135  bool node_proximity = false;
1136 
1137  for (int j = 0; j < trucks[t]->free_node; j++)
1138  {
1139  if (trucks[t]->nodes[j].contactless)
1140  continue;
1141  if (query_position.squaredDistance(trucks[t]->nodes[j].AbsPosition) < proximity)
1142  {
1143  node_proximity = true;
1144  break;
1145  }
1146  }
1147 
1148  if (!node_proximity)
1149  {
1150  collision_offset = offset;
1151  break;
1152  }
1153  offset += direction * 0.01f;
1154  }
1155  }
1156  }
1157 
1158  // Test own cabs against others contacters
1159  if (interPointCD)
1160  {
1161  for (int i = 0; i < free_collcab; i++)
1162  {
1163  if (collision_offset.length() >= max_distance)
1164  break;
1165  Vector3 offset = collision_offset;
1166  while (offset.length() < max_distance)
1167  {
1168  int tmpv = collcabs[i] * 3;
1169  node_t* no = &nodes[cabs[tmpv]];
1170  node_t* na = &nodes[cabs[tmpv + 1]];
1171  node_t* nb = &nodes[cabs[tmpv + 2]];
1172 
1173  interPointCD->query(no->AbsPosition + offset,
1174  na->AbsPosition + offset,
1175  nb->AbsPosition + offset,
1176  collrange);
1177 
1178  if (interPointCD->hit_count == 0)
1179  {
1180  collision_offset = offset;
1181  break;
1182  }
1183  offset += direction * 0.01f;
1184  }
1185  }
1186  }
1187 
1188  return collision_offset;
1189 }
1190 
1191 void Beam::resolveCollisions(Vector3 direction)
1192 {
1193  Vector3 offset = calculateCollisionOffset(direction);
1194 
1195  if (offset == Vector3::ZERO)
1196  return;
1197 
1198  // Additional 20 cm safe-guard (horizontally)
1199  Vector3 dir = Vector3(offset.x, 0.0f, offset.z).normalisedCopy();
1200  offset += 0.2f * dir;
1201 
1202  resetPosition(nodes[0].AbsPosition.x + offset.x, nodes[0].AbsPosition.z + offset.z, true, nodes[lowestcontactingnode].AbsPosition.y + offset.y);
1203 }
1204 
1205 void Beam::resolveCollisions(float max_distance, bool consider_up)
1206 {
1207  Vector3 offset = Vector3::ZERO;
1208 
1209  Vector3 f = max_distance * getDirection();
1210  Vector3 l = max_distance * Vector3(-sin(getRotation() + Math::HALF_PI), 0.0f, cos(getRotation() + Math::HALF_PI));
1211  Vector3 u = max_distance * Vector3::UNIT_Y;
1212 
1213  // Calculate an ideal collision avoidance direction (prefer left over right over [front / back / up])
1214 
1215  Vector3 front = calculateCollisionOffset(+f);
1216  Vector3 back = calculateCollisionOffset(-f);
1217  Vector3 left = calculateCollisionOffset(+l);
1218  Vector3 right = calculateCollisionOffset(-l);
1219 
1220  offset = front.length() < back.length() * 1.2f ? front : back;
1221 
1222  Vector3 side = left.length() < right.length() * 1.1f ? left : right;
1223  if (side.length() < offset.length() + minCameraRadius / 2.0f)
1224  offset = side;
1225 
1226  if (consider_up)
1227  {
1228  Vector3 up = calculateCollisionOffset(+u);
1229  if (up.length() < offset.length())
1230  offset = up;
1231  }
1232 
1233  if (offset == Vector3::ZERO)
1234  return;
1235 
1236  // Additional 20 cm safe-guard (horizontally)
1237  Vector3 dir = Vector3(offset.x, 0.0f, offset.z).normalisedCopy();
1238  offset += 0.2f * dir;
1239 
1240  resetPosition(nodes[0].AbsPosition.x + offset.x, nodes[0].AbsPosition.z + offset.z, true, nodes[lowestcontactingnode].AbsPosition.y + offset.y);
1241 }
1242 
1243 int Beam::savePosition(int indexPosition)
1244 {
1245  if (!posStorage)
1246  return -1;
1247  Vector3* nbuff = posStorage->getStorage(indexPosition);
1248  if (!nbuff)
1249  return -3;
1250  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1251  nbuff[i] = nodes[i].AbsPosition;
1252  posStorage->setUsage(indexPosition, true);
1253  return 0;
1254 }
1255 
1256 int Beam::loadPosition(int indexPosition)
1257 {
1258  if (!posStorage)
1259  return -1;
1260  if (!posStorage->getUsage(indexPosition))
1261  return -2;
1262 
1263  Vector3* nbuff = posStorage->getStorage(indexPosition);
1264  if (!nbuff)
1265  return -3;
1266  Vector3 pos = Vector3(0, 0, 0);
1267  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1268  {
1269  nodes[i].AbsPosition = nbuff[i];
1270  nodes[i].RelPosition = nbuff[i] - origin;
1271 
1272  // reset forces
1273  nodes[i].Velocity = Vector3::ZERO;
1274  nodes[i].Forces = Vector3::ZERO;
1275 
1276  pos = pos + nbuff[i];
1277  }
1278  position = pos / (float)(free_node);
1279 
1280  resetSlideNodes();
1281 
1282  return 0;
1283 }
1284 
1285 void Beam::calculateAveragePosition()
1286 {
1287  // calculate average position
1288  if (m_custom_camera_node >= 0)
1289  {
1290  position = nodes[m_custom_camera_node].AbsPosition;
1291  }
1292  else if (externalcameramode == 1 && freecinecamera > 0)
1293  {
1294  // the new (strange) approach: reuse the cinecam node
1295  position = nodes[cinecameranodepos[0]].AbsPosition;
1296  }
1297  else if (externalcameramode == 2 && externalcameranode >= 0)
1298  {
1299  // the new (strange) approach #2: reuse a specified node
1300  position = nodes[externalcameranode].AbsPosition;
1301  }
1302  else
1303  {
1304  // the classic approach: average over all nodes and beams
1305  Vector3 aposition = Vector3::ZERO;
1306  for (int n = 0; n < free_node; n++)
1307  {
1308  aposition += nodes[n].AbsPosition;
1309  }
1310  position = aposition / free_node;
1311  }
1312 }
1313 
1314 void Beam::updateBoundingBox()
1315 {
1316  boundingBox = AxisAlignedBox(nodes[0].AbsPosition, nodes[0].AbsPosition);
1317  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1318  {
1319  boundingBox.merge(nodes[i].AbsPosition);
1320  }
1321  boundingBox.setMinimum(boundingBox.getMinimum() - Vector3(0.05f, 0.05f, 0.05f));
1322  boundingBox.setMaximum(boundingBox.getMaximum() + Vector3(0.05f, 0.05f, 0.05f));
1323 }
1324 
1325 void Beam::preUpdatePhysics(float dt)
1326 {
1327  lastposition = position;
1328 
1329  if (nodes[0].RelPosition.squaredLength() > 10000.0)
1330  {
1331  moveOrigin(nodes[0].RelPosition);
1332  }
1333 }
1334 
1335 void Beam::postUpdatePhysics(float dt)
1336 {
1337  calculateAveragePosition();
1338 
1339  // Calculate average truck velocity
1340  velocity = (position - lastposition) / dt;
1341 }
1342 
1343 void Beam::resetAngle(float rot)
1344 {
1345  // Set origin of rotation to camera node
1346  Vector3 origin = nodes[0].AbsPosition;
1347 
1348  if (this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0]))
1349  {
1350  origin = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].AbsPosition;
1351  }
1352 
1353  // Set up matrix for yaw rotation
1354  Matrix3 matrix;
1355  matrix.FromEulerAnglesXYZ(Radian(0), Radian(-rot + m_spawn_rotation), Radian(0));
1356 
1357  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1358  {
1359  // Move node back to origin, apply rotation matrix, and move node back
1360  nodes[i].AbsPosition -= origin;
1361  nodes[i].AbsPosition = matrix * nodes[i].AbsPosition;
1362  nodes[i].AbsPosition += origin;
1363  nodes[i].RelPosition = nodes[i].AbsPosition - this->origin;
1364  }
1365 
1366  resetSlideNodePositions();
1367 
1368  updateBoundingBox();
1369  calculateAveragePosition();
1370 }
1371 
1372 void Beam::resetPosition(float px, float pz, bool setInitPosition, float miny)
1373 {
1374  // horizontal displacement
1375  Vector3 offset = Vector3(px, nodes[0].AbsPosition.y, pz) - nodes[0].AbsPosition;
1376  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1377  {
1378  nodes[i].AbsPosition += offset;
1379  nodes[i].RelPosition = nodes[i].AbsPosition - origin;
1380  }
1381 
1382  // vertical displacement
1383  float vertical_offset = -nodes[lowestcontactingnode].AbsPosition.y + miny;
1384  if (gEnv->terrainManager->getWater())
1385  {
1386  vertical_offset += std::max(0.0f, gEnv->terrainManager->getWater()->getHeight() - (nodes[lowestcontactingnode].AbsPosition.y + vertical_offset));
1387  }
1388  for (int i = 1; i < free_node; i++)
1389  {
1390  if (nodes[i].contactless)
1391  continue;
1392  float terrainHeight = gEnv->terrainManager->getHeightFinder()->getHeightAt(nodes[i].AbsPosition.x, nodes[i].AbsPosition.z);
1393  vertical_offset += std::max(0.0f, terrainHeight - (nodes[i].AbsPosition.y + vertical_offset));
1394  }
1395  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1396  {
1397  nodes[i].AbsPosition.y += vertical_offset;
1398  nodes[i].RelPosition = nodes[i].AbsPosition - origin;
1399  }
1400 
1401  // mesh displacement
1402  float mesh_offset = 0.0f;
1403  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1404  {
1405  if (mesh_offset >= 1.0f)
1406  break;
1407  if (nodes[i].contactless)
1408  continue;
1409  float offset = mesh_offset;
1410  while (offset < 1.0f)
1411  {
1412  Vector3 query = nodes[i].AbsPosition + Vector3(0.0f, offset, 0.0f);
1413  if (!gEnv->collisions->collisionCorrect(&query, false))
1414  {
1415  mesh_offset = offset;
1416  break;
1417  }
1418  offset += 0.001f;
1419  }
1420  }
1421  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1422  {
1423  nodes[i].AbsPosition.y += mesh_offset;
1424  nodes[i].RelPosition = nodes[i].AbsPosition - origin;
1425  }
1426 
1427  resetPosition(Vector3::ZERO, setInitPosition);
1428 }
1429 
1430 void Beam::resetPosition(Vector3 translation, bool setInitPosition)
1431 {
1432  // total displacement
1433  if (translation != Vector3::ZERO)
1434  {
1435  Vector3 offset = translation - nodes[0].AbsPosition;
1436  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1437  {
1438  nodes[i].AbsPosition += offset;
1439  nodes[i].RelPosition = nodes[i].AbsPosition - origin;
1440  }
1441  }
1442 
1443  if (setInitPosition)
1444  {
1445  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1446  {
1447  nodes[i].initial_pos = nodes[i].AbsPosition;
1448  }
1449  }
1450 
1451  updateBoundingBox();
1452  calculateAveragePosition();
1453 
1454  // calculate minimum camera radius
1455  if (minCameraRadius < 0.0f)
1456  {
1457  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1458  {
1459  Real dist = nodes[i].AbsPosition.squaredDistance(position);
1460  if (dist > minCameraRadius)
1461  {
1462  minCameraRadius = dist;
1463  }
1464  }
1465  minCameraRadius = std::sqrt(minCameraRadius) * 1.2f; // twenty percent buffer
1466  }
1467 
1468  resetSlideNodePositions();
1469 }
1470 
1471 void Beam::mouseMove(int node, Vector3 pos, float force)
1472 {
1473  mousenode = node;
1474  mousemoveforce = force;
1475  mousepos = pos;
1476 }
1477 
1478 bool Beam::hasDriverSeat()
1479 {
1480  return driverSeat != 0;
1481 }
1482 
1483 void Beam::calculateDriverPos(Vector3& out_pos, Quaternion& out_rot)
1484 {
1485  assert(this->driverSeat != nullptr);
1486 
1487  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_calculateDriverPos);
1488 
1489  Vector3 x_pos = nodes[driverSeat->nodex].AbsPosition;
1490  Vector3 y_pos = nodes[driverSeat->nodey].AbsPosition;
1491  Vector3 center_pos = nodes[driverSeat->noderef].AbsPosition;
1492 
1493  Vector3 x_vec = x_pos - center_pos;
1494  Vector3 y_vec = y_pos - center_pos;
1495 
1496  Vector3 normal = (y_vec.crossProduct(x_vec)).normalisedCopy();
1497 
1498  // Output position
1499  Vector3 pos = center_pos;
1500  pos += (this->driverSeat->offsetx * x_vec);
1501  pos += (this->driverSeat->offsety * y_vec);
1502  pos += (this->driverSeat->offsetz * normal);
1503  out_pos = pos;
1504 
1505  // Output orientation
1506  Vector3 x_vec_norm = x_vec.normalisedCopy();
1507  Vector3 y_vec_norm = x_vec_norm.crossProduct(normal);
1508  Quaternion rot(x_vec_norm, normal, y_vec_norm);
1509  rot = rot * driverSeat->rot;
1510  rot = rot * Quaternion(Degree(180), Vector3::UNIT_Y); // rotate towards the driving direction
1511  out_rot = rot;
1512 
1513  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_calculateDriverPos);
1514 }
1515 
1516 void Beam::resetAutopilot()
1517 {
1518  autopilot->disconnect();
1519  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_hdg_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/hdg-off");
1520  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_wlv_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/wlv-off");
1521  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_nav_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/nav-off");
1522  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_alt_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/hold-off");
1523  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_vs_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/vs-off");
1524  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_ias_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/athr-off");
1525  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_gpws_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/gpws-on");
1526  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_brks_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/brks-off");
1527  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_hdg_val")->setCaption("000");
1528  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_alt_val")->setCaption("1000");
1529  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_vs_val")->setCaption("000");
1530  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_ias_val")->setCaption("150");
1531 }
1532 
1533 void Beam::disconnectAutopilot()
1534 {
1535  autopilot->disconnect();
1536  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_hdg_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/hdg-off");
1537  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_wlv_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/wlv-off");
1538  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_nav_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/nav-off");
1539  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_alt_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/hold-off");
1540  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_vs_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/vs-off");
1541  OverlayManager::getSingleton().getOverlayElement("tracks/ap_ias_but")->setMaterialName("tracks/athr-off");
1542 }
1543 
1544 void Beam::toggleAxleLock()
1545 {
1546  for (int i = 0; i < free_axle; ++i)
1547  {
1548  if (!axles[i])
1549  continue;
1550  axles[i]->toggleDiff();
1551  }
1552 }
1553 
1554 int Beam::getAxleLockCount()
1555 {
1556  return free_axle;
1557 }
1558 
1559 String Beam::getAxleLockName()
1560 {
1561  if (!axles[0])
1562  return String();
1563  return axles[0]->getDiffTypeName();
1564 }
1565 
1566 void Beam::reset(bool keepPosition)
1567 {
1568  if (keepPosition)
1569  m_reset_request = REQUEST_RESET_ON_SPOT;
1570  else
1571  m_reset_request = REQUEST_RESET_ON_INIT_POS;
1572 }
1573 
1574 void Beam::displace(Vector3 translation, float rotation)
1575 {
1576  if (rotation != 0.0f)
1577  {
1578  Vector3 rotation_center = getRotationCenter();
1579  Quaternion rot = Quaternion(Radian(rotation), Vector3::UNIT_Y);
1580 
1581  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1582  {
1583  nodes[i].AbsPosition -= rotation_center;
1584  nodes[i].AbsPosition = rot * nodes[i].AbsPosition;
1585  nodes[i].AbsPosition += rotation_center;
1586  nodes[i].RelPosition = nodes[i].AbsPosition - origin;
1587  }
1588  }
1589 
1590  if (translation != Vector3::ZERO)
1591  {
1592  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1593  {
1594  nodes[i].AbsPosition += translation;
1595  nodes[i].RelPosition = nodes[i].AbsPosition - origin;
1596  }
1597  }
1598 
1599  if (rotation != 0.0f || translation != Vector3::ZERO)
1600  {
1601  updateBoundingBox();
1602  calculateAveragePosition();
1603  }
1604 }
1605 
1606 Ogre::Vector3 Beam::getRotationCenter()
1607 {
1608  Vector3 rotation_center = Vector3::ZERO;
1609 
1610  if (m_is_cinecam_rotation_center)
1611  {
1612  Vector3 cinecam = nodes[0].AbsPosition;
1613  if (this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0])) // TODO: Check cam. nodes once on spawn! They never change --> no reason to repeat the check. ~only_a_ptr, 06/2017
1614  {
1615  cinecam = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].AbsPosition;
1616  }
1617  rotation_center = cinecam;
1618  }
1619  else
1620  {
1621  Vector3 sum = Vector3::ZERO;
1622  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1623  {
1624  sum += nodes[i].AbsPosition;
1625  }
1626  rotation_center = sum / free_node;
1627  }
1628 
1629  return rotation_center;
1630 }
1631 
1632 void Beam::SyncReset()
1633 {
1634  hydrodirstate = 0.0;
1635  hydroaileronstate = 0.0;
1636  hydrorudderstate = 0.0;
1637  hydroelevatorstate = 0.0;
1638  hydrodirwheeldisplay = 0.0;
1639  if (hydroInertia)
1640  hydroInertia->resetCmdKeyDelay();
1641  parkingbrake = 0;
1642  cc_mode = false;
1643  fusedrag = Vector3::ZERO;
1644  origin = Vector3::ZERO;
1645  float yPos = nodes[lowestcontactingnode].AbsPosition.y;
1646 
1647  Vector3 cur_position = nodes[0].AbsPosition;
1648  float cur_rot = getRotation();
1649  if (engine)
1650  engine->start();
1651  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1652  {
1653  nodes[i].AbsPosition = nodes[i].initial_pos;
1654  nodes[i].RelPosition = nodes[i].initial_pos - origin;
1655  nodes[i].Velocity = Vector3::ZERO;
1656  nodes[i].Forces = Vector3::ZERO;
1657  }
1658 
1659  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
1660  {
1661  beams[i].maxposstress = beams[i].default_beam_deform;
1662  beams[i].maxnegstress = -beams[i].default_beam_deform;
1663  beams[i].minmaxposnegstress = beams[i].default_beam_deform;
1664  beams[i].strength = beams[i].initial_beam_strength;
1665  beams[i].plastic_coef = beams[i].default_beam_plastic_coef;
1666  beams[i].L = beams[i].refL;
1667  beams[i].stress = 0.0;
1668  beams[i].broken = false;
1669  beams[i].disabled = false;
1670  }
1671 
1672  disjoinInterTruckBeams();
1673 
1674  for (std::vector<hook_t>::iterator it = hooks.begin(); it != hooks.end(); it++)
1675  {
1676  it->beam->disabled = true;
1677  it->locked = UNLOCKED;
1678  it->lockNode = 0;
1679  it->lockTruck = 0;
1680  it->beam->p2 = &nodes[0];
1681  it->beam->p2truck = false;
1682  it->beam->L = (nodes[0].AbsPosition - it->hookNode->AbsPosition).length();
1683  removeInterTruckBeam(it->beam);
1684  }
1685  for (std::vector<rope_t>::iterator it = ropes.begin(); it != ropes.end(); it++)
1686  {
1687  it->locked = UNLOCKED;
1688  if (it->lockedto_ropable)
1689  it->lockedto_ropable->in_use = false;
1690  it->lockedto = &nodes[0];
1691  it->lockedtruck = 0;
1692  }
1693  for (std::vector<tie_t>::iterator it = ties.begin(); it != ties.end(); it++)
1694  {
1695  it->tied = false;
1696  it->tying = false;
1697  if (it->lockedto)
1698  it->lockedto->in_use = false;
1699  it->beam->p2 = &nodes[0];
1700  it->beam->p2truck = false;
1701  it->beam->disabled = true;
1702  removeInterTruckBeam(it->beam);
1703  }
1704 
1705  for (int i = 0; i < free_aeroengine; i++)
1706  aeroengines[i]->reset();
1707  for (int i = 0; i < free_screwprop; i++)
1708  screwprops[i]->reset();
1709  for (int i = 0; i < free_rotator; i++)
1710  rotators[i].angle = 0.0;
1711  for (int i = 0; i < free_wing; i++)
1712  wings[i].fa->broken = false;
1713  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
1714  {
1715  wheels[i].speed = 0.0;
1716  wheels[i].detached = false;
1717  }
1718  if (buoyance)
1719  buoyance->setsink(0);
1720  refpressure = 50.0;
1721  addPressure(0.0);
1722  if (autopilot)
1723  resetAutopilot();
1724  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
1725  flexbodies[i]->reset();
1726 
1727  // reset on spot with backspace
1728  if (m_reset_request != REQUEST_RESET_ON_INIT_POS)
1729  {
1730  resetAngle(cur_rot);
1731  resetPosition(cur_position.x, cur_position.z, false, yPos);
1732  }
1733 
1734  // reset commands (self centering && push once/twice forced to terminate moving commands)
1735  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_COMMANDS; i++)
1736  {
1737  commandkey[i].commandValue = 0.0;
1738  commandkey[i].triggerInputValue = 0.0f;
1739  commandkey[i].playerInputValue = 0.0f;
1740  }
1741 
1742  resetSlideNodes();
1743 
1744  if (m_reset_request != REQUEST_RESET_ON_SPOT)
1745  {
1746  m_reset_request = REQUEST_RESET_NONE;
1747  }
1748  else
1749  {
1750  m_reset_request = REQUEST_RESET_FINAL;
1751  }
1752 }
1753 
1754 bool Beam::replayStep()
1755 {
1756  if (!replaymode || !replay || !replay->isValid())
1757  return false;
1758 
1759  // no replay update needed if position was not changed
1760  if (replaypos != oldreplaypos)
1761  {
1762  unsigned long time = 0;
1763 
1764  node_simple_t* nbuff = (node_simple_t *)replay->getReadBuffer(replaypos, 0, time);
1765  if (nbuff)
1766  {
1767  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
1768  {
1769  nodes[i].AbsPosition = nbuff[i].position;
1770  nodes[i].RelPosition = nbuff[i].position - origin;
1771 
1772  nodes[i].Velocity = nbuff[i].velocity;
1773  nodes[i].Forces = nbuff[i].forces;
1774  }
1775 
1776  updateSlideNodePositions();
1777  updateBoundingBox();
1778  calculateAveragePosition();
1779  }
1780 
1781  beam_simple_t* bbuff = (beam_simple_t *)replay->getReadBuffer(replaypos, 1, time);
1782  if (bbuff)
1783  {
1784  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
1785  {
1786  beams[i].broken = bbuff[i].broken;
1787  beams[i].disabled = bbuff[i].disabled;
1788  }
1789  }
1790  oldreplaypos = replaypos;
1791  }
1792 
1793  return true;
1794 }
1795 
1796 void Beam::ForceFeedbackStep(int steps)
1797 {
1798  ffforce = affforce / steps;
1799  ffhydro = affhydro / steps;
1800  if (free_hydro)
1801  ffhydro = ffhydro / free_hydro;
1802 }
1803 
1804 void Beam::updateAngelScriptEvents(float dt)
1805 {
1806 #ifdef USE_ANGELSCRIPT
1807  if (locked != lockedold)
1808  {
1809  if (locked == LOCKED)
1810  ScriptEngine::getSingleton().triggerEvent(SE_TRUCK_LOCKED, trucknum);
1811  if (locked == UNLOCKED)
1812  ScriptEngine::getSingleton().triggerEvent(SE_TRUCK_UNLOCKED, trucknum);
1813  lockedold = locked;
1814  }
1815  if (watercontact && !watercontactold)
1816  {
1817  watercontactold = watercontact;
1818  ScriptEngine::getSingleton().triggerEvent(SE_TRUCK_TOUCHED_WATER, trucknum);
1819  }
1820 #endif // USE_ANGELSCRIPT
1821 }
1822 
1823 void Beam::handleResetRequests(float dt)
1824 {
1825  if (m_reset_request)
1826  SyncReset();
1827 }
1828 
1829 void Beam::sendStreamSetup()
1830 {
1831  RoRnet::TruckStreamRegister reg;
1832  memset(&reg, 0, sizeof(RoRnet::TruckStreamRegister));
1833  reg.status = 0;
1834  reg.type = 0;
1835  reg.bufferSize = netbuffersize;
1836  strncpy(reg.name, realtruckfilename.c_str(), 128);
1837  if (!m_truck_config.empty())
1838  {
1839  // insert section config
1840  for (int i = 0; i < std::min<int>((int)m_truck_config.size(), 10); i++)
1841  strncpy(reg.truckconfig[i], m_truck_config[i].c_str(), 60);
1842  }
1843 
1844 #ifdef USE_SOCKETW
1845  RoR::Networking::AddLocalStream((RoRnet::StreamRegister *)&reg, sizeof(RoRnet::TruckStreamRegister));
1846 #endif // USE_SOCKETW
1847 
1848  m_source_id = reg.origin_sourceid;
1849  m_stream_id = reg.origin_streamid;
1850 }
1851 
1852 void Beam::sendStreamData()
1853 {
1854  using namespace RoRnet;
1855 
1856  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_sendStreamData);
1857 #ifdef USE_SOCKETW
1858  lastNetUpdateTime = netTimer.getMilliseconds();
1859 
1860  //look if the packet is too big first
1861  int final_packet_size = sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState) + sizeof(float) * 3 + first_wheel_node * sizeof(float) * 3 + free_wheel * sizeof(float);
1862  if (final_packet_size > 8192)
1863  {
1864  ErrorUtils::ShowError(_L("Truck is too big to be send over the net."), _L("Network error!"));
1865  exit(126);
1866  }
1867 
1868  char send_buffer[8192] = {0};
1869 
1870  unsigned int packet_len = 0;
1871 
1872  // RoRnet::TruckState is at the beginning of the buffer
1873  {
1874  RoRnet::TruckState* send_oob = (RoRnet::TruckState *)send_buffer;
1875  packet_len += sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState);
1876 
1877  send_oob->flagmask = 0;
1878 
1879  send_oob->time = netTimer.getMilliseconds();
1880  if (engine)
1881  {
1882  send_oob->engine_speed = engine->getRPM();
1883  send_oob->engine_force = engine->getAcc();
1884  send_oob->engine_clutch = engine->getClutch();
1885  send_oob->engine_gear = engine->getGear();
1886 
1887  if (engine->hasContact())
1888  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_ENGINE_CONT;
1889  if (engine->isRunning())
1890  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_ENGINE_RUN;
1891 
1892  switch (engine->getAutoMode())
1893  {
1894  case RoR::App::SIM_GEARBOX_AUTO: send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_ENGINE_MODE_AUTOMATIC;
1895  break;
1896  case RoR::App::SIM_GEARBOX_SEMI_AUTO: send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_ENGINE_MODE_SEMIAUTO;
1897  break;
1898  case RoR::App::SIM_GEARBOX_MANUAL: send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_ENGINE_MODE_MANUAL;
1899  break;
1900  case RoR::App::SIM_GEARBOX_MANUAL_STICK: send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_ENGINE_MODE_MANUAL_STICK;
1901  break;
1902  case RoR::App::SIM_GEARBOX_MANUAL_RANGES: send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_ENGINE_MODE_MANUAL_RANGES;
1903  break;
1904  }
1905  }
1906  if (free_aeroengine > 0)
1907  {
1908  float rpm = aeroengines[0]->getRPM();
1909  send_oob->engine_speed = rpm;
1910  }
1911 
1912  send_oob->hydrodirstate = hydrodirstate;
1913  send_oob->brake = brake;
1914  send_oob->wheelspeed = WheelSpeed;
1915 
1916  blinktype b = getBlinkType();
1917  if (b == BLINK_LEFT)
1918  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_BLINK_LEFT;
1919  else if (b == BLINK_RIGHT)
1920  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_BLINK_RIGHT;
1921  else if (b == BLINK_WARN)
1922  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_BLINK_WARN;
1923 
1924  if (lights)
1925  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_LIGHTS;
1926  if (getCustomLightVisible(0))
1927  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_CLIGHT1;
1928  if (getCustomLightVisible(1))
1929  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_CLIGHT2;
1930  if (getCustomLightVisible(2))
1931  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_CLIGHT3;
1932  if (getCustomLightVisible(3))
1933  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_CLIGHT4;
1934 
1935  if (getBrakeLightVisible())
1936  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_BRAKES;
1937  if (getReverseLightVisible())
1938  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_REVERSE;
1939  if (getBeaconMode())
1940  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_BEACONS;
1941  if (getCustomParticleMode())
1942  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_PARTICLE;
1943 
1944  if (parkingbrake)
1945  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_PBRAKE;
1946  if (tractioncontrol)
1947  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_TC_ACTIVE;
1948  if (antilockbrake)
1949  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_ALB_ACTIVE;
1950 
1951 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
1952  if (SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().getTrigState(trucknum, SS_TRIG_HORN))
1953  send_oob->flagmask += NETMASK_HORN;
1954 #endif //OPENAL
1955  }
1956 
1957  // then process the contents
1958  {
1959  char* ptr = send_buffer + sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState);
1960  float* send_nodes = (float *)ptr;
1961  packet_len += netbuffersize;
1962 
1963  // copy data into the buffer
1964  int i;
1965 
1966  // reference node first
1967  Vector3& refpos = nodes[0].AbsPosition;
1968  send_nodes[0] = refpos.x;
1969  send_nodes[1] = refpos.y;
1970  send_nodes[2] = refpos.z;
1971 
1972  ptr += sizeof(float) * 3;// plus 3 floats from above
1973 
1974  // then copy the other nodes into a compressed short format
1975  short* sbuf = (short*)ptr;
1976  for (i = 1; i < first_wheel_node; i++)
1977  {
1978  Vector3 relpos = nodes[i].AbsPosition - refpos;
1979  sbuf[(i - 1) * 3 + 0] = (short int)(relpos.x * 300.0f);
1980  sbuf[(i - 1) * 3 + 1] = (short int)(relpos.y * 300.0f);
1981  sbuf[(i - 1) * 3 + 2] = (short int)(relpos.z * 300.0f);
1982 
1983  ptr += sizeof(short int) * 3; // increase pointer
1984  }
1985 
1986  // then to the wheels
1987  float* wfbuf = (float*)ptr;
1988  for (i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
1989  {
1990  wfbuf[i] = wheels[i].rp;
1991  }
1992  }
1993 
1994  RoR::Networking::AddPacket(m_stream_id, MSG2_STREAM_DATA, packet_len, send_buffer);
1995 #endif //SOCKETW
1996  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_sendStreamData);
1997 }
1998 
1999 void Beam::receiveStreamData(unsigned int type, int source, unsigned int streamid, char* buffer, unsigned int len)
2000 {
2001  if (state != NETWORKED)
2002  return;
2003 
2004  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_receiveStreamData);
2005  if (type == RoRnet::MSG2_STREAM_DATA && source == m_source_id && streamid == m_stream_id)
2006  {
2007  pushNetwork(buffer, len);
2008  }
2009  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_receiveStreamData);
2010 }
2011 
2012 void Beam::calcAnimators(const int flag_state, float& cstate, int& div, Real timer, const float lower_limit, const float upper_limit, const float option3)
2013 {
2014  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_calcAnimators);
2015  Real dt = timer;
2016 
2017  //boat rudder
2018  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_BRUDDER)
2019  {
2020  int spi;
2021  float ctmp = 0.0f;
2022  for (spi = 0; spi < free_screwprop; spi++)
2023  if (screwprops[spi])
2024  ctmp += screwprops[spi]->getRudder();
2025 
2026  if (spi > 0)
2027  ctmp = ctmp / spi;
2028  cstate = ctmp;
2029  div++;
2030  }
2031 
2032  //boat throttle
2033  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_BTHROTTLE)
2034  {
2035  int spi;
2036  float ctmp = 0.0f;
2037  for (spi = 0; spi < free_screwprop; spi++)
2038  if (screwprops[spi])
2039  ctmp += screwprops[spi]->getThrottle();
2040 
2041  if (spi > 0)
2042  ctmp = ctmp / spi;
2043  cstate = ctmp;
2044  div++;
2045  }
2046 
2047  //differential lock status
2048  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_DIFFLOCK)
2049  {
2050  if (free_axle)
2051  {
2052  if (getAxleLockName() == "Open")
2053  cstate = 0.0f;
2054  if (getAxleLockName() == "Split")
2055  cstate = 0.5f;
2056  if (getAxleLockName() == "Locked")
2057  cstate = 1.0f;
2058  }
2059  else // no axles/diffs avail, mode is split by default
2060  cstate = 0.5f;
2061 
2062  div++;
2063  }
2064 
2065  //heading
2066  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_HEADING)
2067  {
2068  float heading = getHeadingDirectionAngle();
2069  // rad2deg limitedrange -1 to +1
2070  cstate = (heading * 57.29578f) / 360.0f;
2071  div++;
2072  }
2073 
2074  //torque
2075  if (engine && flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_TORQUE)
2076  {
2077  float torque = engine->getCrankFactor();
2078  if (torque <= 0.0f)
2079  torque = 0.0f;
2080  if (torque >= previousCrank)
2081  cstate -= torque / 10.0f;
2082  else
2083  cstate = 0.0f;
2084 
2085  if (cstate <= -1.0f)
2086  cstate = -1.0f;
2087  previousCrank = torque;
2088  div++;
2089  }
2090 
2091  //shifterseq, to amimate sequentiell shifting
2092  if (engine && (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER) && option3 == 3.0f)
2093  {
2094  // opt1 &opt2 = 0 this is a shifter
2095  if (!lower_limit && !upper_limit)
2096  {
2097  int shifter = engine->getGear();
2098  if (shifter > previousGear)
2099  {
2100  cstate = 1.0f;
2101  animTimer = 0.2f;
2102  }
2103  if (shifter < previousGear)
2104  {
2105  cstate = -1.0f;
2106  animTimer = -0.2f;
2107  }
2108  previousGear = shifter;
2109 
2110  if (animTimer > 0.0f)
2111  {
2112  cstate = 1.0f;
2113  animTimer -= dt;
2114  if (animTimer < 0.0f)
2115  animTimer = 0.0f;
2116  }
2117  if (animTimer < 0.0f)
2118  {
2119  cstate = -1.0f;
2120  animTimer += dt;
2121  if (animTimer > 0.0f)
2122  animTimer = 0.0f;
2123  }
2124  }
2125  else
2126  {
2127  // check if lower_limit is a valid to get commandvalue, then get commandvalue
2128  if (lower_limit >= 1.0f && lower_limit <= 48.0)
2129  if (commandkey[int(lower_limit)].commandValue > 0)
2130  cstate += 1.0f;
2131  // check if upper_limit is a valid to get commandvalue, then get commandvalue
2132  if (upper_limit >= 1.0f && upper_limit <= 48.0)
2133  if (commandkey[int(upper_limit)].commandValue > 0)
2134  cstate -= 1.0f;
2135  }
2136 
2137  div++;
2138  }
2139 
2140  //shifterman1, left/right
2141  if (engine && (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER) && option3 == 1.0f)
2142  {
2143  int shifter = engine->getGear();
2144  if (!shifter)
2145  {
2146  cstate = -0.5f;
2147  }
2148  else if (shifter < 0)
2149  {
2150  cstate = 1.0f;
2151  }
2152  else
2153  {
2154  cstate -= int((shifter - 1.0) / 2.0);
2155  }
2156  div++;
2157  }
2158 
2159  //shifterman2, up/down
2160  if (engine && (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER) && option3 == 2.0f)
2161  {
2162  int shifter = engine->getGear();
2163  cstate = 0.5f;
2164  if (shifter < 0)
2165  {
2166  cstate = 1.0f;
2167  }
2168  if (shifter > 0)
2169  {
2170  cstate = shifter % 2;
2171  }
2172  div++;
2173  }
2174 
2175  //shifterlinear, to amimate cockpit gearselect gauge and autotransmission stick
2176  if (engine && (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_SHIFTER) && option3 == 4.0f)
2177  {
2178  int shifter = engine->getGear();
2179  int numgears = engine->getNumGears();
2180  cstate -= (shifter + 2.0) / (numgears + 2.0);
2181  div++;
2182  }
2183 
2184  //parking brake
2185  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_PBRAKE)
2186  {
2187  float pbrake = parkingbrake;
2188  cstate -= pbrake;
2189  div++;
2190  }
2191 
2192  //speedo ( scales with speedomax )
2193  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_SPEEDO)
2194  {
2195  float speedo = WheelSpeed / speedoMax;
2196  cstate -= speedo * 3.0f;
2197  div++;
2198  }
2199 
2200  //engine tacho ( scales with maxrpm, default is 3500 )
2201  if (engine && flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_TACHO)
2202  {
2203  float tacho = engine->getRPM() / engine->getMaxRPM();
2204  cstate -= tacho;
2205  div++;
2206  }
2207 
2208  //turbo
2209  if (engine && flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_TURBO)
2210  {
2211  float turbo = engine->getTurboPSI() * 3.34;
2212  cstate -= turbo / 67.0f;
2213  div++;
2214  }
2215 
2216  //brake
2217  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_BRAKE)
2218  {
2219  float brakes = brake / brakeforce;
2220  cstate -= brakes;
2221  div++;
2222  }
2223 
2224  //accelerator
2225  if (engine && flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_ACCEL)
2226  {
2227  float accel = engine->getAcc();
2228  cstate -= accel + 0.06f;
2229  //( small correction, get acc is nver smaller then 0.06.
2230  div++;
2231  }
2232 
2233  //clutch
2234  if (engine && flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_CLUTCH)
2235  {
2236  float clutch = engine->getClutch();
2237  cstate -= fabs(1.0f - clutch);
2238  div++;
2239  }
2240 
2241  //aeroengines rpm + throttle + torque ( turboprop ) + pitch ( turboprop ) + status + fire
2242  int ftp = free_aeroengine;
2243 
2244  if (ftp > option3 - 1.0f)
2245  {
2246  int aenum = int(option3 - 1.0f);
2247  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_RPM)
2248  {
2249  float angle;
2250  float pcent = aeroengines[aenum]->getRPMpc();
2251  if (pcent < 60.0)
2252  angle = -5.0 + pcent * 1.9167;
2253  else if (pcent < 110.0)
2254  angle = 110.0 + (pcent - 60.0) * 4.075;
2255  else
2256  angle = 314.0;
2257  cstate -= angle / 314.0f;
2258  div++;
2259  }
2260  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_THROTTLE)
2261  {
2262  float throttle = aeroengines[aenum]->getThrottle();
2263  cstate -= throttle;
2264  div++;
2265  }
2266 
2267  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_AETORQUE)
2268  if (aeroengines[aenum]->getType() == AeroEngine::AEROENGINE_TYPE_TURBOPROP)
2269  {
2270  Turboprop* tp = (Turboprop*)aeroengines[aenum];
2271  cstate = (100.0 * tp->indicated_torque / tp->max_torque) / 120.0f;
2272  div++;
2273  }
2274 
2275  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_AEPITCH)
2276  if (aeroengines[aenum]->getType() == AeroEngine::AEROENGINE_TYPE_TURBOPROP)
2277  {
2278  Turboprop* tp = (Turboprop*)aeroengines[aenum];
2279  cstate = tp->pitch / 120.0f;
2280  div++;
2281  }
2282 
2283  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_AESTATUS)
2284  {
2285  if (!aeroengines[aenum]->getIgnition())
2286  cstate = 0.0f;
2287  else
2288  cstate = 0.5f;
2289  if (aeroengines[aenum]->isFailed())
2290  cstate = 1.0f;
2291  div++;
2292  }
2293  }
2294 
2295  //airspeed indicator
2296  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_AIRSPEED)
2297  {
2298  // TODO Unused Varaible
2299  //float angle=0.0;
2300  float ground_speed_kt = nodes[0].Velocity.length() * 1.9438;
2301  float altitude = nodes[0].AbsPosition.y;
2302 
2303  // TODO Unused Varaible
2304  //float sea_level_temperature=273.15+15.0; //in Kelvin
2305  float sea_level_pressure = 101325; //in Pa
2306 
2307  // TODO Unused Varaible
2308  //float airtemperature=sea_level_temperature-altitude*0.0065; //in Kelvin
2309  float airpressure = sea_level_pressure * pow(1.0 - 0.0065 * altitude / 288.15, 5.24947); //in Pa
2310  float airdensity = airpressure * 0.0000120896;//1.225 at sea level
2311  float kt = ground_speed_kt * sqrt(airdensity / 1.225);
2312  cstate -= kt / 100.0f;
2313  div++;
2314  }
2315 
2316  //vvi indicator
2317  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_VVI)
2318  {
2319  float vvi = nodes[0].Velocity.y * 196.85;
2320  // limit vvi scale to +/- 6m/s
2321  cstate -= vvi / 6000.0f;
2322  if (cstate >= 1.0f)
2323  cstate = 1.0f;
2324  if (cstate <= -1.0f)
2325  cstate = -1.0f;
2326  div++;
2327  }
2328 
2329  //altimeter
2330  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_ALTIMETER)
2331  {
2332  //altimeter indicator 1k oscillating
2333  if (option3 == 3.0f)
2334  {
2335  float altimeter = (nodes[0].AbsPosition.y * 1.1811) / 360.0f;
2336  int alti_int = int(altimeter);
2337  float alti_mod = (altimeter - alti_int);
2338  cstate -= alti_mod;
2339  }
2340 
2341  //altimeter indicator 10k oscillating
2342  if (option3 == 2.0f)
2343  {
2344  float alti = nodes[0].AbsPosition.y * 1.1811 / 3600.0f;
2345  int alti_int = int(alti);
2346  float alti_mod = (alti - alti_int);
2347  cstate -= alti_mod;
2348  if (cstate <= -1.0f)
2349  cstate = -1.0f;
2350  }
2351 
2352  //altimeter indicator 100k limited
2353  if (option3 == 1.0f)
2354  {
2355  float alti = nodes[0].AbsPosition.y * 1.1811 / 36000.0f;
2356  cstate -= alti;
2357  if (cstate <= -1.0f)
2358  cstate = -1.0f;
2359  }
2360  div++;
2361  }
2362 
2363  //AOA
2364  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_AOA)
2365  {
2366  float aoa = 0;
2367  if (free_wing > 4)
2368  aoa = (wings[4].fa->aoa) / 25.0f;
2369  if ((nodes[0].Velocity.length() * 1.9438) < 10.0f)
2370  aoa = 0;
2371  cstate -= aoa;
2372  if (cstate <= -1.0f)
2373  cstate = -1.0f;
2374  if (cstate >= 1.0f)
2375  cstate = 1.0f;
2376  div++;
2377  }
2378 
2379  Vector3 cam_pos = nodes[0].RelPosition;
2380  Vector3 cam_roll = nodes[0].RelPosition;
2381  Vector3 cam_dir = nodes[0].RelPosition;
2382 
2383  if (this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0])) // TODO: why check this on each update when it cannot change after spawn?
2384  {
2385  cam_pos = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition;
2386  cam_roll = nodes[cameranoderoll[0]].RelPosition;
2387  cam_dir = nodes[cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition;
2388  }
2389 
2390  // roll
2391  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_ROLL)
2392  {
2393  Vector3 rollv = (cam_pos - cam_roll).normalisedCopy();
2394  Vector3 dirv = (cam_pos - cam_dir).normalisedCopy();
2395  Vector3 upv = dirv.crossProduct(-rollv);
2396  float rollangle = asin(rollv.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_Y));
2397  // rad to deg
2398  rollangle = Math::RadiansToDegrees(rollangle);
2399  // flip to other side when upside down
2400  if (upv.y < 0)
2401  rollangle = 180.0f - rollangle;
2402  cstate = rollangle / 180.0f;
2403  // data output is -0.5 to 1.5, normalize to -1 to +1 without changing the zero position.
2404  // this is vital for the animator beams and does not effect the animated props
2405  if (cstate >= 1.0f)
2406  cstate = cstate - 2.0f;
2407  div++;
2408  }
2409 
2410  // pitch
2411  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_PITCH)
2412  {
2413  Vector3 dirv = (cam_pos - cam_dir).normalisedCopy();
2414  float pitchangle = asin(dirv.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_Y));
2415  // radian to degrees with a max cstate of +/- 1.0
2416  cstate = (Math::RadiansToDegrees(pitchangle) / 90.0f);
2417  div++;
2418  }
2419 
2420  // airbrake
2421  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_AIRBRAKE)
2422  {
2423  float airbrake = airbrakeval;
2424  // cstate limited to -1.0f
2425  cstate -= airbrake / 5.0f;
2426  div++;
2427  }
2428 
2429  //flaps
2430  if (flag_state & ANIM_FLAG_FLAP)
2431  {
2432  float flaps = flapangles[flap];
2433  // cstate limited to -1.0f
2434  cstate = flaps;
2435  div++;
2436  }
2437 
2438  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_calcAnimators);
2439 }
2440 
2441 void Beam::calcShocks2(int beam_i, Real difftoBeamL, Real& k, Real& d, Real dt, int update)
2442 {
2443  if (!beams[beam_i].shock)
2444  return;
2445 
2446  int i = beam_i;
2447  float beamsLep = beams[i].L * 0.8f;
2448  float longboundprelimit = beams[i].longbound * beamsLep;
2449  float shortboundprelimit = -beams[i].shortbound * beamsLep;
2450  // this is a shock2
2451  float logafactor;
2452  //shock extending since last cycle
2453  if (beams[i].shock->lastpos < difftoBeamL)
2454  {
2455  //get outbound values
2456  k = beams[i].shock->springout;
2457  d = beams[i].shock->dampout;
2458  // add progression
2459  if (beams[i].longbound != 0.0f)
2460  {
2461  logafactor = difftoBeamL / (beams[i].longbound * beams[i].L);
2462  logafactor = logafactor * logafactor;
2463  }
2464  else
2465  {
2466  logafactor = 1.0f;
2467  }
2468  if (logafactor > 1.0f)
2469  logafactor = 1.0f;
2470  k = k + (beams[i].shock->sprogout * k * logafactor);
2471  d = d + (beams[i].shock->dprogout * d * logafactor);
2472  }
2473  else
2474  {
2475  //shock compresssing since last cycle
2476  //get inbound values
2477  k = beams[i].shock->springin;
2478  d = beams[i].shock->dampin;
2479  // add progression
2480  if (beams[i].shortbound != 0.0f)
2481  {
2482  logafactor = difftoBeamL / (beams[i].shortbound * beams[i].L);
2483  logafactor = logafactor * logafactor;
2484  }
2485  else
2486  {
2487  logafactor = 1.0f;
2488  }
2489  if (logafactor > 1.0f)
2490  logafactor = 1.0f;
2491  k = k + (beams[i].shock->sprogin * k * logafactor);
2492  d = d + (beams[i].shock->dprogin * d * logafactor);
2493  }
2494  if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_SOFTBUMP)
2495  {
2496  // soft bump shocks
2497  if (difftoBeamL > longboundprelimit)
2498  {
2499  //reset to longbound progressive values (oscillating beam workaround)
2500  k = beams[i].shock->springout;
2501  d = beams[i].shock->dampout;
2502  // add progression
2503  if (beams[i].longbound != 0.0f)
2504  {
2505  logafactor = difftoBeamL / (beams[i].longbound * beams[i].L);
2506  logafactor = logafactor * logafactor;
2507  }
2508  else
2509  {
2510  logafactor = 1.0f;
2511  }
2512  if (logafactor > 1.0f)
2513  logafactor = 1.0f;
2514  k = k + (beams[i].shock->sprogout * k * logafactor);
2515  d = d + (beams[i].shock->dprogout * d * logafactor);
2516  //add shortbump progression
2517  if (beams[i].longbound != 0.0f)
2518  {
2519  logafactor = ((difftoBeamL - longboundprelimit) * 5.0f) / (beams[i].longbound * beams[i].L);
2520  logafactor = logafactor * logafactor;
2521  }
2522  else
2523  {
2524  logafactor = 1.0f;
2525  }
2526  if (logafactor > 1.0f)
2527  logafactor = 1.0f;
2528  k = k + (k + 100.0f) * beams[i].shock->sprogout * logafactor;
2529  d = d + (d + 100.0f) * beams[i].shock->dprogout * logafactor;
2530  if (beams[i].shock->lastpos > difftoBeamL)
2531  // rebound mode..get new values
2532  {
2533  k = beams[i].shock->springin;
2534  d = beams[i].shock->dampin;
2535  }
2536  }
2537  else if (difftoBeamL < shortboundprelimit)
2538  {
2539  //reset to shortbound progressive values (oscillating beam workaround)
2540  k = beams[i].shock->springin;
2541  d = beams[i].shock->dampin;
2542  if (beams[i].shortbound != 0.0f)
2543  {
2544  logafactor = difftoBeamL / (beams[i].shortbound * beams[i].L);
2545  logafactor = logafactor * logafactor;
2546  }
2547  else
2548  {
2549  logafactor = 1.0f;
2550  }
2551  if (logafactor > 1.0f)
2552  logafactor = 1.0f;
2553  k = k + (beams[i].shock->sprogin * k * logafactor);
2554  d = d + (beams[i].shock->dprogin * d * logafactor);
2555  //add shortbump progression
2556  if (beams[i].shortbound != 0.0f)
2557  {
2558  logafactor = ((difftoBeamL - shortboundprelimit) * 5.0f) / (beams[i].shortbound * beams[i].L);
2559  logafactor = logafactor * logafactor;
2560  }
2561  else
2562  {
2563  logafactor = 1.0f;
2564  }
2565  if (logafactor > 1.0f)
2566  logafactor = 1.0f;
2567  k = k + (k + 100.0f) * beams[i].shock->sprogout * logafactor;
2568  d = d + (d + 100.0f) * beams[i].shock->dprogout * logafactor;
2569  if (beams[i].shock->lastpos < difftoBeamL)
2570  // rebound mode..get new values
2571  {
2572  k = beams[i].shock->springout;
2573  d = beams[i].shock->dampout;
2574  }
2575  }
2576  if (difftoBeamL > beams[i].longbound * beams[i].L || difftoBeamL < -beams[i].shortbound * beams[i].L)
2577  {
2578  // block reached...hard bump in soft mode with 4x default damping
2579  if (k < beams[i].shock->sbd_spring)
2580  k = beams[i].shock->sbd_spring;
2581  if (d < beams[i].shock->sbd_damp)
2582  d = beams[i].shock->sbd_damp;
2583  }
2584  }
2585 
2586  if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_NORMAL)
2587  {
2588  if (difftoBeamL > beams[i].longbound * beams[i].L || difftoBeamL < -beams[i].shortbound * beams[i].L)
2589  {
2590  if (beams[i].shock && !(beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_ISTRIGGER)) // this is NOT a trigger beam
2591  {
2592  // hard (normal) shock bump
2593  k = beams[i].shock->sbd_spring;
2594  d = beams[i].shock->sbd_damp;
2595  }
2596  }
2597 
2598  if (beams[i].shock && (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_ISTRIGGER) && beams[i].shock->trigger_enabled) // this is a trigger and its enabled
2599  {
2600  if (difftoBeamL > beams[i].longbound * beams[i].L || difftoBeamL < -beams[i].shortbound * beams[i].L) // that has hit boundary
2601  {
2602  beams[i].shock->trigger_switch_state -= dt;
2603  if (beams[i].shock->trigger_switch_state <= 0.0f) // emergency release for dead-switched trigger
2604  beams[i].shock->trigger_switch_state = 0.0f;
2605  if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_BLOCKER) // this is an enabled blocker and past boundary
2606  {
2607  for (int scount = i + 1; scount <= i + beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort; scount++) // (cycle blockerbeamID +1) to (blockerbeamID + beams to lock)
2608  {
2609  if (beams[scount].shock && (beams[scount].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_ISTRIGGER)) // don't mess anything up if the user set the number too big
2610  {
2611  if (triggerdebug && !beams[scount].shock->trigger_enabled && beams[i].shock->last_debug_state != 1)
2612  {
2613  LOG(" Trigger disabled. Blocker BeamID " + TOSTRING(i) + " enabled trigger " + TOSTRING(scount));
2614  beams[i].shock->last_debug_state = 1;
2615  }
2616  beams[scount].shock->trigger_enabled = false; // disable the trigger
2617  }
2618  }
2619  }
2620  else if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_BLOCKER_A) // this is an enabled inverted blocker and inside boundary
2621  {
2622  for (int scount = i + 1; scount <= i + beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong; scount++) // (cycle blockerbeamID + 1) to (blockerbeamID + beams to release)
2623  {
2624  if (beams[scount].shock && (beams[scount].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_ISTRIGGER)) // don't mess anything up if the user set the number too big
2625  {
2626  if (triggerdebug && beams[scount].shock->trigger_enabled && beams[i].shock->last_debug_state != 9)
2627  {
2628  LOG(" Trigger enabled. Inverted Blocker BeamID " + TOSTRING(i) + " disabled trigger " + TOSTRING(scount));
2629  beams[i].shock->last_debug_state = 9;
2630  }
2631  beams[scount].shock->trigger_enabled = true; // enable the triggers
2632  }
2633  }
2634  }
2635  else if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CMD_BLOCKER) // this an enabled cmd-key-blocker and past a boundary
2636  {
2637  commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort].trigger_cmdkeyblock_state = false; // Release the cmdKey
2638  if (triggerdebug && beams[i].shock->last_debug_state != 2)
2639  {
2640  LOG(" F-key trigger block released. Blocker BeamID " + TOSTRING(i) + " Released F" + TOSTRING(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort));
2641  beams[i].shock->last_debug_state = 2;
2642  }
2643  }
2644  else if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CMD_SWITCH) // this is an enabled cmdkey switch and past a boundary
2645  {
2646  if (!beams[i].shock->trigger_switch_state)// this switch is triggered first time in this boundary
2647  {
2648  for (int scount = 0; scount < free_shock; scount++)
2649  {
2650  int short1 = beams[shocks[scount].beamid].shock->trigger_cmdshort; // cmdshort of checked trigger beam
2651  int short2 = beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort; // cmdshort of switch beam
2652  int long1 = beams[shocks[scount].beamid].shock->trigger_cmdlong; // cmdlong of checked trigger beam
2653  int long2 = beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong; // cmdlong of switch beam
2654  int tmpi = beams[shocks[scount].beamid].shock->beamid; // beamID global of checked trigger beam
2655  if (((short1 == short2 && long1 == long2) || (short1 == long2 && long1 == short2)) && i != tmpi) // found both command triggers then swap if its not the switching trigger
2656  {
2657  int tmpcmdkey = beams[shocks[scount].beamid].shock->trigger_cmdlong;
2658  beams[shocks[scount].beamid].shock->trigger_cmdlong = beams[shocks[scount].beamid].shock->trigger_cmdshort;
2659  beams[shocks[scount].beamid].shock->trigger_cmdshort = tmpcmdkey;
2660  beams[i].shock->trigger_switch_state = beams[i].shock->trigger_boundary_t; //prevent trigger switching again before leaving boundaries or timeout
2661  if (triggerdebug && beams[i].shock->last_debug_state != 3)
2662  {
2663  LOG(" Trigger F-key commands switched. Switch BeamID " + TOSTRING(i)+ " switched commands of Trigger BeamID " + TOSTRING(beams[shocks[scount].beamid].shock->beamid) + " to cmdShort: F" + TOSTRING(beams[shocks[scount].beamid].shock->trigger_cmdshort) + ", cmdlong: F" + TOSTRING(beams[shocks[scount].beamid].shock->trigger_cmdlong));
2664  beams[i].shock->last_debug_state = 3;
2665  }
2666  }
2667  }
2668  }
2669  }
2670  else
2671  { // just a trigger, check high/low boundary and set action
2672  if (difftoBeamL > beams[i].longbound * beams[i].L) // trigger past longbound
2673  {
2674  if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_HOOK_UNLOCK)
2675  {
2676  if (update)
2677  {
2678  //autolock hooktoggle unlock
2679  hookToggle(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong, HOOK_UNLOCK, -1);
2680  }
2681  }
2682  else if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_HOOK_LOCK)
2683  {
2684  if (update)
2685  {
2686  //autolock hooktoggle lock
2687  hookToggle(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong, HOOK_LOCK, -1);
2688  }
2689  }
2690  else if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_ENGINE)
2691  {
