2692  engineTriggerHelper(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort, beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong, 1.0f);
2693  }
2694  else
2695  {
2696  //just a trigger
2697  if (!commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong].trigger_cmdkeyblock_state) // related cmdkey is not blocked
2698  {
2699  if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CONTINUOUS)
2700  commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort].triggerInputValue = 1; // continuous trigger only operates on trigger_cmdshort
2701  else
2702  commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong].triggerInputValue = 1;
2703  if (triggerdebug && beams[i].shock->last_debug_state != 4)
2704  {
2705  LOG(" Trigger Longbound activated. Trigger BeamID " + TOSTRING(i) + " Triggered F" + TOSTRING(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong));
2706  beams[i].shock->last_debug_state = 4;
2707  }
2708  }
2709  }
2710  }
2711  else // trigger past short bound
2712  {
2713  if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_HOOK_UNLOCK)
2714  {
2715  if (update)
2716  {
2717  //autolock hooktoggle unlock
2718  hookToggle(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort, HOOK_UNLOCK, -1);
2719  }
2720  }
2721  else if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_HOOK_LOCK)
2722  {
2723  if (update)
2724  {
2725  //autolock hooktoggle lock
2726  hookToggle(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort, HOOK_LOCK, -1);
2727  }
2728  }
2729  else if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_ENGINE)
2730  {
2731  bool triggerValue = !(beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CONTINUOUS); // 0 if trigger is continuous, 1 otherwise
2732 
2733  engineTriggerHelper(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort, beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong, triggerValue);
2734  }
2735  else
2736  {
2737  //just a trigger
2738  if (!commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort].trigger_cmdkeyblock_state) // related cmdkey is not blocked
2739  {
2740  if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CONTINUOUS)
2741  commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort].triggerInputValue = 0; // continuous trigger only operates on trigger_cmdshort
2742  else
2743  commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort].triggerInputValue = 1;
2744 
2745  if (triggerdebug && beams[i].shock->last_debug_state != 5)
2746  {
2747  LOG(" Trigger Shortbound activated. Trigger BeamID " + TOSTRING(i) + " Triggered F" + TOSTRING(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort));
2748  beams[i].shock->last_debug_state = 5;
2749  }
2750  }
2751  }
2752  }
2753  }
2754  }
2755  else // this is a trigger inside boundaries and its enabled
2756  {
2757  if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CONTINUOUS) // this is an enabled continuous trigger
2758  {
2759  if (beams[i].longbound - beams[i].shortbound > 0.0f)
2760  {
2761  float diffPercentage = difftoBeamL / beams[i].L;
2762  float triggerValue = (diffPercentage - beams[i].shortbound) / (beams[i].longbound - beams[i].shortbound);
2763 
2764  triggerValue = std::max(0.0f, triggerValue);
2765  triggerValue = std::min(triggerValue, 1.0f);
2766 
2767  if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_ENGINE) // this trigger controls an engine
2768  {
2769  engineTriggerHelper(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort, beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong, triggerValue);
2770  }
2771  else
2772  {
2773  // normal trigger
2774  commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort].triggerInputValue = triggerValue;
2775  commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong].triggerInputValue = triggerValue;
2776  }
2777  }
2778  }
2779  else if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_BLOCKER) // this is an enabled blocker and inside boundary
2780  {
2781  for (int scount = i + 1; scount <= i + beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdlong; scount++) // (cycle blockerbeamID + 1) to (blockerbeamID + beams to release)
2782  {
2783  if (beams[scount].shock && (beams[scount].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_ISTRIGGER)) // don't mess anything up if the user set the number too big
2784  {
2785  if (triggerdebug && beams[scount].shock->trigger_enabled && beams[i].shock->last_debug_state != 6)
2786  {
2787  LOG(" Trigger enabled. Blocker BeamID " + TOSTRING(i) + " disabled trigger " + TOSTRING(scount));
2788  beams[i].shock->last_debug_state = 6;
2789  }
2790  beams[scount].shock->trigger_enabled = true; // enable the triggers
2791  }
2792  }
2793  }
2794  else if (beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_BLOCKER_A) // this is an enabled reverse blocker and past boundary
2795  {
2796  for (int scount = i + 1; scount <= i + beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort; scount++) // (cylce blockerbeamID +1) to (blockerbeamID + beams tob lock)
2797  {
2798  if (beams[scount].shock && (beams[scount].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_ISTRIGGER)) // dont mess anything up if the user set the number too big
2799  {
2800  if (triggerdebug && !beams[scount].shock->trigger_enabled && beams[i].shock->last_debug_state != 10)
2801  {
2802  LOG(" Trigger disabled. Inverted Blocker BeamID " + TOSTRING(i) + " enabled trigger " + TOSTRING(scount));
2803  beams[i].shock->last_debug_state = 10;
2804  }
2805  beams[scount].shock->trigger_enabled = false; // disable the trigger
2806  }
2807  }
2808  }
2809  else if ((beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CMD_SWITCH) && beams[i].shock->trigger_switch_state) // this is a switch that was activated and is back inside boundaries again
2810  {
2811  beams[i].shock->trigger_switch_state = 0.0f; //trigger_switch reset
2812  if (triggerdebug && beams[i].shock->last_debug_state != 7)
2813  {
2814  LOG(" Trigger switch reset. Switch BeamID " + TOSTRING(i));
2815  beams[i].shock->last_debug_state = 7;
2816  }
2817  }
2818  else if ((beams[i].shock->flags & SHOCK_FLAG_TRG_CMD_BLOCKER) && !commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort].trigger_cmdkeyblock_state) // this cmdkeyblocker is inside boundaries and cmdkeystate is diabled
2819  {
2820  commandkey[beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort].trigger_cmdkeyblock_state = true; // activate trigger blocking
2821  if (triggerdebug && beams[i].shock->last_debug_state != 8)
2822  {
2823  LOG(" F-key trigger blocked. Blocker BeamID " + TOSTRING(i) + " Blocked F" + TOSTRING(beams[i].shock->trigger_cmdshort));
2824  beams[i].shock->last_debug_state = 8;
2825  }
2826  }
2827  }
2828  }
2829  }
2830  // save beam position for next simulation cycle
2831  beams[i].shock->lastpos = difftoBeamL;
2832 }
2833 
2834 // call this once per frame in order to update the skidmarks
2835 void Beam::updateSkidmarks()
2836 {
2837  if (!useSkidmarks)
2838  return;
2839 
2840  BES_START(BES_CORE_Skidmarks);
2841 
2842  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
2843  {
2844  // ignore wheels without data
2845  if (wheels[i].lastContactInner == Vector3::ZERO && wheels[i].lastContactOuter == Vector3::ZERO)
2846  continue;
2847 
2848  skidtrails[i]->updatePoint();
2849  if (skidtrails[i] && wheels[i].isSkiding)
2850  skidtrails[i]->update();
2851  }
2852 
2853  BES_STOP(BES_CORE_Skidmarks);
2854 }
2855 
2856 Quaternion Beam::specialGetRotationTo(const Vector3& src, const Vector3& dest) const
2857 {
2858  // Based on Stan Melax's article in Game Programming Gems
2859  Quaternion q;
2860  // Copy, since cannot modify local
2861  Vector3 v0 = src;
2862  Vector3 v1 = dest;
2863  v0.normalise();
2864  v1.normalise();
2865 
2866  // NB if the crossProduct approaches zero, we get unstable because ANY axis will do
2867  // when v0 == -v1
2868  Real d = v0.dotProduct(v1);
2869  // If dot == 1, vectors are the same
2870  if (d >= 1.0f)
2871  {
2872  return Quaternion::IDENTITY;
2873  }
2874  if (d < (1e-6f - 1.0f))
2875  {
2876  // Generate an axis
2877  Vector3 axis = Vector3::UNIT_X.crossProduct(src);
2878  if (axis.isZeroLength()) // pick another if colinear
2879  axis = Vector3::UNIT_Y.crossProduct(src);
2880  axis.normalise();
2881  q.FromAngleAxis(Radian(Math::PI), axis);
2882  }
2883  else
2884  {
2885  Real s = fast_sqrt((1 + d) * 2);
2886  if (s == 0)
2887  return Quaternion::IDENTITY;
2888 
2889  Vector3 c = v0.crossProduct(v1);
2890  Real invs = 1 / s;
2891 
2892  q.x = c.x * invs;
2893  q.y = c.y * invs;
2894  q.z = c.z * invs;
2895  q.w = s * 0.5;
2896  }
2897  return q;
2898 }
2899 
2900 void Beam::SetPropsCastShadows(bool do_cast_shadows)
2901 {
2902  if (cabNode && cabNode->numAttachedObjects() && cabNode->getAttachedObject(0))
2903  {
2904  ((Entity*)(cabNode->getAttachedObject(0)))->setCastShadows(do_cast_shadows);
2905  }
2906  int i;
2907  for (i = 0; i < free_prop; i++)
2908  {
2909  if (props[i].scene_node && props[i].scene_node->numAttachedObjects())
2910  {
2911  props[i].scene_node->getAttachedObject(0)->setCastShadows(do_cast_shadows);
2912  }
2913  if (props[i].wheel && props[i].wheel->numAttachedObjects())
2914  {
2915  props[i].wheel->getAttachedObject(0)->setCastShadows(do_cast_shadows);
2916  }
2917  }
2918  for (i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
2919  {
2920  if (vwheels[i].cnode && vwheels[i].cnode->numAttachedObjects())
2921  {
2922  vwheels[i].cnode->getAttachedObject(0)->setCastShadows(do_cast_shadows);
2923  }
2924  }
2925  for (i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
2926  {
2927  if (beams[i].mEntity)
2928  {
2929  beams[i].mEntity->setCastShadows(do_cast_shadows);
2930  }
2931  }
2932 }
2933 
2934 void Beam::prepareInside(bool inside)
2935 {
2936  isInside = inside;
2937 
2938  if (inside)
2939  {
2940  mCamera->setNearClipDistance(0.1f);
2941 
2942  // enable transparent seat
2943  MaterialPtr seatmat = (MaterialPtr)(MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName("driversseat"));
2944  seatmat->setDepthWriteEnabled(false);
2945  seatmat->setSceneBlending(SBT_TRANSPARENT_ALPHA);
2946  }
2947  else
2948  {
2949  if (dash)
2950  {
2951  dash->setVisible(false);
2952  }
2953 
2954  mCamera->setNearClipDistance(0.5f);
2955 
2956  // disable transparent seat
2957  MaterialPtr seatmat = (MaterialPtr)(MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName("driversseat"));
2958  seatmat->setDepthWriteEnabled(true);
2959  seatmat->setSceneBlending(SBT_REPLACE);
2960  }
2961 
2962  if (cabNode != nullptr)
2963  {
2964  m_gfx_actor->GetCabTransMaterial()->setReceiveShadows(!inside);
2965  }
2966 
2967  if (shadowOptimizations)
2968  {
2969  SetPropsCastShadows(!inside);
2970  }
2971 }
2972 
2973 void Beam::lightsToggle()
2974 {
2975  // no lights toggling in skeleton mode because of possible bug with emissive texture
2976  if (m_skeletonview_is_active)
2977  return;
2978 
2979  Beam** trucks = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getTrucks();
2980  int trucksnum = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getTruckCount();
2981 
2982  // export light command
2983  Beam* current_truck = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getCurrentTruck();
2984  if (state == SIMULATED && this == current_truck && forwardcommands)
2985  {
2986  for (int i = 0; i < trucksnum; i++)
2987  {
2988  if (trucks[i] && trucks[i]->state == SIMULATED && this->trucknum != i && trucks[i]->importcommands)
2989  trucks[i]->lightsToggle();
2990  }
2991  }
2992  lights = !lights;
2993  if (!lights)
2994  {
2995  for (size_t i = 0; i < flares.size(); i++)
2996  {
2997  if (flares[i].type == 'f')
2998  {
2999  flares[i].snode->setVisible(false);
3000  if (flares[i].bbs)
3001  flares[i].snode->detachAllObjects();
3002  if (flares[i].light)
3003  flares[i].light->setVisible(false);
3004  flares[i].isVisible = false;
3005  }
3006  }
3007  }
3008  else
3009  {
3010  for (size_t i = 0; i < flares.size(); i++)
3011  {
3012  if (flares[i].type == 'f')
3013  {
3014  if (flares[i].light)
3015  flares[i].light->setVisible(true);
3016  flares[i].isVisible = true;
3017  if (flares[i].bbs)
3018  flares[i].snode->attachObject(flares[i].bbs);
3019  }
3020  }
3021  }
3022 
3023  m_gfx_actor->SetCabLightsActive(lights != 0);
3024 
3025  TRIGGER_EVENT(SE_TRUCK_LIGHT_TOGGLE, trucknum);
3026 }
3027 
3028 void Beam::updateFlares(float dt, bool isCurrent)
3029 {
3030  if (mTimeUntilNextToggle > -1)
3031  mTimeUntilNextToggle -= dt;
3032 
3033  if (m_flares_mode == App::GFX_FLARES_NONE) { return; }
3034 
3035  bool enableAll = true;
3036  if ((m_flares_mode == App::GFX_FLARES_CURR_VEHICLE_HEAD_ONLY) && !isCurrent) { enableAll = false; }
3037 
3038  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_updateFlares);
3039 
3040  //okay, this is just ugly, we have flares in props!
3041  //we have to update them here because they run
3042 
3043  Ogre::Vector3 camera_position = mCamera->getPosition();
3044 
3045  if (m_beacon_light_is_active)
3046  {
3047  for (int i = 0; i < free_prop; i++)
3048  {
3049  if (props[i].beacontype == 'b')
3050  {
3051  // Get data
3052  Ogre::SceneNode* beacon_scene_node = props[i].scene_node;
3053  Quaternion beacon_orientation = beacon_scene_node->getOrientation();
3054  Ogre::Light* beacon_light = props[i].beacon_light[0];
3055  float beacon_rotation_rate = props[i].beacon_light_rotation_rate[0];
3056  float beacon_rotation_angle = props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[0]; // Updated at end of block
3057 
3058  // Transform
3059  beacon_light->setPosition(beacon_scene_node->getPosition() + beacon_orientation * Vector3(0, 0, 0.12));
3060  beacon_rotation_angle += dt * beacon_rotation_rate;//rotate baby!
3061  beacon_light->setDirection(beacon_orientation * Vector3(cos(beacon_rotation_angle), sin(beacon_rotation_angle), 0));
3062  //billboard
3063  Vector3 vdir = beacon_light->getPosition() - camera_position; // Any reason to query light position instead of scene node position? Where is light position updated, anyway? ~ only_a_ptr, 2015/11
3064  float vlen = vdir.length();
3065  if (vlen > 100.0)
3066  {
3067  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(false);
3068  continue;
3069  }
3070  //normalize
3071  vdir = vdir / vlen;
3072  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setPosition(beacon_light->getPosition() - vdir * 0.1);
3073  float amplitude = beacon_light->getDirection().dotProduct(vdir);
3074  if (amplitude > 0)
3075  {
3076  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(true);
3077  props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setDefaultDimensions(amplitude * amplitude * amplitude, amplitude * amplitude * amplitude);
3078  }
3079  else
3080  {
3081  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(false);
3082  }
3083  beacon_light->setVisible(enableAll);
3084 
3085  // Update
3086  props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[0] = beacon_rotation_angle;
3087  // NOTE: Light position is not updated here!
3088  }
3089  else if (props[i].beacontype == 'p')
3090  {
3091  for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++)
3092  {
3093  //update light
3094  Quaternion orientation = props[i].scene_node->getOrientation();
3095  switch (k)
3096  {
3097  case 0: props[i].beacon_light[k]->setPosition(props[i].scene_node->getPosition() + orientation * Vector3(-0.64, 0, 0.14));
3098  break;
3099  case 1: props[i].beacon_light[k]->setPosition(props[i].scene_node->getPosition() + orientation * Vector3(-0.32, 0, 0.14));
3100  break;
3101  case 2: props[i].beacon_light[k]->setPosition(props[i].scene_node->getPosition() + orientation * Vector3(+0.32, 0, 0.14));
3102  break;
3103  case 3: props[i].beacon_light[k]->setPosition(props[i].scene_node->getPosition() + orientation * Vector3(+0.64, 0, 0.14));
3104  break;
3105  }
3106  props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[k] += dt * props[i].beacon_light_rotation_rate[k];//rotate baby!
3107  props[i].beacon_light[k]->setDirection(orientation * Vector3(cos(props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[k]), sin(props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[k]), 0));
3108  //billboard
3109  Vector3 vdir = props[i].beacon_light[k]->getPosition() - mCamera->getPosition();
3110  float vlen = vdir.length();
3111  if (vlen > 100.0)
3112  {
3113  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->setVisible(false);
3114  continue;
3115  }
3116  //normalize
3117  vdir = vdir / vlen;
3118  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->setPosition(props[i].beacon_light[k]->getPosition() - vdir * 0.2);
3119  float amplitude = props[i].beacon_light[k]->getDirection().dotProduct(vdir);
3120  if (amplitude > 0)
3121  {
3122  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->setVisible(true);
3123  props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[k]->setDefaultDimensions(amplitude * amplitude * amplitude, amplitude * amplitude * amplitude);
3124  }
3125  else
3126  {
3127  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->setVisible(false);
3128  }
3129  props[i].beacon_light[k]->setVisible(enableAll);
3130  }
3131  }
3132  else if (props[i].beacontype == 'r')
3133  {
3134  //update light
3135  Quaternion orientation = props[i].scene_node->getOrientation();
3136  props[i].beacon_light[0]->setPosition(props[i].scene_node->getPosition() + orientation * Vector3(0, 0, 0.06));
3137  props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[0] += dt * props[i].beacon_light_rotation_rate[0];//rotate baby!
3138  //billboard
3139  Vector3 vdir = props[i].beacon_light[0]->getPosition() - mCamera->getPosition();
3140  float vlen = vdir.length();
3141  if (vlen > 100.0)
3142  {
3143  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(false);
3144  continue;
3145  }
3146  //normalize
3147  vdir = vdir / vlen;
3148  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setPosition(props[i].beacon_light[0]->getPosition() - vdir * 0.1);
3149  bool visible = false;
3150  if (props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[0] > 1.0)
3151  {
3152  props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[0] = 0.0;
3153  visible = true;
3154  }
3155  visible = visible && enableAll;
3156  props[i].beacon_light[0]->setVisible(visible);
3157  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(visible);
3158  }
3159  if (props[i].beacontype == 'R' || props[i].beacontype == 'L')
3160  {
3161  Vector3 mposition = nodes[props[i].noderef].AbsPosition + props[i].offsetx * (nodes[props[i].nodex].AbsPosition - nodes[props[i].noderef].AbsPosition) + props[i].offsety * (nodes[props[i].nodey].AbsPosition - nodes[props[i].noderef].AbsPosition);
3162  //billboard
3163  Vector3 vdir = mposition - mCamera->getPosition();
3164  float vlen = vdir.length();
3165  if (vlen > 100.0)
3166  {
3167  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(false);
3168  continue;
3169  }
3170  //normalize
3171  vdir = vdir / vlen;
3172  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setPosition(mposition - vdir * 0.1);
3173  }
3174  if (props[i].beacontype == 'w')
3175  {
3176  Vector3 mposition = nodes[props[i].noderef].AbsPosition + props[i].offsetx * (nodes[props[i].nodex].AbsPosition - nodes[props[i].noderef].AbsPosition) + props[i].offsety * (nodes[props[i].nodey].AbsPosition - nodes[props[i].noderef].AbsPosition);
3177  props[i].beacon_light[0]->setPosition(mposition);
3178  props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[0] += dt * props[i].beacon_light_rotation_rate[0];//rotate baby!
3179  //billboard
3180  Vector3 vdir = mposition - mCamera->getPosition();
3181  float vlen = vdir.length();
3182  if (vlen > 100.0)
3183  {
3184  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(false);
3185  continue;
3186  }
3187  //normalize
3188  vdir = vdir / vlen;
3189  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setPosition(mposition - vdir * 0.1);
3190  bool visible = false;
3191  if (props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[0] > 1.0)
3192  {
3193  props[i].beacon_light_rotation_angle[0] = 0.0;
3194  visible = true;
3195  }
3196  visible = visible && enableAll;
3197  props[i].beacon_light[0]->setVisible(visible);
3198  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(visible);
3199  }
3200  }
3201  }
3202  //the flares
3203  bool keysleep = false;
3204  for (size_t i = 0; i < this->flares.size(); i++)
3205  {
3206  // let the light blink
3207  if (flares[i].blinkdelay != 0)
3208  {
3209  flares[i].blinkdelay_curr -= dt;
3210  if (flares[i].blinkdelay_curr <= 0)
3211  {
3212  flares[i].blinkdelay_curr = flares[i].blinkdelay;
3213  flares[i].blinkdelay_state = !flares[i].blinkdelay_state;
3214  }
3215  }
3216  else
3217  {
3218  flares[i].blinkdelay_state = true;
3219  }
3220 
3221  // manage light states
3222  bool isvisible = true; //this must be true to be able to switch on the frontlight
3223  if (flares[i].type == 'f')
3224  {
3225  m_gfx_actor->SetMaterialFlareOn(i, (lights == 1));
3226  if (!lights)
3227  continue;
3228  }
3229  else if (flares[i].type == 'b')
3230  {
3231  isvisible = getBrakeLightVisible();
3232  }
3233  else if (flares[i].type == 'R')
3234  {
3235  if (engine || reverselight)
3236  isvisible = getReverseLightVisible();
3237  else
3238  isvisible = false;
3239  }
3240  else if (flares[i].type == 'u' && flares[i].controlnumber != -1)
3241  {
3242  if (state == SIMULATED && this == m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getCurrentTruck()) // no network!!
3243  {
3244  // networked customs are set directly, so skip this
3245  if (RoR::App::GetInputEngine()->getEventBoolValue(EV_TRUCK_LIGHTTOGGLE01 + (flares[i].controlnumber - 1)) && mTimeUntilNextToggle <= 0)
3246  {
3247  flares[i].controltoggle_status = ! flares[i].controltoggle_status;
3248  keysleep = true;
3249  }
3250  }
3251  isvisible = flares[i].controltoggle_status;
3252  }
3253  else if (flares[i].type == 'l')
3254  {
3255  isvisible = (blinkingtype == BLINK_LEFT || blinkingtype == BLINK_WARN);
3256  }
3257  else if (flares[i].type == 'r')
3258  {
3259  isvisible = (blinkingtype == BLINK_RIGHT || blinkingtype == BLINK_WARN);
3260  }
3261  // apply blinking
3262  isvisible = isvisible && flares[i].blinkdelay_state;
3263 
3264  if (flares[i].type == 'l' && blinkingtype == BLINK_LEFT)
3265  {
3266  left_blink_on = isvisible;
3267 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
3268  if (left_blink_on)
3269  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigOnce(trucknum, SS_TRIG_TURN_SIGNAL_TICK);
3270 #endif //USE_OPENAL
3271  dash->setBool(DD_SIGNAL_TURNLEFT, isvisible);
3272  }
3273  else if (flares[i].type == 'r' && blinkingtype == BLINK_RIGHT)
3274  {
3275  right_blink_on = isvisible;
3276 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
3277  if (right_blink_on)
3278  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigOnce(trucknum, SS_TRIG_TURN_SIGNAL_TICK);
3279 #endif //USE_OPENAL
3280  dash->setBool(DD_SIGNAL_TURNRIGHT, isvisible);
3281  }
3282  else if (flares[i].type == 'l' && blinkingtype == BLINK_WARN)
3283  {
3284  warn_blink_on = isvisible;
3285 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
3286  if (warn_blink_on)
3287  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigOnce(trucknum, SS_TRIG_TURN_SIGNAL_WARN_TICK);
3288 #endif //USE_OPENAL
3289  dash->setBool(DD_SIGNAL_TURNRIGHT, isvisible);
3290  dash->setBool(DD_SIGNAL_TURNLEFT, isvisible);
3291  }
3292 
3293  // update material Bindings
3294  m_gfx_actor->SetMaterialFlareOn(i, isvisible);
3295 
3296  flares[i].snode->setVisible(isvisible);
3297  if (flares[i].light)
3298  flares[i].light->setVisible(isvisible && enableAll);
3299  flares[i].isVisible = isvisible;
3300 
3301  Vector3 normal = (nodes[flares[i].nodey].AbsPosition - nodes[flares[i].noderef].AbsPosition).crossProduct(nodes[flares[i].nodex].AbsPosition - nodes[flares[i].noderef].AbsPosition);
3302  normal.normalise();
3303  Vector3 mposition = nodes[flares[i].noderef].AbsPosition + flares[i].offsetx * (nodes[flares[i].nodex].AbsPosition - nodes[flares[i].noderef].AbsPosition) + flares[i].offsety * (nodes[flares[i].nodey].AbsPosition - nodes[flares[i].noderef].AbsPosition);
3304  Vector3 vdir = mposition - mCamera->getPosition();
3305  float vlen = vdir.length();
3306  // not visible from 500m distance
3307  if (vlen > 500.0)
3308  {
3309  flares[i].snode->setVisible(false);
3310  continue;
3311  }
3312  //normalize
3313  vdir = vdir / vlen;
3314  float amplitude = normal.dotProduct(vdir);
3315  flares[i].snode->setPosition(mposition - 0.1 * amplitude * normal * flares[i].offsetz);
3316  flares[i].snode->setDirection(normal);
3317  float fsize = flares[i].size;
3318  if (fsize < 0)
3319  {
3320  amplitude = 1;
3321  fsize *= -1;
3322  }
3323  if (flares[i].light)
3324  {
3325  flares[i].light->setPosition(mposition - 0.2 * amplitude * normal);
3326  // point the real light towards the ground a bit
3327  flares[i].light->setDirection(-normal - Vector3(0, 0.2, 0));
3328  }
3329  if (flares[i].isVisible)
3330  {
3331  if (amplitude > 0)
3332  {
3333  flares[i].bbs->setDefaultDimensions(amplitude * fsize, amplitude * fsize);
3334  flares[i].snode->setVisible(true);
3335  }
3336  else
3337  {
3338  flares[i].snode->setVisible(false);
3339  }
3340  }
3341  //flares[i].bbs->_updateBounds();
3342  }
3343  if (keysleep)
3344  mTimeUntilNextToggle = 0.2;
3345  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_updateFlares);
3346 }
3347 
3348 void Beam::setBlinkType(blinktype blink)
3349 {
3350  blinkingtype = blink;
3351 
3352  left_blink_on = false;
3353  right_blink_on = false;
3354  warn_blink_on = false;
3355 
3356 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
3357  if (blink == BLINK_NONE)
3358  {
3359  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigStop(trucknum, SS_TRIG_TURN_SIGNAL);
3360  }
3361  else
3362  {
3363  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigStart(trucknum, SS_TRIG_TURN_SIGNAL);
3364  }
3365 #endif //OPENAL
3366 }
3367 
3368 void Beam::autoBlinkReset()
3369 {
3370  blinktype blink = getBlinkType();
3371 
3372  // TODO: make this set-able per truck
3373  float blink_lock_range = 0.1f;
3374 
3375  if (blink == BLINK_LEFT && hydrodirstate < -blink_lock_range)
3376  // passed the threshold: the turn signal gets locked
3377  blinktreshpassed = true;
3378 
3379  if (blink == BLINK_LEFT && blinktreshpassed && hydrodirstate > -blink_lock_range)
3380  {
3381  // steering wheel turned back: turn signal gets automatically unlocked
3382  setBlinkType(BLINK_NONE);
3383  blinktreshpassed = false;
3384  }
3385 
3386  // same for the right turn signal
3387  if (blink == BLINK_RIGHT && hydrodirstate > blink_lock_range)
3388  blinktreshpassed = true;
3389 
3390  if (blink == BLINK_RIGHT && blinktreshpassed && hydrodirstate < blink_lock_range)
3391  {
3392  setBlinkType(BLINK_NONE);
3393  blinktreshpassed = false;
3394  }
3395 
3396  bool stopblink = false;
3397  dash->setBool(DD_SIGNAL_TURNLEFT, stopblink);
3398  dash->setBool(DD_SIGNAL_TURNRIGHT, stopblink);
3399 }
3400 
3401 void Beam::updateProps()
3402 {
3403  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_updateProps);
3404 
3405  for (int i = 0; i < free_prop; i++)
3406  {
3407  if (!props[i].scene_node)
3408  continue;
3409 
3410  Vector3 diffX = nodes[props[i].nodex].AbsPosition - nodes[props[i].noderef].AbsPosition;
3411  Vector3 diffY = nodes[props[i].nodey].AbsPosition - nodes[props[i].noderef].AbsPosition;
3412 
3413  Vector3 normal = (diffY.crossProduct(diffX)).normalisedCopy();
3414 
3415  Vector3 mposition = nodes[props[i].noderef].AbsPosition + props[i].offsetx * diffX + props[i].offsety * diffY;
3416  props[i].scene_node->setPosition(mposition + normal * props[i].offsetz);
3417 
3418  Vector3 refx = diffX.normalisedCopy();
3419  Vector3 refy = refx.crossProduct(normal);
3420  Quaternion orientation = Quaternion(refx, normal, refy) * props[i].rot;
3421  props[i].scene_node->setOrientation(orientation);
3422 
3423  if (props[i].wheel)
3424  {
3425  Quaternion brot = Quaternion(Degree(-59.0), Vector3::UNIT_X);
3426  brot = brot * Quaternion(Degree(hydrodirwheeldisplay * props[i].wheelrotdegree), Vector3::UNIT_Y);
3427  props[i].wheel->setPosition(mposition + normal * props[i].offsetz + orientation * props[i].wheelpos);
3428  props[i].wheel->setOrientation(orientation * brot);
3429  }
3430  }
3431 
3432  for (int i = 0; i < free_airbrake; i++)
3433  {
3434  airbrakes[i]->updatePosition((float)airbrakeval / 5.0);
3435  }
3436 
3437  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_updateProps);
3438 }
3439 
3440 void Beam::toggleCustomParticles()
3441 {
3442  cparticle_mode = !cparticle_mode;
3443  for (int i = 0; i < free_cparticle; i++)
3444  {
3445  cparticles[i].active = !cparticles[i].active;
3446  for (int j = 0; j < cparticles[i].psys->getNumEmitters(); j++)
3447  {
3448  cparticles[i].psys->getEmitter(j)->setEnabled(cparticles[i].active);
3449  }
3450  }
3451 
3452  //ScriptEvent - Particle Toggle
3453  TRIGGER_EVENT(SE_TRUCK_CPARTICLES_TOGGLE, trucknum);
3454 }
3455 
3456 void Beam::updateSoundSources()
3457 {
3458  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_updateSoundSources);
3459 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
3460  if (SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().isDisabled())
3461  return;
3462  for (int i = 0; i < free_soundsource; i++)
3463  {
3464  soundsources[i].ssi->setPosition(nodes[soundsources[i].nodenum].AbsPosition, nodes[soundsources[i].nodenum].Velocity);
3465  }
3466  //also this, so it is updated always, and for any vehicle
3467  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().modulate(trucknum, SS_MOD_AIRSPEED, nodes[0].Velocity.length() * 1.9438);
3468  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().modulate(trucknum, SS_MOD_WHEELSPEED, WheelSpeed * 3.6);
3469 #endif //OPENAL
3470  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_updateSoundSources);
3471 }
3472 
3473 void Beam::updateLabels(float dt)
3474 {
3475  if (netLabelNode && netMT)
3476  {
3477  // this ensures that the nickname is always in a readable size
3478  netLabelNode->setPosition(position + Vector3(0.0f, (boundingBox.getMaximum().y - boundingBox.getMinimum().y), 0.0f));
3479  Vector3 vdir = position - mCamera->getPosition();
3480  float vlen = vdir.length();
3481  float h = std::max(0.6, vlen / 30.0);
3482 
3483  netMT->setCharacterHeight(h);
3484  if (vlen > 1000) // 1000 ... vlen
3485  netMT->setCaption(networkUsername + " (" + TOSTRING((float)(ceil(vlen / 100) / 10.0) ) + " km)");
3486  else if (vlen > 20) // 20 ... vlen ... 1000
3487  netMT->setCaption(networkUsername + " (" + TOSTRING((int)vlen) + " m)");
3488  else // 0 ... vlen ... 20
3489  netMT->setCaption(networkUsername);
3490 
3491  //netMT->setAdditionalHeight((boundingBox.getMaximum().y - boundingBox.getMinimum().y) + h + 0.1);
3492  }
3493 }
3494 
3495 void Beam::updateFlexbodiesPrepare()
3496 {
3497  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_updateFlexBodies);
3498 
3499  if (cabNode && cabMesh)
3500  cabNode->setPosition(cabMesh->UpdateFlexObj());
3501 
3502  if (gEnv->threadPool)
3503  {
3504  flexmesh_prepare.reset();
3505  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
3506  {
3507  flexmesh_prepare.set(i, vwheels[i].cnode && vwheels[i].fm->flexitPrepare());
3508  }
3509 
3510  flexbody_prepare.reset();
3511  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
3512  {
3513  flexbody_prepare.set(i, flexbodies[i]->flexitPrepare());
3514  }
3515 
3516  // Push tasks into thread pool
3517  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
3518  {
3519  if (flexbody_prepare[i])
3520  {
3521  auto func = std::function<void()>([this, i]()
3522  {
3523  flexbodies[i]->flexitCompute();
3524  });
3525  auto task_handle = gEnv->threadPool->RunTask(func);
3526  flexbody_tasks.push_back(task_handle);
3527  }
3528  }
3529  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
3530  {
3531  if (flexmesh_prepare[i])
3532  {
3533  auto func = std::function<void()>([this, i]()
3534  {
3535  vwheels[i].fm->flexitCompute();
3536  });
3537  auto task_handle = gEnv->threadPool->RunTask(func);
3538  flexbody_tasks.push_back(task_handle);
3539  }
3540  }
3541  }
3542  else
3543  {
3544  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
3545  {
3546  if (vwheels[i].cnode && vwheels[i].fm->flexitPrepare())
3547  {
3548  vwheels[i].fm->flexitCompute();
3549  vwheels[i].cnode->setPosition(vwheels[i].fm->flexitFinal());
3550  }
3551  }
3552  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
3553  {
3554  if (flexbodies[i]->flexitPrepare())
3555  {
3556  flexbodies[i]->flexitCompute();
3557  flexbodies[i]->flexitFinal();
3558  }
3559  }
3560  }
3561 }
3562 
3563 void Beam::updateVisual(float dt)
3564 {
3565  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_updateVisual);
3566 
3567  Vector3 ref(Vector3::UNIT_Y);
3568  autoBlinkReset();
3569  updateSoundSources();
3570 
3571  if (debugVisuals)
3572  updateDebugOverlay();
3573 
3574 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
3575  //airplane radio chatter
3576  if (driveable == AIRPLANE && state != SLEEPING)
3577  {
3578  // play random chatter at random time
3579  avichatter_timer -= dt;
3580  if (avichatter_timer < 0)
3581  {
3582  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigOnce(trucknum, SS_TRIG_AVICHAT01 + Math::RangeRandom(0, 12));
3583  avichatter_timer = Math::RangeRandom(11, 30);
3584  }
3585  }
3586 #endif //openAL
3587 
3588  //update custom particle systems
3589  for (int i = 0; i < free_cparticle; i++)
3590  {
3591  Vector3 pos = nodes[cparticles[i].emitterNode].AbsPosition;
3592  Vector3 dir = pos - nodes[cparticles[i].directionNode].AbsPosition;
3593  //dir.normalise();
3594  dir = fast_normalise(dir);
3595  cparticles[i].snode->setPosition(pos);
3596  for (int j = 0; j < cparticles[i].psys->getNumEmitters(); j++)
3597  {
3598  cparticles[i].psys->getEmitter(j)->setDirection(dir);
3599  }
3600  }
3601  // update exhausts
3602  if (!disable_smoke && engine && exhausts.size() > 0)
3603  {
3604  std::vector<exhaust_t>::iterator it;
3605  for (it = exhausts.begin(); it != exhausts.end(); it++)
3606  {
3607  if (!it->smoker)
3608  continue;
3609  Vector3 dir = nodes[it->emitterNode].AbsPosition - nodes[it->directionNode].AbsPosition;
3610  // dir.normalise();
3611  ParticleEmitter* emit = it->smoker->getEmitter(0);
3612  it->smokeNode->setPosition(nodes[it->emitterNode].AbsPosition);
3613  emit->setDirection(dir);
3614  if (engine->getSmoke() != -1.0)
3615  {
3616  emit->setEnabled(true);
3617  emit->setColour(ColourValue(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.02 + engine->getSmoke() * 0.06));
3618  emit->setTimeToLive((0.02 + engine->getSmoke() * 0.06) / 0.04);
3619  }
3620  else
3621  {
3622  emit->setEnabled(false);
3623  }
3624  emit->setParticleVelocity(1.0 + engine->getSmoke() * 2.0, 2.0 + engine->getSmoke() * 3.0);
3625  }
3626  }
3627 
3628  updateProps();
3629 
3630  for (int i = 0; i < free_aeroengine; i++)
3631  aeroengines[i]->updateVisuals();
3632 
3633  //wings
3634  float autoaileron = 0;
3635  float autorudder = 0;
3636  float autoelevator = 0;
3637  if (autopilot)
3638  {
3639  autoaileron = autopilot->getAilerons();
3640  autorudder = autopilot->getRudder();
3641  autoelevator = autopilot->getElevator();
3642  autopilot->gpws_update(posnode_spawn_height);
3643  }
3644  autoaileron += aileron;
3645  autorudder += rudder;
3646  autoelevator += elevator;
3647  if (autoaileron < -1.0)
3648  autoaileron = -1.0;
3649  if (autoaileron > 1.0)
3650  autoaileron = 1.0;
3651  if (autorudder < -1.0)
3652  autorudder = -1.0;
3653  if (autorudder > 1.0)
3654  autorudder = 1.0;
3655  if (autoelevator < -1.0)
3656  autoelevator = -1.0;
3657  if (autoelevator > 1.0)
3658  autoelevator = 1.0;
3659  for (int i = 0; i < free_wing; i++)
3660  {
3661  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'a')
3662  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection(autoaileron);
3663  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'b')
3664  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection(-autoaileron);
3665  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'r')
3666  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection(autorudder);
3667  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'e' || wings[i].fa->type == 'S' || wings[i].fa->type == 'T')
3668  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection(autoelevator);
3669  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'f')
3670  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection(flapangles[flap]);
3671  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'c' || wings[i].fa->type == 'V')
3672  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection((autoaileron + autoelevator) / 2.0);
3673  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'd' || wings[i].fa->type == 'U')
3674  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection((-autoaileron + autoelevator) / 2.0);
3675  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'g')
3676  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection((autoaileron + flapangles[flap]) / 2.0);
3677  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'h')
3678  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection((-autoaileron + flapangles[flap]) / 2.0);
3679  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'i')
3680  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection((-autoelevator + autorudder) / 2.0);
3681  if (wings[i].fa->type == 'j')
3682  wings[i].fa->setControlDeflection((autoelevator + autorudder) / 2.0);
3683  wings[i].cnode->setPosition(wings[i].fa->flexit());
3684  }
3685  //setup commands for hydros
3686  hydroaileroncommand = autoaileron;
3687  hydroruddercommand = autorudder;
3688  hydroelevatorcommand = autoelevator;
3689 
3690  if (cabFadeMode > 0 && dt > 0)
3691  {
3692  if (cabFadeTimer > 0)
3693  cabFadeTimer -= dt;
3694 
3695  if (cabFadeTimer < 0.1 && cabFadeMode == 1)
3696  {
3697  cabFadeMode = 0;
3698  cabFade(0.4);
3699  }
3700  else if (cabFadeTimer < 0.1 && cabFadeMode == 2)
3701  {
3702  cabFadeMode = 0;
3703  cabFade(1);
3704  }
3705 
3706  if (cabFadeMode == 1)
3707  cabFade(0.4 + 0.6 * cabFadeTimer / cabFadeTime);
3708  else if (cabFadeMode == 2)
3709  cabFade(1 - 0.6 * cabFadeTimer / cabFadeTime);
3710  }
3711 
3712  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
3713  {
3714  if (!beams[i].mSceneNode)
3715  continue;
3716 
3717  if (beams[i].disabled || beams[i].broken)
3718  {
3719  beams[i].mSceneNode->detachAllObjects();
3720  }
3721  else if (beams[i].type != BEAM_INVISIBLE && beams[i].type != BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO && beams[i].type != BEAM_VIRTUAL)
3722  {
3723  if (beams[i].mSceneNode->numAttachedObjects() == 0)
3724  beams[i].mSceneNode->attachObject(beams[i].mEntity);
3725 
3726  beams[i].mSceneNode->setPosition(beams[i].p1->AbsPosition.midPoint(beams[i].p2->AbsPosition));
3727  beams[i].mSceneNode->setOrientation(specialGetRotationTo(ref, beams[i].p1->AbsPosition - beams[i].p2->AbsPosition));
3728  beams[i].mSceneNode->setScale(beams[i].diameter, (beams[i].p1->AbsPosition - beams[i].p2->AbsPosition).length(), beams[i].diameter);
3729  }
3730  }
3731 
3732  if (m_request_skeletonview_change)
3733  {
3734  if (m_skeletonview_is_active && m_request_skeletonview_change < 0)
3735  {
3736  hideSkeleton(true);
3737  }
3738  else if (!m_skeletonview_is_active && m_request_skeletonview_change > 0)
3739  {
3740  showSkeleton(true, true);
3741  }
3742 
3743  m_request_skeletonview_change = 0;
3744  }
3745 
3746  if (m_skeletonview_is_active)
3747  updateSimpleSkeleton();
3748 
3749  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_updateVisual);
3750 }
3751 
3752 void Beam::joinFlexbodyTasks()
3753 {
3754  if (gEnv->threadPool)
3755  {
3756  for (const auto& t : flexbody_tasks)
3757  {
3758  t->join();
3759  }
3760  flexbody_tasks.clear();
3761  }
3762 }
3763 
3764 void Beam::updateFlexbodiesFinal()
3765 {
3766  if (gEnv->threadPool)
3767  {
3768  joinFlexbodyTasks();
3769 
3770  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
3771  {
3772  if (flexmesh_prepare[i])
3773  vwheels[i].cnode->setPosition(vwheels[i].fm->flexitFinal());
3774  }
3775  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
3776  {
3777  if (flexbody_prepare[i])
3778  flexbodies[i]->flexitFinal();
3779  }
3780  }
3781 
3782  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_updateFlexBodies);
3783 }
3784 
3785 //v=0: full detail
3786 //v=1: no beams
3787 void Beam::setDetailLevel(int v)
3788 {
3789  if (v != detailLevel)
3790  {
3791  if (detailLevel == 0 && v == 1)
3792  {
3793  // detach
3794  gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->removeChild(beamsRoot);
3795  }
3796  if (detailLevel == 1 && v == 0)
3797  {
3798  // attach
3799  gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(beamsRoot);
3800  }
3801  detailLevel = v;
3802  }
3803 }
3804 
3805 void Beam::showSkeleton(bool meshes, bool linked)
3806 {
3807  m_skeletonview_is_active = true;
3808 
3809  if (meshes)
3810  {
3811  cabFadeMode = 1;
3812  cabFadeTimer = cabFadeTime;
3813  }
3814  else
3815  {
3816  cabFadeMode = -1;
3817  // directly hide meshes, no fading
3818  cabFade(0);
3819  }
3820 
3821  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
3822  {
3823  if (vwheels[i].cnode)
3824  vwheels[i].cnode->setVisible(false);
3825 
3826  if (vwheels[i].fm)
3827  vwheels[i].fm->setVisible(false);
3828  }
3829 
3830  for (int i = 0; i < free_prop; i++)
3831  {
3832  if (props[i].scene_node)
3833  setMeshWireframe(props[i].scene_node, true);
3834 
3835  if (props[i].wheel)
3836  setMeshWireframe(props[i].wheel, true);
3837  }
3838 
3839  if (simpleSkeletonNode)
3840  {
3841  simpleSkeletonNode->setVisible(true);
3842  }
3843 
3844  // hide mesh wheels
3845  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
3846  {
3847  if (vwheels[i].fm && vwheels[i].meshwheel)
3848  {
3849  Entity* e = ((FlexMeshWheel*)(vwheels[i].fm))->getRimEntity();
3850  if (e)
3851  e->setVisible(false);
3852  }
3853  }
3854 
3855  // wireframe drawning for flexbody
3856  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
3857  {
3858  SceneNode* s = flexbodies[i]->getSceneNode();
3859  if (s)
3860  setMeshWireframe(s, true);
3861  }
3862 
3863  if (linked)
3864  {
3865  // apply to all locked trucks
3866  determineLinkedBeams();
3867  for (std::list<Beam*>::iterator it = linkedBeams.begin(); it != linkedBeams.end(); ++it)
3868  {
3869  (*it)->showSkeleton(meshes, false);
3870  }
3871  }
3872 
3873  updateSimpleSkeleton();
3874 
3875  TRIGGER_EVENT(SE_TRUCK_SKELETON_TOGGLE, trucknum);
3876 }
3877 
3878 void Beam::hideSkeleton(bool linked)
3879 {
3880  m_skeletonview_is_active = false;
3881 
3882  if (cabFadeMode >= 0)
3883  {
3884  cabFadeMode = 2;
3885  cabFadeTimer = cabFadeTime;
3886  }
3887  else
3888  {
3889  cabFadeMode = -1;
3890  // directly show meshes, no fading
3891  cabFade(1);
3892  }
3893 
3894  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
3895  {
3896  if (vwheels[i].cnode)
3897  vwheels[i].cnode->setVisible(true);
3898 
3899  if (vwheels[i].fm)
3900  vwheels[i].fm->setVisible(true);
3901  }
3902  for (int i = 0; i < free_prop; i++)
3903  {
3904  if (props[i].scene_node)
3905  setMeshWireframe(props[i].scene_node, false);
3906 
3907  if (props[i].wheel)
3908  setMeshWireframe(props[i].wheel, false);
3909  }
3910 
3911  if (simpleSkeletonNode)
3912  simpleSkeletonNode->setVisible(false);
3913 
3914  // show mesh wheels
3915  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
3916  {
3917  if (vwheels[i].fm && vwheels[i].meshwheel)
3918  {
3919  Entity* e = ((FlexMeshWheel *)(vwheels[i].fm))->getRimEntity();
3920  if (e)
3921  e->setVisible(true);
3922  }
3923  }
3924 
3925  // normal drawning for flexbody
3926  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
3927  {
3928  SceneNode* s = flexbodies[i]->getSceneNode();
3929  if (!s)
3930  continue;
3931  setMeshWireframe(s, false);
3932  }
3933 
3934  if (linked)
3935  {
3936  // apply to all locked trucks
3937  determineLinkedBeams();
3938  for (std::list<Beam*>::iterator it = linkedBeams.begin(); it != linkedBeams.end(); ++it)
3939  {
3940  (*it)->hideSkeleton(false);
3941  }
3942  }
3943 }
3944 
3945 void Beam::fadeMesh(SceneNode* node, float amount)
3946 {
3947  for (int a = 0; a < node->numAttachedObjects(); a++)
3948  {
3949  Entity* e = (Entity *)node->getAttachedObject(a);
3950  MaterialPtr m = e->getSubEntity(0)->getMaterial();
3951  if (m.getPointer() == 0)
3952  continue;
3953  for (int x = 0; x < m->getNumTechniques(); x++)
3954  {
3955  for (int y = 0; y < m->getTechnique(x)->getNumPasses(); y++)
3956  {
3957  // TODO: fix this
3958  //m->getTechnique(x)->getPass(y)->setAlphaRejectValue(0);
3959  if (m->getTechnique(x)->getPass(y)->getNumTextureUnitStates() > 0)
3960  m->getTechnique(x)->getPass(y)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setAlphaOperation(LBX_MODULATE, LBS_TEXTURE, LBS_MANUAL, 1.0, amount);
3961  }
3962  }
3963  }
3964 }
3965 
3966 float Beam::getAlphaRejection(SceneNode* node)
3967 {
3968  for (int a = 0; a < node->numAttachedObjects(); a++)
3969  {
3970  Entity* e = (Entity *)node->getAttachedObject(a);
3971  MaterialPtr m = e->getSubEntity(0)->getMaterial();
3972  if (m.getPointer() == 0)
3973  continue;
3974  for (int x = 0; x < m->getNumTechniques(); x++)
3975  {
3976  for (int y = 0; y < m->getTechnique(x)->getNumPasses(); y++)
3977  {
3978  return m->getTechnique(x)->getPass(y)->getAlphaRejectValue();
3979  }
3980  }
3981  }
3982  return 0;
3983 }
3984 
3985 void Beam::setAlphaRejection(SceneNode* node, float amount)
3986 {
3987  for (int a = 0; a < node->numAttachedObjects(); a++)
3988  {
3989  Entity* e = (Entity *)node->getAttachedObject(a);
3990  MaterialPtr m = e->getSubEntity(0)->getMaterial();
3991  if (m.getPointer() == 0)
3992  continue;
3993  for (int x = 0; x < m->getNumTechniques(); x++)
3994  {
3995  for (int y = 0; y < m->getTechnique(x)->getNumPasses(); y++)
3996  {
3997  m->getTechnique(x)->getPass(y)->setAlphaRejectValue((unsigned char)amount);
3998  return;
3999  }
4000  }
4001  }
4002 }
4003 
4004 void Beam::setMeshWireframe(SceneNode* node, bool value)
4005 {
4006  for (int a = 0; a < node->numAttachedObjects(); a++)
4007  {
4008  Entity* e = (Entity *)node->getAttachedObject(a);
4009  for (int se = 0; se < (int)e->getNumSubEntities(); se++)
4010  {
4011  MaterialPtr m = e->getSubEntity(se)->getMaterial();
4012  if (m.getPointer() == 0)
4013  continue;
4014  for (int x = 0; x < m->getNumTechniques(); x++)
4015  for (int y = 0; y < m->getTechnique(x)->getNumPasses(); y++)
4016  if (value)
4017  m->getTechnique(x)->getPass(y)->setPolygonMode(PM_WIREFRAME);
4018  else
4019  m->getTechnique(x)->getPass(y)->setPolygonMode(PM_SOLID);
4020  }
4021  }
4022 }
4023 
4024 void Beam::setBeamVisibility(bool visible)
4025 {
4026  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
4027  {
4028  if (beams[i].mSceneNode)
4029  {
4030  beams[i].mSceneNode->setVisible(visible);
4031  }
4032  }
4033 
4034  beamsVisible = visible;
4035 }
4036 
4037 void Beam::setMeshVisibility(bool visible)
4038 {
4039  for (int i = 0; i < free_prop; i++)
4040  {
4041  if (props[i].mo)
4042  props[i].mo->setVisible(visible);
4043  if (props[i].wheel)
4044  props[i].wheel->setVisible(visible);
4045  if (props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0])
4046  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(visible);
4047  if (props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[1])
4048  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[1]->setVisible(visible);
4049  if (props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[2])
4050  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[2]->setVisible(visible);
4051  if (props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[3])
4052  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[3]->setVisible(visible);
4053  }
4054  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
4055  {
4056  flexbodies[i]->setVisible(visible);
4057  }
4058  for (int i = 0; i < free_wheel; i++)
4059  {
4060  if (vwheels[i].cnode)
4061  {
4062  vwheels[i].cnode->setVisible(visible);
4063  }
4064  if (vwheels[i].fm)
4065  {
4066  vwheels[i].fm->setVisible(visible);
4067  }
4068  }
4069  if (cabNode)
4070  {
4071  cabNode->setVisible(visible);
4072  }
4073 
4074  meshesVisible = visible;
4075 }
4076 
4077 void Beam::cabFade(float amount)
4078 {
4079  static float savedCabAlphaRejection = 0;
4080 
4081  // truck cab
4082  if (cabNode)
4083  {
4084  if (amount == 0)
4085  {
4086  cabNode->setVisible(false);
4087  }
4088  else
4089  {
4090  if (amount == 1)
4091  cabNode->setVisible(true);
4092  if (savedCabAlphaRejection == 0)
4093  savedCabAlphaRejection = getAlphaRejection(cabNode);
4094  if (amount == 1)
4095  setAlphaRejection(cabNode, savedCabAlphaRejection);
4096  else if (amount < 1)
4097  setAlphaRejection(cabNode, 0);
4098  fadeMesh(cabNode, amount);
4099  }
4100  }
4101 
4102  // wings
4103  for (int i = 0; i < free_wing; i++)
4104  {
4105  if (amount == 0)
4106  {
4107  wings[i].cnode->setVisible(false);
4108  }
4109  else
4110  {
4111  if (amount == 1)
4112  wings[i].cnode->setVisible(true);
4113  fadeMesh(wings[i].cnode, amount);
4114  }
4115  }
4116 }
4117 
4118 void Beam::addInterTruckBeam(beam_t* beam, Beam* a, Beam* b)
4119 {
4120  auto pos = std::find(interTruckBeams.begin(), interTruckBeams.end(), beam);
4121  if (pos == interTruckBeams.end())
4122  {
4123  interTruckBeams.push_back(beam);
4124  }
4125 
4126  std::pair<Beam*, Beam*> truck_pair(a, b);
4127  m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->interTruckLinks[beam] = truck_pair;
4128 
4129  a->determineLinkedBeams();
4130  for (auto truck : a->linkedBeams)
4131  truck->determineLinkedBeams();
4132 
4133  b->determineLinkedBeams();
4134  for (auto truck : b->linkedBeams)
4135  truck->determineLinkedBeams();
4136 }
4137 
4138 void Beam::removeInterTruckBeam(beam_t* beam)
4139 {
4140  auto pos = std::find(interTruckBeams.begin(), interTruckBeams.end(), beam);
4141  if (pos != interTruckBeams.end())
4142  {
4143  interTruckBeams.erase(pos);
4144  }
4145 
4146  auto it = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->interTruckLinks.find(beam);
4147  if (it != m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->interTruckLinks.end())
4148  {
4149  auto truck_pair = it->second;
4150  m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->interTruckLinks.erase(it);
4151 
4152  truck_pair.first->determineLinkedBeams();
4153  for (auto truck : truck_pair.first->linkedBeams)
4154  truck->determineLinkedBeams();
4155 
4156  truck_pair.second->determineLinkedBeams();
4157  for (auto truck : truck_pair.second->linkedBeams)
4158  truck->determineLinkedBeams();
4159  }
4160 }
4161 
4162 void Beam::disjoinInterTruckBeams()
4163 {
4164  interTruckBeams.clear();
4165  auto interTruckLinks = &m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->interTruckLinks;
4166  for (auto it = interTruckLinks->begin(); it != interTruckLinks->end();)
4167  {
4168  auto truck_pair = it->second;
4169  if (this == truck_pair.first || this == truck_pair.second)
4170  {
4171  it->first->p2truck = false;
4172  it->first->disabled = true;
4173  interTruckLinks->erase(it++);
4174 
4175  truck_pair.first->determineLinkedBeams();
4176  for (auto truck : truck_pair.first->linkedBeams)
4177  truck->determineLinkedBeams();
4178 
4179  truck_pair.second->determineLinkedBeams();
4180  for (auto truck : truck_pair.second->linkedBeams)
4181  truck->determineLinkedBeams();
4182  }
4183  else
4184  {
4185  ++it;
4186  }
4187  }
4188 }
4189 
4190 void Beam::tieToggle(int group)
4191 {
4192  Beam** trucks = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getTrucks();
4193  int trucksnum = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getTruckCount();
4194 
4195  // export tie commands
4196  Beam* current_truck = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getCurrentTruck();
4197  if (state == SIMULATED && this == current_truck && forwardcommands)
4198  {
4199  for (int i = 0; i < trucksnum; i++)
4200  {
4201  if (trucks[i] && trucks[i]->state == SIMULATED && this->trucknum != i && trucks[i]->importcommands)
4202  trucks[i]->tieToggle(group);
4203  }
4204  }
4205 
4206  // untie all ties if one is tied
4207  bool istied = false;
4208 
4209  for (std::vector<tie_t>::iterator it = ties.begin(); it != ties.end(); it++)
4210  {
4211  // only handle ties with correct group
4212  if (group != -1 && (it->group != -1 && it->group != group))
4213  continue;
4214 
4215  // if tied, untie it. And the other way round
4216  if (it->tied)
4217  {
4218  istied = !it->beam->disabled;
4219 
4220  // tie is locked and should get unlocked and stop tying
4221  it->tied = false;
4222  it->tying = false;
4223  if (it->lockedto)
4224  it->lockedto->in_use = false;
4225  // disable the ties beam
4226  it->beam->p2 = &nodes[0];
4227  it->beam->p2truck = false;
4228  it->beam->disabled = true;
4229  if (it->locked_truck != this)
4230  {
4231  removeInterTruckBeam(it->beam);
4232  // update skeletonview on the untied truck
4233  it->locked_truck->m_request_skeletonview_change = -1;
4234  }
4235  it->locked_truck = nullptr;
4236  }
4237  }
4238 
4239  // iterate over all ties
4240  if (!istied)
4241  {
4242  for (std::vector<tie_t>::iterator it = ties.begin(); it != ties.end(); it++)
4243  {
4244  // only handle ties with correct group
4245  if (group != -1 && (it->group != -1 && it->group != group))
4246  continue;
4247 
4248  if (!it->tied)
4249  {
4250  // tie is unlocked and should get locked, search new remote ropable to lock to
4251  float mindist = it->beam->refL;
4252  node_t* shorter = 0;
4253  Beam* shtruck = 0;
4254  ropable_t* locktedto = 0;
4255  // iterate over all trucks
4256  for (int t = 0; t < trucksnum; t++)
4257  {
4258  if (!trucks[t])
4259  continue;
4260  if (trucks[t]->state == SLEEPING)
4261  continue;
4262  // and their ropables
4263  for (std::vector<ropable_t>::iterator itr = trucks[t]->ropables.begin(); itr != trucks[t]->ropables.end(); itr++)
4264  {
4265  // if the ropable is not multilock and used, then discard this ropable
4266  if (!itr->multilock && itr->in_use)
4267  continue;
4268 
4269  //skip if tienode is ropable too (no selflock)
4270  if (itr->node->id == it->beam->p1->id)
4271  continue;
4272 
4273  // calculate the distance and record the nearest ropable
4274  float dist = (it->beam->p1->AbsPosition - itr->node->AbsPosition).length();
4275  if (dist < mindist)
4276  {
4277  mindist = dist;
4278  shorter = itr->node;
4279  shtruck = trucks[t];
4280  locktedto = &(*itr);
4281  }
4282  }
4283  }
4284  // if we found a ropable, then tie towards it
4285  if (shorter)
4286  {
4287  // enable the beam and visually display the beam
4288  it->beam->disabled = false;
4289  // now trigger the tying action
4290  it->locked_truck = shtruck;
4291  it->beam->p2 = shorter;
4292  it->beam->p2truck = shtruck != this;
4293  it->beam->stress = 0;
4294  it->beam->L = it->beam->refL;
4295  it->tied = true;
4296  it->tying = true;
4297  it->lockedto = locktedto;
4298  it->lockedto->in_use = true;
4299  if (it->beam->p2truck)
4300  {
4301  addInterTruckBeam(it->beam, this, shtruck);
4302  // update skeletonview on the tied truck
4303  shtruck->m_request_skeletonview_change = m_skeletonview_is_active ? 1 : -1;
4304  }
4305  }
4306  }
4307  }
4308  }
4309 
4310  //ScriptEvent - Tie toggle
4311  TRIGGER_EVENT(SE_TRUCK_TIE_TOGGLE, trucknum);
4312 }
4313 
4314 void Beam::ropeToggle(int group)
4315 {
4316  Beam** trucks = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getTrucks();
4317  int trucksnum = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getTruckCount();
4318 
4319  // iterate over all ropes
4320  for (std::vector<rope_t>::iterator it = ropes.begin(); it != ropes.end(); it++)
4321  {
4322  // only handle ropes with correct group
4323  if (group != -1 && (it->group != -1 && it->group != group))
4324  continue;
4325 
4326  if (it->locked == LOCKED || it->locked == PRELOCK)
4327  {
4328  // we unlock ropes
4329  it->locked = UNLOCKED;
4330  // remove node locking
4331  if (it->lockedto_ropable)
4332  it->lockedto_ropable->in_use = false;
4333  it->lockedto = &nodes[0];
4334  it->lockedtruck = 0;
4335  }
4336  else
4337  {
4338  //we lock ropes
4339  // search new remote ropable to lock to
4340  float mindist = it->beam->L;
4341  node_t* shorter = 0;
4342  Beam* shtruck = 0;
4343  ropable_t* rop = 0;
4344  // iterate over all trucks
4345  for (int t = 0; t < trucksnum; t++)
4346  {
4347  if (!trucks[t])
4348  continue;
4349  if (trucks[t]->state == SLEEPING)
4350  continue;
4351  // and their ropables
4352  for (std::vector<ropable_t>::iterator itr = trucks[t]->ropables.begin(); itr != trucks[t]->ropables.end(); itr++)
4353  {
4354  // if the ropable is not multilock and used, then discard this ropable
4355  if (!itr->multilock && itr->in_use)
4356  continue;
4357 
4358  // calculate the distance and record the nearest ropable
4359  float dist = (it->beam->p1->AbsPosition - itr->node->AbsPosition).length();
4360  if (dist < mindist)
4361  {
4362  mindist = dist;
4363  shorter = itr->node;
4364  shtruck = trucks[t];
4365  rop = &(*itr);
4366  }
4367  }
4368  }
4369  // if we found a ropable, then lock it
4370  if (shorter)
4371  {
4372  //okay, we have found a rope to tie
4373  it->lockedto = shorter;
4374  it->lockedtruck = shtruck;
4375  it->locked = PRELOCK;
4376  it->lockedto_ropable = rop;
4377  it->lockedto_ropable->in_use = true;
4378  }
4379  }
4380  }
4381 }
4382 
4383 void Beam::hookToggle(int group, hook_states mode, int node_number)
4384 {
4385  Beam** trucks = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getTrucks();
4386  int trucksnum = m_sim_controller->GetBeamFactory()->getTruckCount();
4387 
4388  // iterate over all hooks
4389  for (std::vector<hook_t>::iterator it = hooks.begin(); it != hooks.end(); it++)
4390  {
4391  if (mode == MOUSE_HOOK_TOGGLE && it->hookNode->id != node_number)
4392  {
4393  //skip all other nodes except the one manually toggled by mouse
4394  continue;
4395  }
4396  if (mode == HOOK_TOGGLE && group == -1)
4397  {
4398  //manually triggerd (EV_COMMON_LOCK). Toggle all hooks groups with group#: -1, 0, 1 ++
4399  if (it->group <= -2)
4400  continue;
4401  }
4402  if (mode == HOOK_LOCK && group == -2)
4403  {
4404  //automatic lock attempt (cyclic with doupdate). Toggle all hooks groups with group#: -2, -3, -4 --, skip the ones which are not autolock (triggered only)
4405  if (it->group >= -1 || !it->autolock)
4406  continue;
4407  }
4408  if (mode == HOOK_UNLOCK && group == -2)
4409  {
4410  //manual unlock ALL autolock and triggerlock, do not unlock standard hooks (EV_COMMON_AUTOLOCK)
4411  if (it->group >= -1 || !it->autolock)
4412  continue;
4413  }
4414  if ((mode == HOOK_LOCK || mode == HOOK_UNLOCK) && group <= -3)
4415  {
4416  //trigger beam lock or unlock. Toggle one hook group with group#: group
4417  if (it->group != group)
4418  continue;
4419  }
4420  if ((mode == HOOK_LOCK || mode == HOOK_UNLOCK) && group >= -1)
4421  {
4422  continue;
4423  }
4424  if (mode == HOOK_LOCK && it->timer > 0.0f)
4425  {
4426  //check relock delay timer for autolock nodes and skip if not 0
4427  continue;
4428  }
4429 
4430  Beam* lastLockTruck = it->lockTruck; // memorize current value
4431 
4432  // do this only for toggle or lock attempts, skip prelocked or locked nodes for performance
4433  if (mode != HOOK_UNLOCK && it->locked == UNLOCKED)
4434  {
4435  // we lock hooks
4436  // search new remote ropable to lock to
4437  float mindist = it->lockrange;
4438  float distance = 100000000.0f;
4439  // iterate over all trucks
4440  for (int t = 0; t < trucksnum; t++)
4441  {
4442  if (!trucks[t])
4443  continue;
4444  if (trucks[t]->state >= SLEEPING)
4445  continue;
4446  if (t == this->trucknum && !it->selflock)
4447  continue; // don't lock to self
4448 
4449  // do we lock against all nodes or just against ropables?
4450  bool found = false;
4451  if (it->lockNodes)
4452  {
4453  int last_node = 0; // node number storage
4454  // all nodes, so walk them
4455  for (int i = 0; i < trucks[t]->free_node; i++)
4456  {
4457  // skip all nodes with lockgroup 9999 (deny lock)
4458  if (trucks[t]->nodes[i].lockgroup == 9999)
4459  continue;
4460 
4461  // exclude this truck and its current hooknode from the locking search
4462  if (this == trucks[t] && i == it->hookNode->id)
4463  continue;
4464 
4465  // a lockgroup for this hooknode is set -> skip all nodes that do not have the same lockgroup (-1 = default(all nodes))
4466  if (it->lockgroup != -1 && it->lockgroup != trucks[t]->nodes[i].lockgroup)
4467  continue;
4468 
4469  // measure distance
4470  float n2n_distance = (it->hookNode->AbsPosition - trucks[t]->nodes[i].AbsPosition).length();
4471  if (n2n_distance < mindist)
4472  {
4473  if (distance >= n2n_distance)
4474  {
4475  // located a node that is closer
4476  distance = n2n_distance;
4477  last_node = i;
4478  found = true;
4479  }
4480  }
4481  }
4482  if (found)
4483  {
4484  // we found a node, lock to it
4485  it->lockNode = &(trucks[t]->nodes[last_node]);
4486  it->lockTruck = trucks[t];
4487  it->locked = PRELOCK;
4488  }
4489  }
4490  else
4491  {
4492  // we lock against ropables
4493 
4494  node_t* shorter = 0;
4495  Beam* shtruck = 0;
4496 
4497  // and their ropables
4498  for (std::vector<ropable_t>::iterator itr = trucks[t]->ropables.begin(); itr != trucks[t]->ropables.end(); itr++)
4499  {
4500  // if the ropable is not multilock and used, then discard this ropable
4501  if (!itr->multilock && itr->in_use)
4502  continue;
4503 
4504  // calculate the distance and record the nearest ropable
4505  float dist = (it->hookNode->AbsPosition - itr->node->AbsPosition).length();
4506  if (dist < mindist)
4507  {
4508  mindist = dist;
4509  shorter = itr->node;
4510  shtruck = trucks[t];
4511  }
4512  }
4513 
4514  if (shorter)
4515  {
4516  // we found a ropable, lock to it
4517  it->lockNode = shorter;
4518  it->lockTruck = shtruck;
4519  it->locked = PRELOCK;
4520  }
4521  }
4522  }
4523  }
4524  // this is a locked or prelocked hook and its not a locking attempt or the locked truck was removed (p2truck == false)
4525  else if ((it->locked == LOCKED || it->locked == PRELOCK) && (mode != HOOK_LOCK || !it->beam->p2truck))
4526  {
4527  // we unlock ropes
4528  it->locked = PREUNLOCK;
4529  if (it->group <= -2)
4530  {
4531  it->timer = it->timer_preset; //timer reset for autolock nodes
4532  }
4533  it->lockNode = 0;
4534  it->lockTruck = 0;
4535  //disable hook-assistance beam
4536  it->beam->p2 = &nodes[0];
4537  it->beam->p2truck = false;
4538  it->beam->L = (nodes[0].AbsPosition - it->hookNode->AbsPosition).length();
4539  it->beam->disabled = true;
4540  }
4541 
4542  // update skeletonview on the (un)hooked truck
4543  if (it->lockTruck != lastLockTruck)
4544  {
4545  if (it->lockTruck)
4546  {
4547  it->lockTruck->m_request_skeletonview_change = m_skeletonview_is_active ? 1 : -1;
4548  }
4549  else if (lastLockTruck != this)
4550  {
4551  lastLockTruck->m_request_skeletonview_change = -1;
4552  }
4553  }
4554  }
4555 }
4556 
4557 void Beam::parkingbrakeToggle()
4558 {
4559  parkingbrake = !parkingbrake;
4560 
4561 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
4562  if (parkingbrake)
4563  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigStart(trucknum, SS_TRIG_PARK);
4564  else
4565  SoundScriptManager::getSingleton().trigStop(trucknum, SS_TRIG_PARK);
4566 #endif // USE_OPENAL
4567 
4568  //ScriptEvent - Parking Brake toggle
4569  TRIGGER_EVENT(SE_TRUCK_PARKINGBREAK_TOGGLE, trucknum);
4570 }
4571 
4572 void Beam::antilockbrakeToggle()
4573 {
4574  alb_mode = !alb_mode;
4575 }
4576 
4577 void Beam::tractioncontrolToggle()
4578 {
4579  tc_mode = !tc_mode;
4580 }
4581 
4582 void Beam::cruisecontrolToggle()
4583 {
4584  cc_mode = !cc_mode;
4585 
4586  if (cc_mode)
4587  {
4588  cc_target_speed = WheelSpeed;
4589  cc_target_rpm = engine->getRPM();
4590  }
4591  else
4592  {
4593  cc_target_speed = 0;
4594  cc_target_rpm = 0;
4595  cc_accs.clear();
4596  }
4597 }
4598 
4599 void Beam::beaconsToggle()
4600 {
4601  if (m_flares_mode == App::GFX_FLARES_NONE) { return; }
4602 
4603  const bool enableLight = (m_flares_mode != App::GFX_FLARES_NO_LIGHTSOURCES);
4604 
4605  bool beacon_light_is_active = !m_beacon_light_is_active;
4606  for (int i = 0; i < free_prop; i++)
4607  {
4608  char beacon_type = props[i].beacontype;
4609  if (beacon_type == 'b')
4610  {
4611  props[i].beacon_light[0]->setVisible(beacon_light_is_active && enableLight);
4612  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(beacon_light_is_active);
4613  if (props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[0] && beacon_light_is_active && !props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->numAttachedObjects())
4614  {
4615  props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setVisible(true);
4616  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->attachObject(props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]);
4617  }
4618  else if (props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[0] && !beacon_light_is_active)
4619  {
4620  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->detachAllObjects();
4621  props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]->setVisible(false);
4622  }
4623  }
4624  else if (beacon_type == 'R' || beacon_type == 'L')
4625  {
4626  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->setVisible(beacon_light_is_active);
4627  if (props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[0] && beacon_light_is_active && !props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->numAttachedObjects())
4628  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->attachObject(props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[0]);
4629  else if (props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[0] && !beacon_light_is_active)
4630  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[0]->detachAllObjects();
4631  }
4632  else if (beacon_type == 'p')
4633  {
4634  for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++)
4635  {
4636  props[i].beacon_light[k]->setVisible(beacon_light_is_active && enableLight);
4637  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->setVisible(beacon_light_is_active);
4638  if (props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[k] && beacon_light_is_active && !props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->numAttachedObjects())
4639  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->attachObject(props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[k]);
4640  else if (props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[k] && !beacon_light_is_active)
4641  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->detachAllObjects();
4642  }
4643  }
4644  else
4645  {
4646  for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++)
4647  {
4648  if (props[i].beacon_light[k])
4649  {
4650  props[i].beacon_light[k]->setVisible(beacon_light_is_active && enableLight);
4651  }
4652  if (props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k])
4653  {
4654  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->setVisible(beacon_light_is_active);
4655 
4656  if (props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[k] && beacon_light_is_active && !props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->numAttachedObjects())
4657  {
4658  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->attachObject(props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[k]);
4659  }
4660  else if (props[i].beacon_flares_billboard_system[k] && !beacon_light_is_active)
4661  {
4662  props[i].beacon_flare_billboard_scene_node[k]->detachAllObjects();
4663  }
4664  }
4665  }
4666  }
4667  }
4668  m_beacon_light_is_active = beacon_light_is_active;
4669 
4670  //ScriptEvent - Beacon toggle
4671  TRIGGER_EVENT(SE_TRUCK_BEACONS_TOGGLE, trucknum);
4672 }
4673 
4674 void Beam::setReplayMode(bool rm)
4675 {
4676  if (!replay || !replay->isValid())
4677  return;
4678 
4679  if (replaymode && !rm)
4680  {
4681  replaypos = 0;
4682  oldreplaypos = -1;
4683  }
4684 
4685  replaymode = rm;
4686  replay->setVisible(replaymode);
4687 }
4688 
4689 void Beam::setDebugOverlayState(int mode)
4690 {
4691  // enable disable debug visuals
4692  debugVisuals = mode;
4693 
4694  if (nodes_debug.empty())
4695  {
4696  LOG("initializing debugVisuals");
4697  // add node labels
4698  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
4699  {
4700  debugtext_t t;
4701  char nodeName[256] = "", entName[256] = "";
4702  sprintf(nodeName, "%s-nodesDebug-%d", truckname, i);
4703  sprintf(entName, "%s-nodesDebug-%d-Ent", truckname, i);
4704  t.id = i;
4705  t.txt = new MovableText(nodeName, "n" + TOSTRING(i));
4706  t.txt->setFontName("highcontrast_black");
4707  t.txt->setTextAlignment(MovableText::H_LEFT, MovableText::V_BELOW);
4708  //t.txt->setAdditionalHeight(0);
4709  t.txt->showOnTop(true);
4710  t.txt->setCharacterHeight(0.5f);
4711  t.txt->setColor(ColourValue::White);
4712  t.txt->setRenderingDistance(2);
4713 
4714  t.node = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
4715  deletion_sceneNodes.emplace_back(t.node);
4716  t.node->attachObject(t.txt);
4717  t.node->setPosition(nodes[i].AbsPosition);
4718  t.node->setScale(Vector3(0.5, 0.5, 0.5));
4719 
4720  // collision nodes debug, also mimics as node visual
4721  SceneNode* s = t.node->createChildSceneNode();
4722  deletion_sceneNodes.emplace_back(s);
4723  Entity* b = gEnv->sceneManager->createEntity(entName, "sphere.mesh");
4724  deletion_Entities.emplace_back(b);
4725  b->setMaterialName("tracks/transgreen");
4726  s->attachObject(b);
4727  float f = 0.005f;
4728  s->setScale(f, f, f);
4729  nodes_debug.push_back(t);
4730  }
4731 
4732  // add beam labels
4733  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
4734  {
4735  debugtext_t t;
4736  char nodeName[256] = "";
4737  sprintf(nodeName, "%s-beamsDebug-%d", truckname, i);
4738  t.id = i;
4739  t.txt = new MovableText(nodeName, "b" + TOSTRING(i));
4740  t.txt->setFontName("highcontrast_black");
4741  t.txt->setTextAlignment(MovableText::H_LEFT, MovableText::V_BELOW);
4742  //t.txt->setAdditionalHeight(0);
4743  t.txt->showOnTop(true);
4744  t.txt->setCharacterHeight(1);
4745  t.txt->setColor(ColourValue::Black);
4746  t.txt->setRenderingDistance(2);
4747 
4748  t.node = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
4749  deletion_sceneNodes.emplace_back(t.node);
4750  t.node->attachObject(t.txt);
4751 
4752  Vector3 pos = beams[i].p1->AbsPosition - (beams[i].p1->AbsPosition - beams[i].p2->AbsPosition) / 2;
4753  t.node->setPosition(pos);
4754  t.node->setVisible(false);
4755  t.node->setScale(Vector3(0.1, 0.1, 0.1));
4756  beams_debug.push_back(t);
4757  }
4758  }
4759 
4760  // then hide them according to the state:
4761  bool nodesVisible = debugVisuals == 1 || (debugVisuals >= 3 && debugVisuals <= 5);
4762  bool beamsVisible = debugVisuals == 2 || debugVisuals == 3 || (debugVisuals >= 6 && debugVisuals <= 11);
4763 
4764  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = nodes_debug.begin(); it != nodes_debug.end(); it++)
4765  it->node->setVisible(nodesVisible);
4766  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = beams_debug.begin(); it != beams_debug.end(); it++)
4767  it->node->setVisible(beamsVisible);
4768 
4769  updateDebugOverlay();
4770 }
4771 
4772 void Beam::updateDebugOverlay()
4773 {
4774  if (!debugVisuals)
4775  return;
4776 
4777  switch (debugVisuals)
4778  {
4779  case 0: // off
4780  return;
4781  case 1: // node-numbers
4782  // not written dynamically
4783  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = nodes_debug.begin(); it != nodes_debug.end(); it++)
4784  it->node->setPosition(nodes[it->id].AbsPosition);
4785  break;
4786  case 2: // beam-numbers
4787  // not written dynamically
4788  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = beams_debug.begin(); it != beams_debug.end(); it++)
4789  it->node->setPosition(beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - (beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - beams[it->id].p2->AbsPosition) / 2);
4790  break;
4791  case 3: // node-and-beam-numbers
4792  // not written dynamically
4793  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = nodes_debug.begin(); it != nodes_debug.end(); it++)
4794  it->node->setPosition(nodes[it->id].AbsPosition);
4795  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = beams_debug.begin(); it != beams_debug.end(); it++)
4796  it->node->setPosition(beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - (beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - beams[it->id].p2->AbsPosition) / 2);
4797  break;
4798  case 4: // node-mass
4799  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = nodes_debug.begin(); it != nodes_debug.end(); it++)
4800  {
4801  it->node->setPosition(nodes[it->id].AbsPosition);
4802  it->txt->setCaption(TOSTRING(nodes[it->id].mass));
4803  }
4804  break;
4805  case 5: // node-locked
4806  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = nodes_debug.begin(); it != nodes_debug.end(); it++)
4807  {
4808  it->txt->setCaption((nodes[it->id].locked) ? "locked" : "unlocked");
4809  it->node->setPosition(nodes[it->id].AbsPosition);
4810  }
4811  break;
4812  case 6: // beam-compression
4813  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = beams_debug.begin(); it != beams_debug.end(); it++)
4814  {
4815  it->node->setPosition(beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - (beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - beams[it->id].p2->AbsPosition) / 2);
4816  float stress_ratio = beams[it->id].stress / beams[it->id].minmaxposnegstress;
4817  float color_scale = std::abs(stress_ratio);
4818  color_scale = std::min(color_scale, 1.0f);
4819  int scale = (int)(color_scale * 100);
4820  it->txt->setCaption(TOSTRING(scale));
4821  }
4822  break;
4823  case 7: // beam-broken
4824  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = beams_debug.begin(); it != beams_debug.end(); it++)
4825  {
4826  it->node->setPosition(beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - (beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - beams[it->id].p2->AbsPosition) / 2);
4827  if (beams[it->id].broken)
4828  {
4829  it->node->setVisible(true);
4830  it->txt->setCaption("BROKEN");
4831  }
4832  else
4833  {
4834  it->node->setVisible(false);
4835  }
4836  }
4837  break;
4838  case 8: // beam-stress
4839  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = beams_debug.begin(); it != beams_debug.end(); it++)
4840  {
4841  it->node->setPosition(beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - (beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - beams[it->id].p2->AbsPosition) / 2);
4842  it->txt->setCaption(TOSTRING((float) fabs(beams[it->id].stress)));
4843  }
4844  break;
4845  case 9: // beam-strength
4846  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = beams_debug.begin(); it != beams_debug.end(); it++)
4847  {
4848  it->node->setPosition(beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - (beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - beams[it->id].p2->AbsPosition) / 2);
4849  it->txt->setCaption(TOSTRING(beams[it->id].strength));
4850  }
4851  break;
4852  case 10: // beam-hydros
4853  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = beams_debug.begin(); it != beams_debug.end(); it++)
4854  {
4855  if (beams[it->id].type == BEAM_HYDRO || beams[it->id].type == BEAM_INVISIBLE_HYDRO)
4856  {
4857  it->node->setPosition(beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - (beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - beams[it->id].p2->AbsPosition) / 2);
4858  int v = (beams[it->id].L / beams[it->id].Lhydro) * 100;
4859  it->txt->setCaption(TOSTRING(v));
4860  it->node->setVisible(true);
4861  }
4862  else
4863  {
4864  it->node->setVisible(false);
4865  }
4866  }
4867  break;
4868  case 11: // beam-commands
4869  for (std::vector<debugtext_t>::iterator it = beams_debug.begin(); it != beams_debug.end(); it++)
4870  {
4871  it->node->setPosition(beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - (beams[it->id].p1->AbsPosition - beams[it->id].p2->AbsPosition) / 2);
4872  int v = (beams[it->id].L / beams[it->id].commandLong) * 100;
4873  it->txt->setCaption(TOSTRING(v));
4874  }
4875  break;
4876  }
4877 }
4878 
4879 void Beam::updateNetworkInfo()
4880 {
4881  if (!(RoR::App::GetActiveMpState() == RoR::App::MP_STATE_CONNECTED))
4882  return;
4883 
4884 #ifdef USE_SOCKETW
4885  BES_GFX_START(BES_GFX_updateNetworkInfo);
4886 
4887  RoRnet::UserInfo info;
4888 
4889  if (state == NETWORKED)
4890  {
4891  if (!RoR::Networking::GetUserInfo(m_source_id, info))
4892  {
4893  return;
4894  }
4895  }
4896  else
4897  {
4898  info = RoR::Networking::GetLocalUserData();
4899  }
4900 
4901  networkUsername = UTFString(info.username);
4902  networkAuthlevel = info.authstatus;
4903 
4904 #if 0
4905  if (netMT)
4906  {
4907  if (networkAuthlevel & AUTH_ADMIN)
4908  {
4909  netMT->setFontName("highcontrast_red");
4910  } else if (networkAuthlevel & AUTH_RANKED)
4911  {
4912  netMT->setFontName("highcontrast_green");
4913  } else
4914  {
4915  netMT->setFontName("highcontrast_black");
4916  }
4917  }
4918 #endif
4919 
4920  BES_GFX_STOP(BES_GFX_updateNetworkInfo);
4921 #endif //SOCKETW
4922 }
4923 
4924 float Beam::getHeadingDirectionAngle()
4925 {
4926  if (cameranodepos[0] >= 0 && cameranodedir[0] >= 0)
4927  {
4928  Vector3 idir = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition;
4929  return atan2(idir.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_X), (idir).dotProduct(-Vector3::UNIT_Z));
4930  }
4931 
4932  return 0.0f;
4933 }
4934 
4935 bool Beam::getReverseLightVisible()
4936 {
4937  if (state == NETWORKED)
4938  return netReverseLight;
4939 
4940  if (engine)
4941  return (engine->getGear() < 0);
4942 
4943  return reverselight;
4944 }
4945 
4946 void Beam::StopAllSounds()
4947 {
4948  for (int i = 0; i < free_soundsource; i++)
4949  {
4950  if (soundsources[i].ssi)
4951  soundsources[i].ssi->setEnabled(false);
4952  }
4953 }
4954 
4955 void Beam::UnmuteAllSounds()
4956 {
4957  for (int i = 0; i < free_soundsource; i++)
4958  {
4959  bool enabled = (soundsources[i].type == -2 || soundsources[i].type == currentcamera);
4960  soundsources[i].ssi->setEnabled(enabled);
4961  }
4962 }
4963 
4964 void Beam::changedCamera()
4965 {
4966  // change sound setup
4967 #ifdef USE_OPENAL
4968  for (int i = 0; i < free_soundsource; i++)
4969  {
4970  bool enabled = (soundsources[i].type == -2 || soundsources[i].type == currentcamera);
4971  soundsources[i].ssi->setEnabled(enabled);
4972  }
4973 #endif // USE_OPENAL
4974 
4975  // change video camera mode needs for-loop through all video(mirror)cams, check camera mode against currentcamera and then send the right bool
4976  // bool state = true;
4977  // VideoCamera *v = VideoCamera::setActive(state);
4978 
4979  // look for props
4980  for (int i = 0; i < free_prop; i++)
4981  {
4982  bool enabled = (props[i].cameramode == -2 || props[i].cameramode == currentcamera);
4983  if (props[i].mo)
4984  props[i].mo->setMeshEnabled(enabled);
4985  }
4986 
4987  // look for flexbodies
4988  for (int i = 0; i < free_flexbody; i++)
4989  {
4990  bool enabled = (flexbodies[i]->getCameraMode() == -2 || flexbodies[i]->getCameraMode() == currentcamera);
4991  flexbodies[i]->setEnabled(enabled);
4992  }
4993 }
4994 
4995 //Returns the number of active (non bounded) beams connected to a node
4996 int Beam::nodeBeamConnections(int nodeid)
4997 {
4998  int totallivebeams = 0;
4999  for (unsigned int ni = 0; ni < nodebeamconnections[nodeid].size(); ++ni)
5000  {
5001  if (!beams[nodebeamconnections[nodeid][ni]].disabled && !beams[nodebeamconnections[nodeid][ni]].bounded)
5002  totallivebeams++;
5003  }
5004  return totallivebeams;
5005 }
5006 
5007 bool Beam::isTied()
5008 {
5009  for (std::vector<tie_t>::iterator it = ties.begin(); it != ties.end(); it++)
5010  if (it->tied)
5011  return true;
5012  return false;
5013 }
5014 
5015 bool Beam::isLocked()
5016 {
5017  for (std::vector<hook_t>::iterator it = hooks.begin(); it != hooks.end(); it++)
5018  if (it->locked == LOCKED)
5019  return true;
5020  return false;
5021 }
5022 
5023 void Beam::updateDashBoards(float dt)
5024 {
5025  if (!dash)
5026  return;
5027  // some temp vars
5028  Vector3 dir;
5029 
5030  //special case for the editor
5031  if (editorId >= 0)
5032  {
5033  String str = "Position: X=" + TOSTRING(nodes[editorId].AbsPosition.x) + " Y=" + TOSTRING(nodes[editorId].AbsPosition.y) + " Z=" + TOSTRING(nodes[editorId].AbsPosition.z);
5034  // TODO: FIX THIS?
5035  //str += "Angles: 0.0 " + TOSTRING(editor->pturn)+ " "+TOSTRING(editor->ppitch);
5036  //str += "Object: " + String(editor->curtype);
5037  dash->setChar(DD_EDITOR_NODE_INFO, str.c_str());
5038  }
5039 
5040  // engine and gears
5041  if (engine)
5042  {
5043  // gears first
5044  int gear = engine->getGear();
5045  dash->setInt(DD_ENGINE_GEAR, gear);
5046 
5047  int numGears = (int)engine->getNumGears();
5048  dash->setInt(DD_ENGINE_NUM_GEAR, numGears);
5049 
5050  String str = String();
5051 
5052  // now construct that classic gear string
5053  if (gear > 0)
5054  str = TOSTRING(gear) + "/" + TOSTRING(numGears);
5055  else if (gear == 0)
5056  str = String("N");
5057  else
5058  str = String("R");
5059 
5060  dash->setChar(DD_ENGINE_GEAR_STRING, str.c_str());
5061 
5062  // R N D 2 1 String
5063  int cg = engine->getAutoShift();
5064  if (cg != BeamEngine::MANUALMODE)
5065  {
5066  str = ((cg == BeamEngine::REAR) ? "#ffffff" : "#868686") + String("R\n");
5067  str += ((cg == BeamEngine::NEUTRAL) ? "#ff0012" : "#8a000a") + String("N\n");
5068  str += ((cg == BeamEngine::DRIVE) ? "#12ff00" : "#248c00") + String("D\n");
5069  str += ((cg == BeamEngine::TWO) ? "#ffffff" : "#868686") + String("2\n");
5070  str += ((cg == BeamEngine::ONE) ? "#ffffff" : "#868686") + String("1");
5071  }
5072  else
5073  {
5074  //str = "#b8b8b8M\na\nn\nu\na\nl";
5075  str = "#b8b8b8M\na\nn\nu";
5076  }
5077  dash->setChar(DD_ENGINE_AUTOGEAR_STRING, str.c_str());
5078 
5079  // autogears
5080  int autoGear = engine->getAutoShift();
5081  dash->setInt(DD_ENGINE_AUTO_GEAR, autoGear);
5082 
5083  // clutch
5084  float clutch = engine->getClutch();
5085  dash->setFloat(DD_ENGINE_CLUTCH, clutch);
5086 
5087  // accelerator
5088  float acc = engine->getAcc();
5089  dash->setFloat(DD_ACCELERATOR, acc);
5090 
5091  // RPM
5092  float rpm = engine->getRPM();
5093  dash->setFloat(DD_ENGINE_RPM, rpm);
5094 
5095  // turbo
5096  float turbo = engine->getTurboPSI() * 3.34f; // MAGIC :/
5097  dash->setFloat(DD_ENGINE_TURBO, turbo);
5098 
5099  // ignition
5100  bool ign = (engine->hasContact() && !engine->isRunning());
5101  dash->setBool(DD_ENGINE_IGNITION, ign);
5102 
5103  // battery
5104  bool batt = (engine->hasContact() && !engine->isRunning());
5105  dash->setBool(DD_ENGINE_BATTERY, batt);
5106 
5107  // clutch warning
5108  bool cw = (fabs(engine->getTorque()) >= engine->getClutchForce() * 10.0f);
5109  dash->setBool(DD_ENGINE_CLUTCH_WARNING, cw);
5110  }
5111 
5112  // brake
5113  float dash_brake = brake / brakeforce;
5114  dash->setFloat(DD_BRAKE, dash_brake);
5115 
5116  // speedo
5117  float velocity = nodes[0].Velocity.length();
5118 
5119  if (cameranodepos[0] >= 0 && cameranodedir[0] >= 0)
5120  {
5121  Vector3 hdir = (nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition).normalisedCopy();
