5122  velocity = hdir.dotProduct(nodes[0].Velocity);
5123  }
5124  float speed_kph = velocity * 3.6f;
5125  dash->setFloat(DD_ENGINE_SPEEDO_KPH, speed_kph);
5126  float speed_mph = velocity * 2.23693629f;
5127  dash->setFloat(DD_ENGINE_SPEEDO_MPH, speed_mph);
5128 
5129  // roll
5130  if (this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0])) // TODO: why check this on each update when it cannot change after spawn?
5131  {
5132  dir = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranoderoll[0]].RelPosition;
5133  dir.normalise();
5134  float angle = asin(dir.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_Y));
5135  if (angle < -1)
5136  angle = -1;
5137  if (angle > 1)
5138  angle = 1;
5139 
5140  float f = Radian(angle).valueDegrees();
5141  dash->setFloat(DD_ROLL, f);
5142  }
5143 
5144  // active shocks / roll correction
5145  if (this->has_active_shocks)
5146  {
5147  // TOFIX: certainly not working:
5148  float roll_corr = - stabratio * 10.0f;
5149  dash->setFloat(DD_ROLL_CORR, roll_corr);
5150 
5151  bool corr_active = (stabcommand > 0);
5152  dash->setBool(DD_ROLL_CORR_ACTIVE, corr_active);
5153  }
5154 
5155  // pitch
5156  if (this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0]))
5157  {
5158  dir = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition;
5159  dir.normalise();
5160  float angle = asin(dir.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_Y));
5161  if (angle < -1)
5162  angle = -1;
5163  if (angle > 1)
5164  angle = 1;
5165 
5166  float f = Radian(angle).valueDegrees();
5167  dash->setFloat(DD_PITCH, f);
5168  }
5169 
5170  // parking brake
5171  bool pbrake = (parkingbrake > 0);
5172  dash->setBool(DD_PARKINGBRAKE, pbrake);
5173 
5174  // locked lamp
5175  bool locked = isLocked();
5176  dash->setBool(DD_LOCKED, locked);
5177 
5178  // low pressure lamp
5179  bool low_pres = !canwork;
5180  dash->setBool(DD_LOW_PRESSURE, low_pres);
5181 
5182  // lights
5183  bool lightsOn = (lights > 0);
5184  dash->setBool(DD_LIGHTS, lightsOn);
5185 
5186  // Traction Control
5187  if (tc_present)
5188  {
5189  int dash_tc_mode = 1; // 0 = not present, 1 = off, 2 = on, 3 = active
5190  if (tc_mode)
5191  {
5192  if (tractioncontrol)
5193  dash_tc_mode = 3;
5194  else
5195  dash_tc_mode = 2;
5196  }
5197  dash->setInt(DD_TRACTIONCONTROL_MODE, dash_tc_mode);
5198  }
5199 
5200  // Anti Lock Brake
5201  if (alb_present)
5202  {
5203  int dash_alb_mode = 1; // 0 = not present, 1 = off, 2 = on, 3 = active
5204  if (alb_mode)
5205  {
5206  if (antilockbrake)
5207  dash_alb_mode = 3;
5208  else
5209  dash_alb_mode = 2;
5210  }
5211  dash->setInt(DD_ANTILOCKBRAKE_MODE, dash_alb_mode);
5212  }
5213 
5214  // load secured lamp
5215  int ties_mode = 0; // 0 = not locked, 1 = prelock, 2 = lock
5216  if (isTied())
5217  {
5218  if (fabs(commandkey[0].commandValue) > 0.000001f)
5219  ties_mode = 1;
5220  else
5221  ties_mode = 2;
5222  }
5223  dash->setInt(DD_TIES_MODE, ties_mode);
5224 
5225  // Boat things now: screwprops and alike
5226  if (free_screwprop)
5227  {
5228  // the throttle and rudder
5229  for (int i = 0; i < free_screwprop && i < DD_MAX_SCREWPROP; i++)
5230  {
5231  float throttle = screwprops[i]->getThrottle();
5232  dash->setFloat(DD_SCREW_THROTTLE_0 + i, throttle);
5233 
5234  float steering = screwprops[i]->getRudder();
5235  dash->setFloat(DD_SCREW_STEER_0 + i, steering);
5236  }
5237 
5238  // water depth display, only if we have a screw prop at least
5239  if (this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0])) // TODO: Check cam. nodes once on spawn! They never change --> no reason to repeat the check. ~only_a_ptr, 06/2017
5240  {
5241  // position
5242  Vector3 dir = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition;
5243  dir.normalise();
5244 
5245  int low_node = getLowestNode();
5246  if (low_node != -1)
5247  {
5248  Vector3 pos = nodes[low_node].AbsPosition;
5249  float depth = pos.y - gEnv->terrainManager->getHeightFinder()->getHeightAt(pos.x, pos.z);
5250  dash->setFloat(DD_WATER_DEPTH, depth);
5251  }
5252  }
5253 
5254  // water speed
5255  if (this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0]))
5256  {
5257  Vector3 hdir = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition;
5258  hdir.normalise();
5259  float knots = hdir.dotProduct(nodes[cameranodepos[0]].Velocity) * 1.9438f; // 1.943 = m/s in knots/s
5260  dash->setFloat(DD_WATER_SPEED, knots);
5261  }
5262  }
5263 
5264  // now airplane things, aeroengines, etc.
5265  if (free_aeroengine)
5266  {
5267  for (int i = 0; i < free_aeroengine && i < DD_MAX_AEROENGINE; i++)
5268  {
5269  float throttle = aeroengines[i]->getThrottle();
5270  dash->setFloat(DD_AEROENGINE_THROTTLE_0 + i, throttle);
5271 
5272  bool failed = aeroengines[i]->isFailed();
5273  dash->setBool(DD_AEROENGINE_FAILED_0 + i, failed);
5274 
5275  float pcent = aeroengines[i]->getRPMpc();
5276  dash->setFloat(DD_AEROENGINE_RPM_0 + i, pcent);
5277  }
5278  }
5279 
5280  // wings stuff, you dont need an aeroengine
5281  if (free_wing)
5282  {
5283  for (int i = 0; i < free_wing && i < DD_MAX_WING; i++)
5284  {
5285  // Angle of Attack (AOA)
5286  float aoa = wings[i].fa->aoa;
5287  dash->setFloat(DD_WING_AOA_0 + i, aoa);
5288  }
5289  }
5290 
5291  // some things only activate when a wing or an aeroengine is present
5292  if (free_wing || free_aeroengine)
5293  {
5294  //airspeed
5295  {
5296  float ground_speed_kt = nodes[0].Velocity.length() * 1.9438f; // 1.943 = m/s in knots/s
5297 
5298  //tropospheric model valid up to 11.000m (33.000ft)
5299  float altitude = nodes[0].AbsPosition.y;
5300  //float sea_level_temperature = 273.15 + 15.0; //in Kelvin // MAGICs D:
5301  float sea_level_pressure = 101325; //in Pa
5302  //float airtemperature = sea_level_temperature - altitude * 0.0065f; //in Kelvin
5303  float airpressure = sea_level_pressure * pow(1.0f - 0.0065f * altitude / 288.15f, 5.24947f); //in Pa
5304  float airdensity = airpressure * 0.0000120896f; //1.225 at sea level
5305 
5306  float knots = ground_speed_kt * sqrt(airdensity / 1.225f); //KIAS
5307  dash->setFloat(DD_AIRSPEED, knots);
5308  }
5309 
5310  // altimeter (height above ground)
5311  {
5312  float alt = nodes[0].AbsPosition.y * 1.1811f; // MAGIC
5313  dash->setFloat(DD_ALTITUDE, alt);
5314 
5315  char altc[11];
5316  sprintf(altc, "%03u", (int)(nodes[0].AbsPosition.y / 30.48f)); // MAGIC
5317  dash->setChar(DD_ALTITUDE_STRING, altc);
5318  }
5319  }
5320 
5321  dash->setFloat(DD_ODOMETER_TOTAL, odometerTotal);
5322  dash->setFloat(DD_ODOMETER_USER, odometerUser);
5323 
5324  // set the features of this vehicle once
5325  if (!GUIFeaturesChanged)
5326  {
5327  bool hasEngine = (engine != 0);
5328  bool hasturbo = false;
5329  bool autogearVisible = false;
5330 
5331  if (hasEngine)
5332  {
5333  hasturbo = engine->hasTurbo();
5334  autogearVisible = (engine->getAutoShift() != BeamEngine::MANUALMODE);
5335  }
5336 
5337  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_TURBO, hasturbo);
5338  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_GEAR, hasEngine);
5339  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_NUM_GEAR, hasEngine);
5340  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_GEAR_STRING, hasEngine);
5341  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_AUTOGEAR_STRING, hasEngine);
5342  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_AUTO_GEAR, hasEngine);
5343  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_CLUTCH, hasEngine);
5344  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_RPM, hasEngine);
5345  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_IGNITION, hasEngine);
5346  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_BATTERY, hasEngine);
5347  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_CLUTCH_WARNING, hasEngine);
5348 
5349  dash->setEnabled(DD_TRACTIONCONTROL_MODE, tc_present);
5350  dash->setEnabled(DD_ANTILOCKBRAKE_MODE, alb_present);
5351  dash->setEnabled(DD_TIES_MODE, !ties.empty());
5352  dash->setEnabled(DD_LOCKED, !hooks.empty());
5353 
5354  dash->setEnabled(DD_ENGINE_AUTOGEAR_STRING, autogearVisible);
5355 
5356  dash->updateFeatures();
5357  GUIFeaturesChanged = true;
5358  }
5359 
5360  // TODO: compass value
5361 
5362 #if 0
5363  // ADI - attitude director indicator
5364  //roll
5365  Vector3 rollv=curr_truck->nodes[curr_truck->cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition-curr_truck->nodes[curr_truck->cameranoderoll[0]].RelPosition;
5366  rollv.normalise();
5367  float rollangle=asin(rollv.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_Y));
5368 
5369  //pitch
5370  Vector3 dirv=curr_truck->nodes[curr_truck->cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition-curr_truck->nodes[curr_truck->cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition;
5371  dirv.normalise();
5372  float pitchangle=asin(dirv.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_Y));
5373  Vector3 upv=dirv.crossProduct(-rollv);
5374  if (upv.y<0) rollangle=3.14159-rollangle;
5375  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->adibugstexture->setTextureRotate(Radian(-rollangle));
5376  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->aditapetexture->setTextureVScroll(-pitchangle*0.25);
5377  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->aditapetexture->setTextureRotate(Radian(-rollangle));
5378 
5379  // HSI - Horizontal Situation Indicator
5380  Vector3 idir=curr_truck->nodes[curr_truck->cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition-curr_truck->nodes[curr_truck->cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition;
5381  // idir.normalise();
5382  float dirangle=atan2(idir.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_X), idir.dotProduct(-Vector3::UNIT_Z));
5383  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->hsirosetexture->setTextureRotate(Radian(dirangle));
5384  if (curr_truck->autopilot)
5385  {
5386  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->hsibugtexture->setTextureRotate(Radian(dirangle)-Degree(curr_truck->autopilot->heading));
5387  float vdev=0;
5388  float hdev=0;
5389  curr_truck->autopilot->getRadioFix(localizers, free_localizer, &vdev, &hdev);
5390  if (hdev>15) hdev=15;
5391  if (hdev<-15) hdev=-15;
5392  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->hsivtexture->setTextureUScroll(-hdev*0.02);
5393  if (vdev>15) vdev=15;
5394  if (vdev<-15) vdev=-15;
5395  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->hsihtexture->setTextureVScroll(-vdev*0.02);
5396  }
5397 
5398  // VVI - Vertical Velocity Indicator
5399  float vvi=curr_truck->nodes[0].Velocity.y*196.85;
5400  if (vvi<1000.0 && vvi>-1000.0) angle=vvi*0.047;
5401  if (vvi>1000.0 && vvi<6000.0) angle=47.0+(vvi-1000.0)*0.01175;
5402  if (vvi>6000.0) angle=105.75;
5403  if (vvi<-1000.0 && vvi>-6000.0) angle=-47.0+(vvi+1000.0)*0.01175;
5404  if (vvi<-6000.0) angle=-105.75;
5405  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->vvitexture->setTextureRotate(Degree(-angle+90.0));
5406 
5407 
5408  if (curr_truck->aeroengines[0]->getType() == AeroEngine::AEROENGINE_TYPE_TURBOPROP)
5409  {
5410  Turboprop *tp=(Turboprop*)curr_truck->aeroengines[0];
5411  //pitch
5412  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->airpitch1texture->setTextureRotate(Degree(-tp->pitch*2.0));
5413  //torque
5414  pcent=100.0*tp->indicated_torque/tp->max_torque;
5415  if (pcent<60.0) angle=-5.0+pcent*1.9167;
5416  else if (pcent<110.0) angle=110.0+(pcent-60.0)*4.075;
5417  else angle=314.0;
5418  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->airtorque1texture->setTextureRotate(Degree(-angle));
5419  }
5420 
5421  if (ftp>1 && curr_truck->aeroengines[1]->getType()==AeroEngine::AEROENGINE_TYPE_TURBOPROP)
5422  {
5423  Turboprop *tp=(Turboprop*)curr_truck->aeroengines[1];
5424  //pitch
5425  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->airpitch2texture->setTextureRotate(Degree(-tp->pitch*2.0));
5426  //torque
5427  pcent=100.0*tp->indicated_torque/tp->max_torque;
5428  if (pcent<60.0) angle=-5.0+pcent*1.9167;
5429  else if (pcent<110.0) angle=110.0+(pcent-60.0)*4.075;
5430  else angle=314.0;
5431  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->airtorque2texture->setTextureRotate(Degree(-angle));
5432  }
5433 
5434  if (ftp>2 && curr_truck->aeroengines[2]->getType()==AeroEngine::AEROENGINE_TYPE_TURBOPROP)
5435  {
5436  Turboprop *tp=(Turboprop*)curr_truck->aeroengines[2];
5437  //pitch
5438  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->airpitch3texture->setTextureRotate(Degree(-tp->pitch*2.0));
5439  //torque
5440  pcent=100.0*tp->indicated_torque/tp->max_torque;
5441  if (pcent<60.0) angle=-5.0+pcent*1.9167;
5442  else if (pcent<110.0) angle=110.0+(pcent-60.0)*4.075;
5443  else angle=314.0;
5444  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->airtorque3texture->setTextureRotate(Degree(-angle));
5445  }
5446 
5447  if (ftp>3 && curr_truck->aeroengines[3]->getType()==AeroEngine::AEROENGINE_TYPE_TURBOPROP)
5448  {
5449  Turboprop *tp=(Turboprop*)curr_truck->aeroengines[3];
5450  //pitch
5451  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->airpitch4texture->setTextureRotate(Degree(-tp->pitch*2.0));
5452  //torque
5453  pcent=100.0*tp->indicated_torque/tp->max_torque;
5454  if (pcent<60.0) angle=-5.0+pcent*1.9167;
5455  else if (pcent<110.0) angle=110.0+(pcent-60.0)*4.075;
5456  else angle=314.0;
5457  RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->airtorque4texture->setTextureRotate(Degree(-angle));
5458  }
5459 
5460  //starters
5461  if (curr_truck->aeroengines[0]->getIgnition()) RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->engstarto1->setMaterialName("tracks/engstart-on"); else RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->engstarto1->setMaterialName("tracks/engstart-off");
5462  if (ftp>1 && curr_truck->aeroengines[1]->getIgnition()) RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->engstarto2->setMaterialName("tracks/engstart-on"); else RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->engstarto2->setMaterialName("tracks/engstart-off");
5463  if (ftp>2 && curr_truck->aeroengines[2]->getIgnition()) RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->engstarto3->setMaterialName("tracks/engstart-on"); else RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->engstarto3->setMaterialName("tracks/engstart-off");
5464  if (ftp>3 && curr_truck->aeroengines[3]->getIgnition()) RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->engstarto4->setMaterialName("tracks/engstart-on"); else RoR::App::GetOverlayWrapper()->engstarto4->setMaterialName("tracks/engstart-off");
5465 }
5466 
5467 #endif //0
5468  dash->update(dt);
5469 }
5470 
5471 Vector3 Beam::getGForces()
5472 {
5473  // TODO: Check cam. nodes once on spawn! They never change --> no reason to repeat the check. ~only_a_ptr, 06/2017
5474  if (this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0]) && this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodedir[0]) && this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranoderoll[0]))
5475  {
5476  static Vector3 result = Vector3::ZERO;
5477 
5478  if (cameranodecount == 0) // multiple calls in one single frame, avoid division by 0
5479  {
5480  return result;
5481  }
5482 
5483  Vector3 acc = cameranodeacc / cameranodecount;
5484  cameranodeacc = Vector3::ZERO;
5485  cameranodecount = 0;
5486 
5487  float longacc = acc.dotProduct((nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition).normalisedCopy());
5488  float latacc = acc.dotProduct((nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranoderoll[0]].RelPosition).normalisedCopy());
5489 
5490  Vector3 diffdir = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition;
5491  Vector3 diffroll = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranoderoll[0]].RelPosition;
5492 
5493  Vector3 upv = diffdir.crossProduct(-diffroll);
5494  upv.normalise();
5495 
5496  float gravity = DEFAULT_GRAVITY;
5497 
5498  if (gEnv->terrainManager)
5499  {
5500  gravity = gEnv->terrainManager->getGravity();
5501  }
5502 
5503  float vertacc = std::abs(gravity) - acc.dotProduct(-upv);
5504 
5505  result = Vector3(vertacc / std::abs(gravity), longacc / std::abs(gravity), latacc / std::abs(gravity));
5506 
5507  return result;
5508  }
5509 
5510  return Vector3::ZERO;
5511 }
5512 
5513 void Beam::triggerGUIFeaturesChanged()
5514 {
5515  GUIFeaturesChanged = true;
5516 }
5517 
5518 void Beam::engineTriggerHelper(int engineNumber, int type, float triggerValue)
5519 {
5520  // engineNumber tells us which engine
5521  BeamEngine* e = engine; // placeholder: trucks do not have multiple engines yet
5522 
5523  switch (type)
5524  {
5525  case TRG_ENGINE_CLUTCH:
5526  if (e)
5527  e->setClutch(triggerValue);
5528  break;
5529  case TRG_ENGINE_BRAKE:
5530  brake = triggerValue * brakeforce;
5531  break;
5532  case TRG_ENGINE_ACC:
5533  if (e)
5534  e->setAcc(triggerValue);
5535  break;
5536  case TRG_ENGINE_RPM:
5537  // TODO: Implement setTargetRPM in the BeamEngine.cpp
5538  break;
5539  case TRG_ENGINE_SHIFTUP:
5540  if (e)
5541  e->shift(1);
5542  break;
5543  case TRG_ENGINE_SHIFTDOWN:
5544  if (e)
5545  e->shift(-1);
5546  break;
5547  default:
5548  break;
5549  }
5550 }
5551 
5552 Beam::Beam(
5553  RoRFrameListener* sim_controller,
5554  int truck_number,
5555  Ogre::Vector3 pos,
5556  Ogre::Quaternion rot,
5557  const char* fname,
5558  RoR::RigLoadingProfiler* rig_loading_profiler,
5559  bool _networked, /* = false */
5560  bool _networking, /* = false */
5561  collision_box_t* spawnbox, /* = nullptr */
5562  bool ismachine, /* = false */
5563  const std::vector<Ogre::String>* truckconfig, /* = nullptr */
5564  RoR::SkinDef* skin, /* = nullptr */
5565  bool freeposition, /* = false */
5566  bool preloaded_with_terrain, /* = false */
5567  int cache_entry_number /* = -1 */
5568 )
5569  : GUIFeaturesChanged(false)
5570  , m_sim_controller(sim_controller)
5571  , aileron(0)
5572  , avichatter_timer(11.0f) // some pseudo random number, doesn't matter
5573  , m_beacon_light_is_active(false)
5574  , beamsVisible(true)
5575  , blinkingtype(BLINK_NONE)
5576  , blinktreshpassed(false)
5577  , brake(0.0)
5578  , cabFadeMode(0)
5579  , cabFadeTime(0.3)
5580  , cabFadeTimer(0)
5581  , cameranodeacc(Ogre::Vector3::ZERO)
5582  , cameranodecount(0)
5583  , canwork(true)
5584  , cparticle_mode(false)
5585  , currentScale(1)
5586  , currentcamera(-1) // -1 = external
5587  , dash(nullptr)
5588  , detailLevel(0)
5589  , disableDrag(false)
5590  , disableTruckTruckCollisions(false)
5591  , disableTruckTruckSelfCollisions(false)
5592  , elevator(0)
5593  , flap(0)
5594  , fusedrag(Ogre::Vector3::ZERO)
5595  , high_res_wheelnode_collisions(false)
5596  , hydroaileroncommand(0)
5597  , hydroaileronstate(0)
5598  , hydrodircommand(0)
5599  , hydrodirstate(0)
5600  , hydrodirwheeldisplay(0.0)
5601  , hydroelevatorcommand(0)
5602  , hydroelevatorstate(0)
5603  , hydroruddercommand(0)
5604  , hydrorudderstate(0)
5605  , iPosition(pos)
5606  , increased_accuracy(false)
5607  , interPointCD()
5608  , intraPointCD()
5609  , isInside(false)
5610  , lastNetUpdateTime(0)
5611  , lastposition(pos)
5612  , leftMirrorAngle(0.52)
5613  , lights(1)
5614  , locked(0)
5615  , lockedold(0)
5616  , velocity(Ogre::Vector3::ZERO)
5617  , m_custom_camera_node(-1)
5618  , m_hide_own_net_label(BSETTING("HideOwnNetLabel", false))
5619  , m_is_cinecam_rotation_center(false)
5620  , m_preloaded_with_terrain(preloaded_with_terrain)
5621  , m_request_skeletonview_change(0)
5622  , m_reset_request(REQUEST_RESET_NONE)
5623  , m_skeletonview_is_active(false)
5624  , m_source_id(0)
5625  , m_spawn_rotation(0.0)
5626  , m_stream_id(0)
5627  , mTimeUntilNextToggle(0)
5628  , meshesVisible(true)
5629  , minCameraRadius(-1.0f)
5630  , mousemoveforce(0.0f)
5631  , mousenode(-1)
5632  , mousepos(Ogre::Vector3::ZERO)
5633  , netBrakeLight(false)
5634  , netLabelNode(0)
5635  , netMT(0)
5636  , netReverseLight(false)
5637  , networkAuthlevel(0)
5638  , networkUsername("")
5639  , oldreplaypos(-1)
5640  , parkingbrake(0)
5641  , posStorage(0)
5642  , position(pos)
5643  , previousGear(0)
5644  , refpressure(50.0)
5645  , replay(0)
5646  , replayPrecision(0)
5647  , replayTimer(0)
5648  , replaylen(10000)
5649  , replaymode(false)
5650  , replaypos(0)
5651  , reverselight(false)
5652  , rightMirrorAngle(-0.52)
5653  , rudder(0)
5654  , simpleSkeletonInitiated(false)
5655  , simpleSkeletonManualObject(0)
5656  , simulated(false)
5657  , sleeptime(0.0f)
5658  , smokeNode(NULL)
5659  , smoker(NULL)
5660  , stabcommand(0)
5661  , stabratio(0.0)
5662  , stabsleep(0.0)
5663  , totalmass(0)
5664  , watercontact(false)
5665  , watercontactold(false)
5666 {
5667  high_res_wheelnode_collisions = BSETTING("HighResWheelNodeCollisions", false);
5668  useSkidmarks = RoR::App::GetGfxSkidmarksMode() == 1;
5669  LOG(" ===== LOADING VEHICLE: " + Ogre::String(fname));
5670 
5671  /* struct <rig_t> parameters */
5672 
5673  trucknum = truck_number;
5674  freePositioned = freeposition;
5675  usedSkin = skin;
5676  networking = _networking;
5677  memset(truckname, 0, 256);
5678  sprintf(truckname, "t%i", truck_number);
5679  driveable = NOT_DRIVEABLE;
5680  if (ismachine)
5681  {
5682  driveable = MACHINE;
5683  }
5684 
5685  /* class <Beam> parameters */
5686  realtruckfilename = Ogre::String(fname);
5687 
5688  // copy truck config
5689  if (truckconfig != nullptr && truckconfig->size() > 0u)
5690  {
5691  for (std::vector<Ogre::String>::const_iterator it = truckconfig->begin(); it != truckconfig->end(); ++it)
5692  {
5693  m_truck_config.push_back(*it);
5694  }
5695  }
5696 
5697  Ogre::SceneNode* beams_parent = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
5698 
5699  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_CTOR_PREPARE_LOADTRUCK);
5700 
5701  if (strnlen(fname, 200) > 0)
5702  {
5703  if (! LoadTruck(rig_loading_profiler, fname, beams_parent, pos, rot, spawnbox, cache_entry_number))
5704  {
5705  LOG(" ===== FAILED LOADING VEHICLE: " + Ogre::String(fname));
5706  state = INVALID;
5707  return;
5708  }
5709  }
5710 
5711  // setup sounds properly
5712  changedCamera();
5713 
5714  // setup replay mode
5715 
5716  if (App::GetSimReplayEnabled() && !_networked && !networking)
5717  {
5718  replaylen = App::GetSimReplayLength();
5719  replay = new Replay(this, replaylen);
5720 
5721  int steps = App::GetSimReplayStepping();
5722 
5723  if (steps <= 0)
5724  replayPrecision = 0.0f;
5725  else
5726  replayPrecision = 1.0f / ((float)steps);
5727  }
5728 
5729  // add storage
5730  bool enablePosStor = App::GetSimPositionStorage();
5731  if (enablePosStor)
5732  {
5733  posStorage = new PositionStorage(free_node, 10);
5734  }
5735 
5736  // calculate the number of wheel nodes
5737  wheel_node_count = 0;
5738  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
5739  {
5740  if (nodes[i].iswheel != NOWHEEL)
5741  wheel_node_count++;
5742  }
5743 
5744  // search first_wheel_node
5745  first_wheel_node = free_node;
5746  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
5747  {
5748  if (nodes[i].iswheel == WHEEL_DEFAULT)
5749  {
5750  first_wheel_node = i;
5751  break;
5752  }
5753  }
5754 
5755  // network buffer layout (without RoRnet::TruckState):
5756  //
5757  // - 3 floats (x,y,z) for the reference node 0
5758  // - free_node - 1 times 3 short ints (compressed position info)
5759  // - free_wheel times a float for the wheel rotation
5760  //
5761  nodebuffersize = sizeof(float) * 3 + (first_wheel_node - 1) * sizeof(short int) * 3;
5762  netbuffersize = nodebuffersize + free_wheel * sizeof(float);
5763  updateFlexbodiesPrepare();
5764  updateFlexbodiesFinal();
5765  updateVisual();
5766  // stop lights
5767  lightsToggle();
5768 
5769  mCamera = gEnv->mainCamera;
5770  updateFlares(0);
5771  updateProps();
5772  if (engine)
5773  {
5774  engine->offstart();
5775  }
5776  // pressurize tires
5777  addPressure(0.0);
5778 
5779  CreateSimpleSkeletonMaterial();
5780 
5781  state = SLEEPING;
5782 
5783  // start network stuff
5784  if (_networked)
5785  {
5786  state = NETWORKED;
5787  // malloc memory
5788  oob1 = (RoRnet::TruckState*)malloc(sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState));
5789  oob2 = (RoRnet::TruckState*)malloc(sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState));
5790  oob3 = (RoRnet::TruckState*)malloc(sizeof(RoRnet::TruckState));
5791  netb1 = (char*)malloc(netbuffersize);
5792  netb2 = (char*)malloc(netbuffersize);
5793  netb3 = (char*)malloc(netbuffersize);
5794  net_toffset = 0;
5795  netcounter = 0;
5796  if (engine)
5797  {
5798  engine->start();
5799  }
5800  }
5801 
5802  if (networking)
5803  {
5804  if (state != NETWORKED)
5805  {
5806  sendStreamSetup();
5807  }
5808 
5809  if (state == NETWORKED || !m_hide_own_net_label)
5810  {
5811  char wname[256];
5812  sprintf(wname, "netlabel-%s", truckname);
5813  netMT = new MovableText(wname, networkUsername);
5814  netMT->setFontName("CyberbitEnglish");
5815  netMT->setTextAlignment(MovableText::H_CENTER, MovableText::V_ABOVE);
5816  //netMT->setAdditionalHeight(2);
5817  netMT->showOnTop(false);
5818  netMT->setCharacterHeight(2);
5819  netMT->setColor(ColourValue::Black);
5820  netMT->setVisible(true);
5821 
5822  /*
5823  if (networkAuthlevel & AUTH_ADMIN)
5824  {
5825  netMT->setFontName("highcontrast_red");
5826  } else if (networkAuthlevel & AUTH_RANKED)
5827  {
5828  netMT->setFontName("highcontrast_green");
5829  } else
5830  {
5831  netMT->setFontName("highcontrast_black");
5832  }
5833  */
5834 
5835  netLabelNode = gEnv->sceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
5836  netLabelNode->attachObject(netMT);
5837  netLabelNode->setVisible(true);
5838  deletion_sceneNodes.emplace_back(netLabelNode);
5839  }
5840  }
5841 
5842  mCamera = gEnv->mainCamera;
5843 
5844  // DEBUG UTILITY
5845  // RigInspector::InspectRig(this, "d:\\Projects\\Rigs of Rods\\rig-inspection\\NextStable.log");
5846 
5847  LOG(" ===== DONE LOADING VEHICLE");
5848 }
5849 
5850 bool Beam::LoadTruck(
5851  RoR::RigLoadingProfiler* rig_loading_profiler,
5852  Ogre::String const& file_name,
5853  Ogre::SceneNode* parent_scene_node,
5854  Ogre::Vector3 const& spawn_position,
5855  Ogre::Quaternion& spawn_rotation,
5856  collision_box_t* spawn_box,
5857  int cache_entry_number // = -1
5858 )
5859 {
5860  /* add custom include path */
5861  if (!SSETTING("resourceIncludePath", "").empty())
5862  {
5863  Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().addResourceLocation(SSETTING("resourceIncludePath", ""), "FileSystem", "customInclude");
5864  }
5865 
5866  //ScopeLog scope_log("beam_"+filename);
5867 
5868  /* initialize custom include path */
5869  if (!SSETTING("resourceIncludePath", "").empty())
5870  {
5871  Ogre::ResourceBackgroundQueue::getSingleton().initialiseResourceGroup("customInclude");
5872  }
5873 
5874  Ogre::DataStreamPtr ds = Ogre::DataStreamPtr();
5875  Ogre::String fixed_file_name = file_name;
5876  Ogre::String found_resource_group;
5877  Ogre::String errorStr;
5878 
5879  try
5880  {
5881  RoR::App::GetCacheSystem()->checkResourceLoaded(fixed_file_name, found_resource_group); /* Fixes the filename and finds resource group */
5882 
5883  // error on ds open lower
5884  // open the stream and start reading :)
5885  ds = Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().openResource(fixed_file_name, found_resource_group);
5886  }
5887  catch (Ogre::Exception& e)
5888  {
5889  errorStr = Ogre::String(e.what());
5890  return false;
5891  }
5892 
5893  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_OPENFILE);
5894 
5895  if (ds.isNull() || !ds->isReadable())
5896  {
5897  Console* console = RoR::App::GetConsole();
5898  if (console != nullptr)
5899  {
5900  console->putMessage(
5901  Console::CONSOLE_MSGTYPE_INFO,
5902  Console::CONSOLE_SYSTEM_ERROR,
5903  "unable to load vehicle (unable to open file): " + fixed_file_name + " : " + errorStr,
5904  "error.png",
5905  30000,
5906  true
5907  );
5908  RoR::App::GetGuiManager()->PushNotification("Error:", "unable to load vehicle (unable to open file): " + fixed_file_name + " : " + errorStr);
5909  }
5910  return false;
5911  }
5912 
5913  /* PARSING */
5914 
5915  LOG(" == Parsing vehicle file: " + file_name);
5916 
5917  RigDef::Parser parser;
5918  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_PARSER_CREATE);
5919  parser.Prepare();
5920  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_PARSER_PREPARE);
5921  parser.ProcessOgreStream(ds.getPointer());
5922  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_PARSER_RUN);
5923  parser.Finalize();
5924  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_PARSER_FINALIZE);
5925 
5926  int report_num_errors = parser.GetMessagesNumErrors();
5927  int report_num_warnings = parser.GetMessagesNumWarnings();
5928  int report_num_other = parser.GetMessagesNumOther();
5929  std::string report_text = parser.ProcessMessagesToString();
5930  report_text += "\n\n";
5931  LOG(report_text);
5932 
5933  auto* importer = parser.GetSequentialImporter();
5934  if (importer->IsEnabled() && App::GetDiagRigLogMessages())
5935  {
5936  report_num_errors += importer->GetMessagesNumErrors();
5937  report_num_warnings += importer->GetMessagesNumWarnings();
5938  report_num_other += importer->GetMessagesNumOther();
5939 
5940  std::string importer_report = importer->ProcessMessagesToString();
5941  LOG(importer_report);
5942 
5943  report_text += importer_report + "\n\n";
5944  }
5945 
5946  /* VALIDATING */
5947  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_POST_PARSE);
5948  LOG(" == Validating vehicle: " + parser.GetFile()->name);
5949 
5950  RigDef::Validator validator;
5951  validator.Setup(parser.GetFile());
5952  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_VALIDATOR_INIT);
5953 
5954  // Workaround: Some terrains pre-load truckfiles with special purpose:
5955  // "soundloads" = play sound effect at certain spot
5956  // "fixes" = structures of N/B fixed to the ground
5957  // These files can have no beams. Possible extensions: .load or .fixed
5958  Ogre::String file_extension = file_name.substr(file_name.find_last_of('.'));
5959  Ogre::StringUtil::toLowerCase(file_extension);
5960  bool extension_matches = (file_extension == ".load") | (file_extension == ".fixed");
5961  if (m_preloaded_with_terrain && extension_matches)
5962  {
5963  validator.SetCheckBeams(false);
5964  }
5965  bool valid = validator.Validate();
5966  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_VALIDATOR_RUN);
5967 
5968  report_num_errors += validator.GetMessagesNumErrors();
5969  report_num_warnings += validator.GetMessagesNumWarnings();
5970  report_num_other += validator.GetMessagesNumOther();
5971  std::string validator_report = validator.ProcessMessagesToString();
5972  LOG(validator_report);
5973  report_text += validator_report;
5974  report_text += "\n\n";
5975  // Continue anyway...
5976  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_POST_VALIDATION);
5977 
5978  /* PROCESSING */
5979 
5980  LOG(" == Spawning vehicle: " + parser.GetFile()->name);
5981 
5982  RigSpawner spawner(m_sim_controller);
5983  spawner.Setup(this, parser.GetFile(), parent_scene_node, spawn_position, cache_entry_number);
5984  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_SPAWNER_SETUP);
5985  /* Setup modules */
5986  spawner.AddModule(parser.GetFile()->root_module);
5987  if (parser.GetFile()->user_modules.size() > 0) /* The vehicle-selector may return selected modules even for vehicle with no modules defined! Hence this check. */
5988  {
5989  std::vector<Ogre::String>::iterator itor = m_truck_config.begin();
5990  for (; itor != m_truck_config.end(); itor++)
5991  {
5992  spawner.AddModule(*itor);
5993  }
5994  }
5995  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_SPAWNER_ADDMODULES);
5996  spawner.SpawnRig();
5997  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_SPAWNER_RUN);
5998  report_num_errors += spawner.GetMessagesNumErrors();
5999  report_num_warnings += spawner.GetMessagesNumWarnings();
6000  report_num_other += spawner.GetMessagesNumOther();
6001  // Spawner log already printed to RoR.log
6002  report_text += spawner.ProcessMessagesToString() + "\n\n";
6003 
6004  // Extra information to RoR.log
6005  if (importer->IsEnabled())
6006  {
6007  if (App::GetDiagRigLogNodeStats())
6008  {
6009  LOG(importer->GetNodeStatistics());
6010  }
6011  if (App::GetDiagRigLogNodeImport())
6012  {
6013  LOG(importer->IterateAndPrintAllNodes());
6014  }
6015  }
6016 
6017  RoR::App::GetGuiManager()->AddRigLoadingReport(parser.GetFile()->name, report_text, report_num_errors, report_num_warnings, report_num_other);
6018  if (report_num_errors != 0)
6019  {
6020  if (BSETTING("AutoRigSpawnerReport", false))
6021  {
6022  RoR::App::GetGuiManager()->SetVisible_SpawnerReport(true);
6023  }
6024  }
6025  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_SPAWNER_LOG);
6026  /* POST-PROCESSING (Old-spawn code from Beam::loadTruck2) */
6027 
6028  // Apply spawn position & spawn rotation
6029  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
6030  {
6031  nodes[i].AbsPosition = spawn_position + spawn_rotation * (nodes[i].AbsPosition - spawn_position);
6032  nodes[i].RelPosition = nodes[i].AbsPosition - origin;
6033  };
6034 
6035  /* Place correctly */
6036  if (! parser.GetFile()->HasFixes())
6037  {
6038  Ogre::Vector3 vehicle_position = spawn_position;
6039 
6040  // check if over-sized
6041  RigSpawner::RecalculateBoundingBoxes(this);
6042  vehicle_position.x -= (boundingBox.getMaximum().x + boundingBox.getMinimum().x) / 2.0 - vehicle_position.x;
6043  vehicle_position.z -= (boundingBox.getMaximum().z + boundingBox.getMinimum().z) / 2.0 - vehicle_position.z;
6044 
6045  float miny = 0.0f;
6046 
6047  if (!m_preloaded_with_terrain)
6048  {
6049  miny = vehicle_position.y;
6050  }
6051 
6052  if (spawn_box != nullptr)
6053  {
6054  miny = spawn_box->relo.y + spawn_box->center.y;
6055  }
6056 
6057  if (freePositioned)
6058  resetPosition(vehicle_position, true);
6059  else
6060  resetPosition(vehicle_position.x, vehicle_position.z, true, miny);
6061 
6062  if (spawn_box != nullptr)
6063  {
6064  bool inside = true;
6065 
6066  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
6067  inside = (inside && gEnv->collisions->isInside(nodes[i].AbsPosition, spawn_box, 0.2f));
6068 
6069  if (!inside)
6070  {
6071  Vector3 gpos = Vector3(vehicle_position.x, 0.0f, vehicle_position.z);
6072 
6073  gpos -= spawn_rotation * Vector3((spawn_box->hi.x - spawn_box->lo.x + boundingBox.getMaximum().x - boundingBox.getMinimum().x) * 0.6f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
6074 
6075  resetPosition(gpos.x, gpos.z, true, miny);
6076  }
6077  }
6078  }
6079  else
6080  {
6081  resetPosition(spawn_position, true);
6082  }
6083  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_FIXES);
6084 
6085  //compute final mass
6086  calc_masses2(truckmass);
6087  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_CALC_MASSES);
6088  //setup default sounds
6089  if (!disable_default_sounds)
6090  {
6091  //setupDefaultSoundSources();
6092  RigSpawner::SetupDefaultSoundSources(this);
6093  }
6094  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_SET_DEFAULT_SND_SOURCES);
6095 
6096  //compute node connectivity graph
6097  calcNodeConnectivityGraph();
6098  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_CALC_NODE_CONNECT_GRAPH);
6099 
6100  RigSpawner::RecalculateBoundingBoxes(this);
6101  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_RECALC_BOUNDING_BOXES);
6102 
6103  // fix up submesh collision model
6104  if (!subMeshGroundModelName.empty())
6105  {
6106  submesh_ground_model = gEnv->collisions->getGroundModelByString(subMeshGroundModelName);
6107  if (!submesh_ground_model)
6108  {
6109  submesh_ground_model = gEnv->collisions->defaultgm;
6110  }
6111  }
6112 
6113  // print some truck memory stats
6114  int mem = 0, memr = 0, tmpmem = 0;
6115  LOG("BEAM: memory stats following");
6116 
6117  tmpmem = free_prop * sizeof(prop_t);
6118  mem += tmpmem;
6119  memr += MAX_PROPS * sizeof(beam_t);
6120  LOG("BEAM: prop memory: " + TOSTRING(tmpmem) + " B (" + TOSTRING(free_prop) + " x " + TOSTRING(sizeof(prop_t)) + " B) / " + TOSTRING(MAX_PROPS * sizeof(prop_t)));
6121 
6122  tmpmem = free_wheel * sizeof(wheel_t);
6123  mem += tmpmem;
6124  memr += MAX_WHEELS * sizeof(beam_t);
6125  LOG("BEAM: wheel memory: " + TOSTRING(tmpmem) + " B (" + TOSTRING(free_wheel) + " x " + TOSTRING(sizeof(wheel_t)) + " B) / " + TOSTRING(MAX_WHEELS * sizeof(wheel_t)));
6126 
6127  LOG("BEAM: truck memory used: " + TOSTRING(mem) + " B (" + TOSTRING(mem/1024) + " kB)");
6128  LOG("BEAM: truck memory allocated: " + TOSTRING(memr) + " B (" + TOSTRING(memr/1024) + " kB)");
6129 
6130  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_GROUNDMODEL_AND_STATS);
6131  // now load any dashboards
6132  if (dash)
6133  {
6134  if (dashBoardLayouts.empty())
6135  {
6136  // load default for a truck
6137  if (driveable == TRUCK)
6138  {
6139  if (Settings::getSingleton().getSetting("DigitalSpeedo", "No") == "Yes")
6140  {
6141  if (Settings::getSingleton().getSetting("SpeedUnit", "Metric") == "Imperial")
6142  {
6143  if (engine->getMaxRPM() > 3500)
6144  {
6145  //7000 rpm tachometer thanks to klink
6146  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard7000_mph.layout", false);
6147  // TODO: load texture dashboard by default as well
6148  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard7000_mph.layout", true);
6149  }
6150  else
6151  {
6152  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard3500_mph.layout", false);
6153  // TODO: load texture dashboard by default as well
6154  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard3500_mph.layout", true);
6155  }
6156  }
6157  else
6158  {
6159  if (engine->getMaxRPM() > 3500)
6160  {
6161  //7000 rpm tachometer thanks to klink
6162  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard7000.layout", false);
6163  // TODO: load texture dashboard by default as well
6164  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard7000.layout", true);
6165  }
6166  else
6167  {
6168  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard3500.layout", false);
6169  // TODO: load texture dashboard by default as well
6170  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard3500.layout", true);
6171  }
6172  }
6173  }
6174  else
6175  {
6176  if (Settings::getSingleton().getSetting("SpeedUnit", "Metric") == "Imperial")
6177  {
6178  if (engine->getMaxRPM() > 3500)
6179  {
6180  //7000 rpm tachometer thanks to klink
6181  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard7000_analog_mph.layout", false);
6182  // TODO: load texture dashboard by default as well
6183  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard7000_analog_mph.layout", true);
6184  }
6185  else
6186  {
6187  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard3500_analog_mph.layout", false);
6188  // TODO: load texture dashboard by default as well
6189  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard3500_analog_mph.layout", true);
6190  }
6191  }
6192  else
6193  {
6194  if (engine->getMaxRPM() > 3500)
6195  {
6196  //7000 rpm tachometer thanks to klink
6197  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard7000_analog.layout", false);
6198  // TODO: load texture dashboard by default as well
6199  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard7000_analog.layout", true);
6200  }
6201  else
6202  {
6203  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard3500_analog.layout", false);
6204  // TODO: load texture dashboard by default as well
6205  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard3500_analog.layout", true);
6206  }
6207  }
6208  }
6209  }
6210  else if (driveable == BOAT)
6211  {
6212  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard_boat.layout", false);
6213  // TODO: load texture dashboard by default as well
6214  dash->loadDashBoard("default_dashboard_boat.layout", true);
6215  }
6216  }
6217  else
6218  {
6219  // load all dashes
6220  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < dashBoardLayouts.size(); i++)
6221  dash->loadDashBoard(dashBoardLayouts[i].first, dashBoardLayouts[i].second);
6222  }
6223  dash->setVisible(false);
6224  }
6225  LOAD_RIG_PROFILE_CHECKPOINT(ENTRY_BEAM_LOADTRUCK_LOAD_DASHBOARDS);
6226 
6227  // Set beam defaults
6228  for (int i = 0; i < free_beam; i++)
6229  {
6230  beams[i].initial_beam_strength = beams[i].strength;
6231  beams[i].default_beam_deform = beams[i].minmaxposnegstress;
6232  beams[i].default_beam_plastic_coef = beams[i].plastic_coef;
6233  }
6234 
6235  // TODO: Check cam. nodes once on spawn! They never change --> no reason to repeat the check. ~only_a_ptr, 06/2017
6236  if (cameranodepos[0] != cameranodedir[0] && this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0]) && this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodedir[0]))
6237  {
6238  Vector3 cur_dir = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].RelPosition - nodes[cameranodedir[0]].RelPosition;
6239  m_spawn_rotation = atan2(cur_dir.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_X), cur_dir.dotProduct(-Vector3::UNIT_Z));
6240  }
6241  else if (free_node > 1)
6242  {
6243  float max_dist = 0.0f;
6244  int furthest_node = 1;
6245  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
6246  {
6247  float dist = nodes[i].RelPosition.squaredDistance(nodes[0].RelPosition);
6248  if (dist > max_dist)
6249  {
6250  max_dist = dist;
6251  furthest_node = i;
6252  }
6253  }
6254  Vector3 cur_dir = nodes[0].RelPosition - nodes[furthest_node].RelPosition;
6255  m_spawn_rotation = atan2(cur_dir.dotProduct(Vector3::UNIT_X), cur_dir.dotProduct(-Vector3::UNIT_Z));
6256  }
6257 
6258  Vector3 cinecam = nodes[0].AbsPosition;
6259  if (this->IsNodeIdValid(cameranodepos[0]))
6260  {
6261  cinecam = nodes[cameranodepos[0]].AbsPosition;
6262  }
6263 
6264  // Calculate the approximate median
6265  std::vector<Real> mx(free_node, 0.0f);
6266  std::vector<Real> my(free_node, 0.0f);
6267  std::vector<Real> mz(free_node, 0.0f);
6268  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
6269  {
6270  mx[i] = nodes[i].AbsPosition.x;
6271  my[i] = nodes[i].AbsPosition.y;
6272  mz[i] = nodes[i].AbsPosition.z;
6273  }
6274  std::nth_element(mx.begin(), mx.begin() + free_node / 2, mx.end());
6275  std::nth_element(my.begin(), my.begin() + free_node / 2, my.end());
6276  std::nth_element(mz.begin(), mz.begin() + free_node / 2, mz.end());
6277  Vector3 median = Vector3(mx[free_node / 2], my[free_node / 2], mz[free_node / 2]);
6278 
6279  // Calculate the average
6280  Vector3 sum = Vector3::ZERO;
6281  for (int i = 0; i < free_node; i++)
6282  {
6283  sum += nodes[i].AbsPosition;
6284  }
6285  Vector3 average = sum / free_node;
6286 
6287  // Decide whether or not the cinecam node is an appropriate rotation center
6288  m_is_cinecam_rotation_center = cinecam.squaredDistance(median) < average.squaredDistance(median);
6289 
6290  TRIGGER_EVENT(SE_GENERIC_NEW_TRUCK, trucknum);
6291 
6292  return true;
6293 }
6294 
6295 ground_model_t* Beam::getLastFuzzyGroundModel()
6296 {
6297  return lastFuzzyGroundModel;
6298 }

6355 bool Beam::getBrakeLightVisible()
6356 {

6360  // return (brake > 0.15 && !parkingbrake);
6361  return (brake > 0.15);
6362 }

6364 bool Beam::getCustomLightVisible(int number)
6365 {
6366  if (number < 0 || number > 4)
6367  {
6368  LOG("AngelScript: Invalid Light ID (" + TOSTRING(number) + "), allowed range is (0 - 4)");
6369  return false;
6370  }
6371 
6372  unsigned int flareID = netCustomLightArray[number];
6373 
6374  return flareID < flares.size() && flares[flareID].controltoggle_status;
6375 }
6376 
6377 void Beam::setCustomLightVisible(int number, bool visible)
6378 {
6379  if (number < 0 || number > 4)
6380  {
6381  LOG("AngelScript: Invalid Light ID (" + TOSTRING(number) + "), allowed range is (0 - 4)");
6382  return;
6383  }
6384 
6385  unsigned int flareID = netCustomLightArray[number];
6386 
6387  if (flareID < flares.size() && flares[flareID].snode)
6388  {
6389  flares[flareID].controltoggle_status = visible;
6390  }
6391 }
6392

6394 {
6395  return m_beacon_light_is_active;
6396 }

6399 {

6404 {

6409 {
6410  return lowestnode;

6428 bool Beam::inRange(float num, float min, float max)
6429 {
6430  return (num <= max && num >= min);
6431 }

6433 Vector3 Beam::getNodePosition(int nodeNumber)
6434 {
6435  if (nodeNumber >= 0 && nodeNumber < free_node)
6436  {
6437  return nodes[nodeNumber].AbsPosition;
6438  }
6439  else
6440  {
6441  return Ogre::Vector3();
6442  }
6443 }
6444 
6445 void Beam::UpdatePropAnimations(const float dt)
6446 {
6447  BES_START(BES_CORE_AnimatedProps);
6448 
6449  for (int propi = 0; propi < free_prop; propi++)
6450  {
6451  int animnum = 0;
6452  float rx = 0.0f;
6453  float ry = 0.0f;
6454  float rz = 0.0f;
6455 
6456  while (props[propi].animFlags[animnum])
6457  {
6458  float cstate = 0.0f;
6459  int div = 0.0f;
6460  int flagstate = props[propi].animFlags[animnum];
6461  const float lower_limit = props[propi].constraints[animnum].lower_limit;
6462  const float upper_limit = props[propi].constraints[animnum].upper_limit;
6463  float animOpt3 = props[propi].animOpt3[animnum];
6464 
6465  calcAnimators(flagstate, cstate, div, dt, lower_limit, upper_limit, animOpt3);
6466 
6467  // key triggered animations
6468  if ((props[propi].animFlags[animnum] & ANIM_FLAG_EVENT) && props[propi].animKey[animnum] != -1)
6469  {
6470  if (RoR::App::GetInputEngine()->getEventValue(props[propi].animKey[animnum]))
6471  {
6472  // keystatelock is disabled then set cstate
6473  if (props[propi].animKeyState[animnum] == -1.0f)
6474  {
6475  cstate += RoR::App::GetInputEngine()->getEventValue(props[propi].animKey[animnum]);
6476  }
6477  else if (!props[propi].animKeyState[animnum])
6478  {
6479  // a key was pressed and a toggle was done already, so bypass
6480  //toggle now
6481  if (!props[propi].lastanimKS[animnum])
6482  {
6483  props[propi].lastanimKS[animnum] = 1.0f;
6484  // use animkey as bool to determine keypress / release state of inputengine
6485  props[propi].animKeyState[animnum] = 1.0f;
6486  }
6487  else
6488  {
6489  props[propi].lastanimKS[animnum] = 0.0f;
6490  // use animkey as bool to determine keypress / release state of inputengine
6491  props[propi].animKeyState[animnum] = 1.0f;
6492  }
6493  }
6494  else
6495  {
6496  // bypas mode, get the last set position and set it
6497  cstate += props[propi].lastanimKS[animnum];
6498  }
6499  }
6500  else
6501  {
6502  // keyevent exists and keylock is enabled but the key isnt pressed right now = get lastanimkeystatus for cstate and reset keypressed bool animkey
6503  if (props[propi].animKeyState[animnum] != -1.0f)
6504  {
6505  cstate += props[propi].lastanimKS[animnum];
6506  props[propi].animKeyState[animnum] = 0.0f;
6507  }
6508  }
6509  }
6510 
6511  //propanimation placed here to avoid interference with existing hydros(cstate) and permanent prop animation
6512  //truck steering
6513  if (props[propi].animFlags[animnum] & ANIM_FLAG_STEERING)
6514  cstate += hydrodirstate;
6515  //aileron
6516  if (props[propi].animFlags[animnum] & ANIM_FLAG_AILERONS)
6517  cstate += hydroaileronstate;
6518  //elevator
6519  if (props[propi].animFlags[animnum] & ANIM_FLAG_ELEVATORS)
6520  cstate += hydroelevatorstate;
6521  //rudder
6522  if (props[propi].animFlags[animnum] & ANIM_FLAG_ARUDDER)
6523  cstate += hydrorudderstate;
6524  //permanent
6525  if (props[propi].animFlags[animnum] & ANIM_FLAG_PERMANENT)
6526  cstate += 1.0f;
6527 
6528  cstate *= props[propi].animratio[animnum];
6529 
6530  // autoanimate noflip_bouncer
6531  if (props[propi].animOpt5[animnum])
6532  cstate *= (props[propi].animOpt5[animnum]);
6533 
6534  //rotate prop
6535  if ((props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_X) || (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_Y) || (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_Z))
6536  {
6537  float limiter = 0.0f;
6538  // This code was formerly executed within a fixed timestep of 0.5ms and finetuned accordingly.
6539  // This is now taken into account by factoring in the respective fraction of the variable timestep.
6540  float const dt_frac = dt * 2000.f;
6541  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_AUTOANIMATE)
6542  {
6543  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_X)
6544  {
6545  props[propi].rotaX += cstate * dt_frac;
6546  limiter = props[propi].rotaX;
6547  }
6548  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_Y)
6549  {
6550  props[propi].rotaY += cstate * dt_frac;
6551  limiter = props[propi].rotaY;
6552  }
6553  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_Z)
6554  {
6555  props[propi].rotaZ += cstate * dt_frac;
6556  limiter = props[propi].rotaZ;
6557  }
6558  }
6559  else
6560  {
6561  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_X)
6562  rx += cstate;
6563  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_Y)
6564  ry += cstate;
6565  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_Z)
6566  rz += cstate;
6567  }
6568 
6569  bool limiterchanged = false;
6570  // check if a positive custom limit is set to evaluate/calc flip back
6571 
6572  if (limiter > upper_limit)
6573  {
6574  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_NOFLIP)
6575  {
6576  limiter = upper_limit; // stop at limit
6577  props[propi].animOpt5[animnum] *= -1.0f; // change cstate multiplier if bounce is set
6578  }
6579  else
6580  {
6581  limiter = lower_limit; // flip to other side at limit
6582  }
6583  limiterchanged = true;
6584  }
6585 
6586  if (limiter < lower_limit)
6587  {
6588  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_NOFLIP)
6589  {
6590  limiter = lower_limit; // stop at limit
6591  props[propi].animOpt5[animnum] *= -1.0f; // change cstate multiplier if active
6592  }
6593  else
6594  {
6595  limiter = upper_limit; // flip to other side at limit
6596  }
6597  limiterchanged = true;
6598  }
6599 
6600  if (limiterchanged)
6601  {
6602  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_X)
6603  props[propi].rotaX = limiter;
6604  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_Y)
6605  props[propi].rotaY = limiter;
6606  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_ROTA_Z)
6607  props[propi].rotaZ = limiter;
6608  }
6609  }
6610 
6611  //offset prop
6612 
6613  // TODO Unused Varaible
6614  //float ox = props[propi].orgoffsetX;
6615 
6616  // TODO Unused Varaible
6617  //float oy = props[propi].orgoffsetY;
6618 
6619  // TODO Unused Varaible
6620  //float oz = props[propi].orgoffsetZ;
6621 
6622  if ((props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_X) || (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_Y) || (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_Z))
6623  {
6624  float offset = 0.0f;
6625  float autooffset = 0.0f;
6626 
6627  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_X)
6628  offset = props[propi].orgoffsetX;
6629  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_Y)
6630  offset = props[propi].orgoffsetY;
6631  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_Z)
6632  offset = props[propi].orgoffsetZ;
6633 
6634  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_AUTOANIMATE)
6635  {
6636  // This code was formerly executed within a fixed timestep of 0.5ms and finetuned accordingly.
6637  // This is now taken into account by factoring in the respective fraction of the variable timestep.
6638  float const dt_frac = dt * 2000.f;
6639  autooffset = offset + cstate * dt_frac;
6640 
6641  if (autooffset > upper_limit)
6642  {
6643  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_NOFLIP)
6644  {
6645  autooffset = upper_limit; // stop at limit
6646  props[propi].animOpt5[animnum] *= -1.0f; // change cstate multiplier if active
6647  }
6648  else
6649  {
6650  autooffset = lower_limit; // flip to other side at limit
6651  }
6652  }
6653 
6654  if (autooffset < lower_limit)
6655  {
6656  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_NOFLIP)
6657  {
6658  autooffset = lower_limit; // stop at limit
6659  props[propi].animOpt5[animnum] *= -1.0f; // change cstate multiplier if active
6660  }
6661  else
6662  {
6663  autooffset = upper_limit; // flip to other side at limit
6664  }
6665  }
6666  }
6667  offset += cstate;
6668 
6669  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_X)
6670  {
6671  props[propi].offsetx = offset;
6672  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_AUTOANIMATE)
6673  props[propi].orgoffsetX = autooffset;
6674  }
6675  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_Y)
6676  {
6677  props[propi].offsety = offset;
6678  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_AUTOANIMATE)
6679  props[propi].orgoffsetY = autooffset;
6680  }
6681  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_OFFSET_Z)
6682  {
6683  props[propi].offsetz = offset;
6684  if (props[propi].animMode[animnum] & ANIM_MODE_AUTOANIMATE)
6685  props[propi].orgoffsetZ = autooffset;
6686  }
6687  }
6688  animnum++;
6689  }
6690  //recalc the quaternions with final stacked rotation values ( rx, ry, rz )
6691  rx += props[propi].rotaX;
6692  ry += props[propi].rotaY;
6693  rz += props[propi].rotaZ;
6694  props[propi].rot = Quaternion(Degree(rz), Vector3::UNIT_Z) * Quaternion(Degree(ry), Vector3::UNIT_Y) * Quaternion(Degree(rx), Vector3::UNIT_X);
6695  }
6696 
6697  BES_STOP(BES_CORE_AnimatedProps);
6698 }
Beam::getBeams
beam_t * getBeams()
Definition: Beam.cpp:6335
